ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: To Check Count of SIM (Jazz)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>This is to update that if customer inquire about the count of numbers against his/her CNIC then agent will follow the below handling to cater the customer query.<br />
Handling for All Network count:<br />
If customer asked about count of numbers on all network then CCR will guide 668 procedure to get the required details<br />
ISMS : Number of Connections Confirmation - 668<br />
Handling of Jazz Verified &amp; Non-verified numbers:<br />
If customer asked about Jazz Verified/Non-verified numbers then CCR will guide 6001 procedure to get the required details<br />
ISMS : Verification Status &ndash; 6001</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: WhatsApp Self Service
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Jazz Pakistans leading digital communications company has developed a selfcare service window for its postpaid subscribers on WhatsApp, the worlds best free to download messenger App.&nbsp;<br />
This channel will provide self service options to its individual Jazz Warid postpaid customers who will now be able to get their billing information, download last invoice, make payments, confirm package plan and get IR Support FAQs using a simple menu. Customer can access the Self Service option by adding 03003008000 to their WhatsApp contact list or tap in below link to use Jazz WhatsApp service from their&nbsp;number. Below is the message they will get. Agent will them guide accordingly:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Dear Customer ??&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;<br />
Welcome to Jazz Self Service<br />
&nbsp;<br />
To receive the desired information, reply with the option number<br />
&nbsp;<br />
1. Billing Information&nbsp;<br />
2. Monthly Invoice&nbsp;<br />
3. Package Details&nbsp;<br />
4. Pay your Bill&nbsp;<br />
5. International Roaming Info&nbsp;<br />
6. Tax Certificate&nbsp;<br />
7. Latest Promotions&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;<br />
?? for Billing Info ?? reply with 1&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;<br />
Your requested information will be shown below ????</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,27,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: taimoor.agha
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <p>Customer can access the Self Service option by adding 03003008000 to their WhatsApp contact list or tap in below link to use Jazz WhatsApp service from their postpaid number</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Email Update Process through 7091 Postpaid
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Customer End Process</p>

<p>Customer need to send message with email address at 7091 for his/her email address updation<br />
Customer will get response message to reply with code sent on email address by Jazz Email Verification<br />
Customer will reply the message with verification code<br />
Customer will get the confirmation message<br />
Customer will get error upon entering invalid email address so need to respond with valid email address<br />
Customer email address will be auto updated with in 48 Hrs for Jazz and Warid side it will update in real time<br />
Incase customer do not verify email address by sending verification code then new email address will not update<br />
Sending message at 7091 is free of cost</p>

<p>Backend Process:<br />
Bill Management Team (BMT) team receives day-1 verified/Unverified email address data on daily basis<br />
BDM will update email address in e-Front as per call center process<br />
BMT will make sure to update and complete the failure cases against e-Front auto email updation process<br />
At Warid side email address will be directly updated in TABs on real time</p>

<p>Front End Complaint Handling:<br />
If customer complaint that he/she has send the request at 7091 for email updation but still bill is not received at his/her email address<br />
Agent will verify the email address by the customer, then will check the CRM if required email is not updated then we will go for upfront handling to update email address for both Jazz &amp; Warid as per mentioned below handling<br />
Jazz: Initiate request through e-Front<br />
Warid: Update upfront in TABS</p>

Submission Channel: 1044
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: taimoor.agha
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <p>Email address should be valid</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Adjustment VAS Features
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Handling for the cases where customer claim wrong/over deduction in VAS services including BTL/ATL offers</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,35,1051,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 43
Point of Contact: via Contact Center Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <h3>Upfront Adjustment</h3>

<ul>
	<li>eFront&nbsp;&rarr; Creator
	<ul>
		<li>Activity type: Upfont Adjustment posting</li>
		<li>Reason</li>
		<li>Amount</li>
		<li>Date &amp; time of deduction</li>
		<li>Calling CLI</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<h3>SR for backend</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Adjustment Type: VAS features</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong><em>Note:</em></strong><em> Incase no wrong deduction found then guide the customer accordingly and close the call</em></p>

Checklist Items: <h2>Checklist for BTL/ATL Promo Posting issue</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Check in BTL/ATL link for broadcast
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><a href="http://portal.jazz.com.pk:9080/IBMMCCM/" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">http://portal.jazz.com.pk:9080/IBMMCCM/</a></li>
		<li>The portal shows eligibility &amp; Reward posting</li>
		<li>Verify CDRs/Installed Assets for incentive posting</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<h2>Checklist for Handset Incentive Posting issue</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Check handset in ADM (detection date)</li>
	<li>Handset model eligibility as per Mobics/ IMEI list (shared by devising team)</li>
	<li>IMEI listed in provided list</li>
</ul>

<h2>Checklist for VAS Deduction</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Jazztune activated by customer, service charged but not activated, customer claimed reversal of amount
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Check CDRs for deduction</li>
		<li>Check PRBT portal Date &amp; time for the content download</li>
		<li>In failure cases where amount is charged
		<ol>
			<li>Reversal is processed</li>
		</ol>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Jazztune deactivated but amount still charged on daily/weekly basis
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>For daily deduction service cases check if 24 hours passed of the Efront PT activity completion &amp; weekly charges respectively</li>
		<li>Check status of product on respective portal</li>
		<li>Slypee, DOB and all other VAS etc. charged after deactivation
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>Check status of product on respective portal</li>
			<li>Check if Power tool activity is created in Creator tab for the force deactivation of that VAS service</li>
			<li>For daily deduction service cases check if 24 hours passed of the Efront PT activity completion &amp; weekly charges respectively</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: CallCenter
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Change of Package Plan/Blot-Ons Postpaid
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Change of package plan/Bolt-ons postpaid is available for Customer in order to empower them to change their postpaid package/Bolt-On as per their choice &amp; tariff requirement</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1045
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Incase customer insists to change package immediately:</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li>Agent Enter Customer Number in Siebel</li>
	<li>Press &ldquo;Modify&rdquo; under Order items</li>
	<li>Select Package plan decided by the customer from drop down list</li>
	<li>Go up &amp; press save</li>
	<li>Order Window will be popped up</li>
	<li>Agent will enter Notes</li>
	<li>Submit the order</li>
</ul>

<p>TAT: Immediate</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:14px; vertical-align:top">
			<p>Process Guidelines:</p>

			<p>Agent should log the request in efront if he/she will make order directly in Siebel proration will be charged to customer</p>
			</td>
			<td rowspan="2" style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:14px; vertical-align:top">
			<p><strong>eFront Activity </strong></p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p><strong>TAT: </strong>&nbsp;&nbsp; Respective Bill Day</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top">
			<ul>
				<li>Agent create &ldquo;<strong>Deferred Change of Package Plan/Out-Bundle</strong>&rdquo; activity in eFront and will guide customer that package plan/Bolt-on/Bundle will be changed on coming bill day</li>
				<li>Agent will check if FNF are already add or customer specifically asks to add new FNF then we will mention current/new FNF in eFront Activity fields.
				<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
					<li>This is important otherwise FNF will be removed after change of package plan</li>
					<li>Please mention FNF in proper format i.e. 3XXXXXXX. Please avoid alphabets or any other statement in fields while mentioning FNFs</li>
				</ul>
				</li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>
	<p>The number should be of Consumer Catalogue with J or M Series as current package. &ldquo;Cannot Make this Activity on Current Package Plan&rdquo; error will appear if package is other than J or M Series</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<div><em>Please check credit limit before launching eFront activity. It must be sufficient for required package activation</em></div>

	<ul>
		<li>
		<div><em>Example: For J-600 and J-999, credit limit must be Rs.1500 (request will not be processed if Credit Limit is less than Rs.1500 on coming bill day)</em></div>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<div><em>We will not change the package/Bolt-On in suspended status in Siebel whereas change of package plan can be done on OG blocked status</em></div>
	</li>
	<li>
	<div>Voice discrimination will not be regarded in this case. For example, if female calls on helpline and number is in the name of male, we will process instructions, and vice versa</div>
	</li>
	<li>
	<div>Clearly guide about pro-ration impact and also send iSMS for details</div>
	</li>
	<li>
	<div>For Commercial to Consumer, customer will visit Business Center for Commercial to Consumer Change Offer processing</div>
	</li>
	<li>Discuss &amp; Finalize one package to be changed with the customer</li>
	<li>Guide basic tariff details to customer (Line Rent, Call/Data Rates and Free incentives)</li>
	<li>
	<p>Incase customer agrees to get change of package plan on bill day then we will follow below guidelines:</p>

	<div>&nbsp;</div>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ol>
	<li>Incase customer changes his/her mind and calls again to edit pending request before bill run then we will cancel pending request and will launch new request</li>
	<li>This process is not applicable on new Bolt-on addition and only applicable where already provisioned bolt-on needs to be changed. Means, bolt-on/Add-Ons can be added during month if not provisioned already</li>
	<li>If we are converting package to any other package then to make the call complete it is mandatory to guide the customer that he will not be able to revert it back before 24 hours (To Be changed in Improvement)</li>
	<li>At time of processing any Change of Package Plan order, every time it is mandatory to confirm if customer wants to continue using existing FNF Numbers (if any). Incase customer wants to carry forward the previously added F&amp;F numbers then it is mandatory to ask the previous F&amp;F numbers and update them again, as there is a possibility that previously added F&amp;F numbers will be deleted in case of Change in package plan .</li>
	<li>Incase customer wants to change the FNF then we will process edition as per existing process</li>
	<li>We need to check security deposit and credit limit before changing customers package plan. For e.g. if customer is using J 100 and now wants to change his package to J 1500, we need to check customer credit limit and if it is not sufficient then no instructions will be forwarded.</li>
	<li>While changing Postpaid Package Plan, it is mandatory to click on Add item after selecting required package, so the package plan is properly added</li>
	<li>We need to guide the tariff details (call charges etc.) of new package plan</li>
	<li>We need to guide the customers that line rent &amp; free minutes/MBs etc. will be calculated on prorated basis and will also be applicable from the date of package plan changed</li>
	<li>While converting package plan from M-initial to any other package we need to guide customer that package plan to M-initial cannot be reverted if oacakge plan is on commercial catalog</li>
	<li>On calls where we process postpaid change of package plan, we need to check if customer was previously availing any Add-On (e.g. M-Talk, GPRS 1,2, 3 or 4,M-SMS, FNF etc.). If yes, then we need to clearly probe if customer wants to keep availing the same add-on in new package and then cater request accordingly. For Example: If a customer on M-999 with GPRS-3 wants to convert package to M300 then we clearly need to inform customer that in J-300 package, GPRS-3 cannot be availed. If customer wants to have zero line rent GPRS then, with proper customer&rsquo;s consent, we need to provision default GPRSM-300 while changing packaging from J-999 to J-300</li>
	<li>Incase eFront activity cancellation rights are not available with CCRs then we will escalate activity cancellation request to Team Leader via Siebel Escalation activity in eFront</li>
	<li>Add-on can be activated upfront in Siebel any time during billing cycle</li>
	<li>We need to select required package/bundle from list. Mentioning in notes will not activate/deactivate any package/bundle</li>
	<li>Incase customer wants to get multiple actions performed then we need to create separate activity for each action</li>
	<li>Please note that this activity is not for deactivation of Bundles. Incase customer requests for deactivation of a bundle then instructions will be processed directly in Siebel (guide proration impact)</li>
	<li>Incase error received on eFront activity then we will facilitate customers upfront via Siebel and mention &ldquo;Activity error&rdquo; in order notes for reference (for successful activity creation customer must be on Consumer Catalogue with J Series or M Series package)</li>
	<li>Please check Siebel for package/bundle already active. In few cases requests were launched where package/bundle was already active</li>
	<li>In case number is on commercial catalog then customer need to visit office for Change offer via Biometric (under &ldquo;Internal to External&rdquo; on BMD)</li>
	<li>Bundle deactivation request need to be processed upfront (inform about pro-ration impact clearly). Please do not create eFront activity for deactivation</li>
</ol>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Wrong Deduction on Data(Delete)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2><a name="_Toc14170974">Process at Call Center and Communication Unit</a></h2>

<p>Scenario-1: Customer charged on base rate although data service was already inactive:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through above checklist and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Agent to fix mismatch of data service status(active/inactive) between Siebel and HLR
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>Remove the check box of 4G base rate from installed assets tab of Siebel</li>
		<li>Launch OMT activity in eFront for data service deactivation from HLR</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through above checklist and deduction amount is more than or equal to Rs. 100</li>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit Note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; GPRS Overcharging</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Scenairo-2: Customer charged on base rate although free MBs are available (data reservation Issue)</p>

<ul>
	<li>Deduction due to data reservation identified and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Activity to be routed to team leader for approval</li>
	<li>Team leader will approve the activity and posting request will be logged in system</li>
	<li>Auto generated log
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>will be directly populated in bulk posting uploader for posting(or)</li>
		<li>will be shared with Jazz Adjustment Team for Bulk posting via uploader</li>
		<li>&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Deduction due to data reservation identified &amp; deduction amount is more than Rs. 100</li>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit Note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; GPRS Overcharging</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Note:</em></strong><em> Incase no wrong deduction found then guide the customer accordingly and close the call</em></p>

<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

<h2><a name="_Toc14170975">Process at Business Center</a></h2>

<p>Scenario-1: Customer charged on base rate although data service was already inactive:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through above checklist and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Agent to fix mismatch of data service status(active/inactive) between Siebel and HLR
	<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
		<li>Remove the check box of 4G base rate from installed assets tab of Siebel</li>
		<li>Launch OMT activity in eFront for data service deactivation from HLR</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Wrong deduction identified through above checklist and deduction amount is more than or equal to Rs. 100</li>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit Note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; GPRS Overcharging</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Scenairo-2: Customer charged on base rate although free MBs are available (data reservation Issue)</p>

<ul>
	<li>Deduction due to data reservation identified and deduction amount is less than Rs. 100</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Agent to make activity in eFront for amount posting and guide respective TAT to customer</li>
	<li>Activity to be routed to team leader for approval</li>
	<li>Team leader will approve the activity and posting request will be logged in system</li>
	<li>Auto generated log
	<ul style="list-style-type:square">
		<li>will be directly populated in bulk posting uploader for posting(or)</li>
		<li>will be shared with Jazz Adjustment Team for Bulk posting via uploader
		<ol>
			<li>1st option is in review phase</li>
			<li>2nd option is in practice now</li>
		</ol>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Deduction due to data reservation identified &amp; deduction amount is more than Rs. 100</li>
	<li>Agent to create service request by selecting the following options in Siebel
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Type of SR:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Billing Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit Note</li>
		<li>Sub Area:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; GPRS Overcharging</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong><em>Note:</em></strong><em> Incase no wrong deduction found then guide the customer accordingly and close the interaction</em></p>

	</ul>
	</li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Change of Ownership-Postpaid (B2C)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Postpaid customers can get ownership of a number changed to their own through this process</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 33
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Original CNIC, Active sim, Bio-metric verification</li>
	<li>Copy of paid utility bill, NOC signed by first owner</li>
	<li>Both the customers need to be present in the office along with original CNIC / If original customer is not present then his/her NIC and NOC is required</li>
	<li>Security deposit will be required if number was active on wavier</li>
	<li>Bill balance must be cleared</li>
	<li>30 days check for change of ownership after new sale/change of Sim</li>
	<li>There should be no M-Wallet attached against the number</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Change of Ownership is Free of Cost</li>
	<li>COO of other NDC will be processed on business center only</li>
	<li>Other NDC disowned number can be owned at business centers only</li>
	<li>After COO existing waivers will be reverted back and limit will be reassigned as per new deposit</li>
	<li>For cooperate, request on letter head is required</li>
	<li>If original customer is not present, then his/her org CNIC and NOC (with signature &amp; thumb impression) is required.</li>
	<li>For Business Centers: Will follow existing process of documentation, vetting and uploading in CACS</li>
	<li>For Franchise Centers: Existing process will be followed for vetting and take over orders from 1-CAT FSD Team</li>
	<li>TAT for financial movements will also remain same (i.e, 5 working days) for franchise</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Voluntary Blocking (Postpaid/Prepaid)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Custsomers can get their Prepaid/Postpaid numbers blocked on voluntary reasons. This will help customer to retain their number and avoid daily line rent etc.</p>

<p>Detailed Verifications</p>

<ul>
	<li>For Call Center
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Level 3: Name &amp; CNIC + Any one alternate verification
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>Voluntary blocking &ndash; Prepaid
			<ol>
				<li>Balance when SIM was lost</li>
				<li>FNF added</li>
				<li>Offer/Bundle/VAS active on number</li>
				<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
				<li>package plan</li>
				<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
				<li>Note: If customer is calling from Same Account then no alternate verification is required</li>
			</ol>
			</li>
			<li>Voluntary blocking - Postpaid
			<ol>
				<li>We will block number if caller verifies Name + CNIC and any one of the below verification</li>
				<li>Last Invoice Amount</li>
				<li>FNF Added</li>
				<li>VAS Active on Number</li>
				<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
				<li>Package Plan</li>
				<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
				<li>Note: If customer is calling from Same Account then no alternate verification is required</li>
			</ol>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For Business Center
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Original Customer &amp; CNIC</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For Franchise Center</li>
	<li>Original Customer &amp; CNIC</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Valid Calling CLI</li>
	<li>In case VIP TAG is updated then we will take 2 alternate verification along with Level 3</li>
	<li>We need to consult E-front and Subscriber Analysis 2 tab in Siebel. If number is tagged as &ldquo;No Action&rdquo;, we will politely ask the customer to visit main office. We will not take request of blocking/Restoration/Change of Ownership over 111</li>
	<li>Additional verification would be required only if we received call from other numbers</li>
	<li>In case of Prepaid balance availability, customer must be guided to utilized available balance (through balance share/usage etc.)</li>
	<li>Check contract/subscriber level notes for any special instructions</li>
	<li>While blocking any number on voluntary tag, it is mandatory to mention calling CLI in &ldquo;Subscriber Notes&rdquo; at Contract level against blocked number</li>
	<li>For Company numbers customer will be routed to KAM</li>
	<li>Ledger details need to be checked (There should be at least one paid Invoice and 30 days&rsquo; usage)</li>
	<li>Outstanding dues should not exceed the provided Deposit (Credit limit should not be considered)</li>
	<li>For Direct debit cases, outstanding dues clearance is not mandatory</li>
	<li>Deposit Waiver cases customer needs to be guided to clear outstanding dues to process voluntary blocking</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Blocking and Restoration through USSD Code *8822#</li>
	<li>we need to guide USSD *8822# for self-service where customer asking to getting his number blocked from</li>
	<li>helpline/frontend along with Blocking or Restoration from Siebel/TABs.</li>
	<li>it is mandatory to mention verification/notes/CLI in the upper Comments box available at order applet.</li>
	<li>If number is blocked/restored from franchise without any clear notes, then we will consider it level 2/3 blocking/ restoration</li>
	<li>We will not cater Block on Stolen If: Number is on UAO668, Suspended on Deposit Release.</li>
	<li>Retailer Number can be blocked on Stolen over the helpline (111) after Level III verification.</li>
	<li>In case a postpaid number is blocked on reconciliation, we will restore it, after level 3 verification, IF outstanding dues are under defined credit limit.</li>
	<li>At the time of Restoration (from Block on Stolen) we need to verify any one of the additional information as well (it can be other than additional verification provided at the time of blocking)</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 1093

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Voluntary Blocking - Warid (B2C)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Warid
Complaint Description: <p>Warid Postpaid customers can get their number blocked voluntarilty though this process</p>

Submission Channel: ,1056,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <h2><a name="_Toc4354080">Verification</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li>For Call Center
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Level 3: Name &amp; CNIC + Any one alternate verification
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>Voluntary blocking &ndash; Prepaid
			<ol>
				<li>Balance when SIM was lost</li>
				<li>? FNF added</li>
				<li>? Offer/Bundle/VAS active on number</li>
				<li>? Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
				<li>package plan</li>
				<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
				<li>If the calling number and the number which customer requested to block are on same ownership/CNIC then agent will not ask other verification question</li>
			</ol>
			</li>
			<li>Voluntary blocking - Postpaid
			<ol>
				<li>We will block number if caller verifies Name + CNIC and any one of the below verification</li>
				<li>Last Invoice Amount</li>
				<li>FNF Added</li>
				<li>VAS Active on Number</li>
				<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
				<li>Package Plan</li>
				<li>last recharge (as last option)</li>
				<li>If the calling number and the number which customer requested to block are on same ownership/CNIC then agent will not ask other verification question</li>
			</ol>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>For Business Center
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Original Customer &amp; CNIC</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For Franchise Center</li>
	<li>Original Customer &amp; CNIC</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Valid Calling CLI</li>
	<li>In case VIP TAG is updated then we will take 2 alternate verification along with Level 3</li>
	<li>Additional verification would be required only if we received call from other numbers</li>
	<li>In case of Prepaid balance availability, customer must be guided to utilized available balance (through balance share/usage etc.)</li>
	<li>Check contract/subscriber level notes for any special instructions</li>
	<li>While blocking any number on voluntary tag, it is mandatory to mention calling CLI in &ldquo;Subscriber Notes&rdquo; at Contract level against blocked number</li>
	<li>For Company numbers customer will be routed to KAM</li>
	<li>Ledger details need to be checked (There should be at least one paid Invoice and 30 days&rsquo; usage)</li>
	<li>Outstanding dues should not exceed the provided Deposit (Credit limit should not be considered)</li>
	<li>For Direct debit cases, outstanding dues clearance is not mandatory</li>
	<li>Deposit Waiver cases customer needs to be guided to clear outstanding dues to process voluntary blocking</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: MNP Process
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Both
Complaint Description: <h2><a name="_Toc14170975">Process at Business Center</a></h2>

<h3>Prepaid Port IN Process:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>BCE will guide the charges of sending SMS at short code 667 and 76300 i.e. Rs.2+tax/ SMS</li>
	<li>BCE will retrieve customer&rsquo;s information from Donor operator after sending MNP at short code 667 from donor SIM by using customer&rsquo;s Mobile
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer will receive response message from his existing network operator</li>
		<li>Customer will forward 667 SMS information at short code 76300</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>BCE will ask customer for the Biometric verifications</li>
	<li>Following Information will be populated on BMD for BVS through MNP Tab
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>IMSI (New complete SIM number)</li>
		<li>Type: Prepaid/Postpaid (needs to select manually)</li>
		<li>Donor</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon successful Biometric verification Port In In-Order will be auto created in Siebel</li>
	<li>BCE will hand over new Jazz SIM to Customer</li>
	<li>TAT: 4 Working Days</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Postpaid Port IN Process:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>BCE will guide the charges of sending SMS at short code 667 and 76300 i.e. Rs.2+tax/ SMS</li>
	<li>BCE will retrieve customer&rsquo;s information from Donor operator after sending MNP at short code 667 from donor SIM by using customer&rsquo;s Mobile
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer will receive response message from his existing network operator</li>
		<li>Customer will forward 667 SMS information at short code 76300</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>BCE will ask customer for the Biometric verifications</li>
	<li>Following Information will be populated on BMD for BVS through MNP Tab
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>IMSI (New complete SIM number)</li>
		<li>Type: Prepaid/Postpaid (needs to select manually)</li>
		<li>Donor</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon successful Biometric verification BCE will create Port In In-Order in Siebel</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Below is step by step process for entering the Postpaid MNP Sale Orders in Siebel to avoid system error &ldquo; Customer Verification details not found&rdquo;
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Select the Donor and place the Donor IMSI and press Ctrl+S</li>
		<li>Place the MSISDN in the respective field and press Ctrl+S</li>
		<li>Place the SIM number in SIM Input field and press Ctrl+S</li>
		<li>Press MNP Reserve and follow the remaining steps as per guidelines</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>BCE will login .S Power login for Order Approval and Submission</li>
	<li>BCE will hand over new Jazz SIM to Customer</li>
	<li>TAT: 14 Working Days</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: Postpaid (MNP) we will also continue to perform the existing practice of uploading documents(CNIC Copy, eCSAF) in CACS along with number activation in system</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>BCE will guide customer that Postpaid MNP Fee of Rs. 100 will be Invoice on his/ her First Bill</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc14170976">Process at Franchise Center</a></h2>

<h3>Prepaid Port IN Process:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>FCCR will guide the charges of sending SMS at short code 667 and 76300 i.e. Rs.2+tax/ SMS</li>
	<li>FCCR will retrieve customer&rsquo;s information from Donor operator after sending MNP at short code 667 from donor SIM by using customer&rsquo;s Mobile
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">

		<li>Customer will forward 667 SMS information at short code 76300</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	<li>Following Information will be populated on BMD for BVS through MNP Tab
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>IMSI (New complete SIM number)</li>
		<li>Type: Prepaid/Postpaid (needs to select manually)</li>
		<li>Donor</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon successful Biometric verification Port In In-Order will be auto created in Siebel</li>
	<li>FCCR will hand over new Jazz SIM to Customer</li>
	<li>TAT: 4 Working Days</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Postpaid Port IN Process:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>FCCR will guide the charges of sending SMS at short code 667 and 76300 i.e. Rs.2+tax/ SMS</li>
	<li>FCCR will retrieve customer&rsquo;s information from Donor operator after sending MNP at short code 667 from donor SIM by using customer&rsquo;s Mobile
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Customer will receive response message from his existing network operator</li>
		<li>Customer will forward 667 SMS information at short code 76300</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>FCCR will ask customer for the Biometric verifications</li>
	<li>Following Information will be populated on BMD for BVS through MNP Tab
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>CNIC</li>
		<li>MSISDN</li>
		<li>IMSI (New complete SIM number)</li>
		<li>Type: Prepaid/Postpaid (needs to select manually)</li>
		<li>Donor</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon successful Biometric verification FCCR will create Port In In-Order in Siebel</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Below is step by step process for entering the Postpaid MNP Sale Orders in Siebel to avoid system error &ldquo; Customer Verification details not found&rdquo;
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Select the Donor and place the Donor IMSI and press Ctrl+S</li>
		<li>Place the MSISDN in the respective field and press Ctrl+S</li>
		<li>Place the SIM number in SIM Input field and press Ctrl+S</li>
		<li>Press MNP Reserve and follow the remaining steps as per guidelines</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>FCCR will hand over new Jazz SIM to Customer</li>
	<li>TAT: 14 Working Days</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: Postpaid (MNP) we will also continue to perform the existing practice of uploading documents(CNIC Copy, eCSAF) in CACS along with number activation in system</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>FCCR will submit Order for Approval from Sales Approval Team</li>
	<li>FCCR will guide customer that Postpaid MNP Fee of Rs. 100 will be Invoice on his/ her First Bill</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Postpaid MNP &ndash; SAT Team</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will extract the Postpaid MNP work load from Siebel</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will verify Biometric verification status from provided Interface in addition to existing check list (CSAF, security deposit. Limit, CNIC, Billing Address etc.)</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will approve Postpaid MNP sales where the Biometric verification is successful</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will not approve Postpaid MNP orders where Biometric verification is un-successful / not verified</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will share the HOLD cases with respective touch points for corrective measures</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><a name="_Toc14170977">Process at Retailer</a></h2>

<h3>Prepaid Port IN Process:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>BCE will guide the charges of sending SMS at short code 667 and 76300 i.e. Rs.2+tax/ SMS</li>

</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,32,1057,36
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 28,26
Point of Contact: via Contact Center Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Number should be active on</li>
	<li>60 days passed after activation or change of ownership at Donor</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>All documentation check list will remain same till further update for both prepaid &amp; postpaid customers</li>
	<li>BCE/ CCR will confirm if the number has passed the minimum subscription period, In case activation date is less than 60 days old there will be no response from 76300</li>
	<li>After activation</li>
	<li>Last port in</li>
	<li>Customer also needs to forward 667 reply to representative</li>
	<li>667 reply should not be tempered/edited in any way before it is sent to 76300</li>
	<li>NPR should not be initiated in case there is no response from 76300 otherwise it will be deemed as bypassed and request will be rejected by donor</li>
	<li>For prepaid cases, representative will add new SIM number followed by donor name in 76300 message and forward it to 7668 after successful bio metric verification only</li>
	<li>For postpaid port in cases, representative will create Port In order in Siebel according to the exact data received in 667 response after successful Biometric verification</li>
	<li>Send keyword NETWORK &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS</li>
	<li>Send keyword STATUS &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS</li>
	<li>Prepaid MNP is Free of Cost</li>
	<li>TAT will remain same</li>
	<li>Prepaid number will be ported in within 4 working days in case all financials and other obligations are clear at donor end</li>
	<li>Postpaid number will be ported in within 13 working days for NON-IR cases and 18 working days for IR cases</li>
	<li>AJK (Azad Jammu &amp; Kashmir) and GB (Gilgit Baltistan) series numbers couldn&rsquo;t be ported out</li>
	<li>A new check has been implemented over PMD side and if any customer having AJK &amp; GB series numbers tried to send MNP request on 667 (PMD), in return following message will be pushed by PMD. &ldquo;Dear Subscriber, MNP is not allowed against AJK &amp; GB Series Numbers&rdquo;.</li>
	<li>AJK numbers leads go into error after NPR initiation and wastage of SIMs</li>
	<li>If any customer availed handset on installment from Jazz then till installment completion no post to pre, MNP and disowning request would be catered</li>
</ul>

View Type: Franchise
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon successful Biometric verification Port In In-Order will be auto created in Siebel</li>
	<li>BCE will hand over new Jazz SIM to Customer</li>
	<li>TAT: 4 Working Days</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>We will follow existing SIM Delivery via Courier process for MNP)</li>
</ul>

	<li>After activation</li>
	<li>Last port in</li>
	<li>Customer also needs to forward 667 reply to representative</li>
	<li>667 reply should not be tempered/edited in any way before it is sent to 76300</li>
	<li>NPR should not be initiated in case there is no response from 76300 otherwise it will be deemed as bypassed and request will be rejected by donor</li>
	<li>For prepaid cases, representative will add new SIM number followed by donor name in 76300 message and forward it to 7668 after successful bio metric verification only</li>
	<li>For postpaid port in cases, representative will create Port In order in Siebel according to the exact data received in 667 response after successful Biometric verification</li>
	<li>Send keyword NETWORK &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS</li>
	<li>Send keyword STATUS &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS</li>
	<li>Prepaid MNP is Free of Cost</li>
	<li>TAT will remain same</li>
	<li>Prepaid number will be ported in within 4 working days in case all financials and other obligations are clear at donor end</li>
	<li>Postpaid number will be ported in within 13 working days for NON-IR cases and 18 working days for IR cases</li>
	<li>AJK (Azad Jammu &amp; Kashmir) and GB (Gilgit Baltistan) series numbers couldn&rsquo;t be ported out</li>
	<li>A new check has been implemented over PMD side and if any customer having AJK &amp; GB series numbers tried to send MNP request on 667 (PMD), in return following message will be pushed by PMD. &ldquo;Dear Subscriber, MNP is not allowed against AJK &amp; GB Series Numbers&rdquo;.</li>
	<li>AJK numbers leads go into error after NPR initiation and wastage of SIMs</li>
	<li>If any customer availed handset on installment from Jazz then till installment completion no post to pre, MNP and disowning request would be catered</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Live Refund
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2>Process at Call Center</h2>

<p>Agent to launch bill adjustment complaint for the cases using the available check list</p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>SR Type: &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Bill Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refund</li>
		<li>Sub Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment/Deposit</li>
		<li>Refund Type: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Live Refund</li>
		<li>Mention issue detail in Summary field: Live Refund</li>
		<li>Assign: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; N</li>
		<li>Submit the SR</li>
		<li>Change SR status to &ldquo;In Progress&rdquo;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Refund Processing Portal Handling:</strong></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Open Refund processing portal</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Select New Refund Record</li>
	<li>Get data after entering MSISDN</li>
	<li>Updated customer CNIC, SR number, refund of Deposit(Amount) or Refund of Credit(Amount), Total Amount refunded and remarks in Add new Refund Form</li>
	<li>Save Record</li>
	<li>Refund code will be generated i.e. GTI Reference ID
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Go to Refund Record
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>Enter MSISND</li>
			<li>Select Type: Live Refund</li>
			<li>Enter GTI Reference ID</li>
			<li>Print Refund Form</li>
			<li>Get this form signed by customer, Self and Manager and ask customer CNIC copy</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li>Drill down Refund SR
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li>Go to Postpaid Charges</li>
			<li>Click new record</li>
			<li>Enter Target Account&agrave;BAF number(GTI Code)&agrave;Description&agrave;Adjustment Type(Refund)&agrave;Reason(Live Refund)&agrave;Value(Refund Amount)&agrave;Change Status to Approved&agrave;press Post button(Get role changed to SMT TL via Site map&agrave;User Preference before posting)</li>
			<li>Change SR conclusion to &ldquo;Successful&rdquo;</li>
			<li>Close the SR with proper notes</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Cash Delivery:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will refund from Petty Cash available at Business Center and keep refund form and CNIC for record</li>
	<li>For refund amount than 25000 create following SR for process
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>SR Type: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Bill Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refund</li>
		<li>Sub Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Payment/Deposit</li>
		<li>Refund Type: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Live Refund</li>
		<li>Mention issue detail in Summary field: Live Refund</li>
		<li>Assign: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Y</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: FnF Addition of Postpaid Numbers (B2C)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Below guidelines are followed when customer request to add/edit FnF number on postpaid. This request can be entertained at the following touch points</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Contact Center</li>
	<li>Business Center</li>
	<li>Franchise</li>
	<li>Communication Unit</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Customer Calls for postpaid FnF number addition/edit</li>
	<li>CCR will check package plan &amp; available slots</li>
	<li>Agent will create below order for FnF addition or edit</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Level: Account -- Order: Modify -- Type: Friends and Family- Add/Edit &ndash; Done &ndash; Submit</li>
	<li>Before submitting Order, make sure order line items is reflecting &ldquo;Update&rdquo; in action column</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check if customer have following package as Jazz is offering 3 on-net F&amp;F numbers on below postpaid packages only:</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>J-100, J-300, J-600, J-999, J-1500</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>FnF modify option can be done against active or OG blocked postpaid number only</li>
	<li>FnF addition/edit facility is not available for club member or LRD numbers</li>
	<li>If customer has change/edit F&amp;F number within 24 hours, then new change will be applicable after 24 hours of previous change</li>
	<li>FNF number can only be a Jazz number (Other prefix Ported-in)</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>For non club Corporate/SME&#39;s Business Accounts request will be entertained on Company letterhead with relevant information at Business center only</li>
	<li>For Corporate accounts, they will do it as per practice and understanding with the POC of the organization</li>
	<li>Original CNIC is required if customer requests through Business Center/ Franchise Center.</li>
	<li>Same F&amp;F number should not be added again, if already exists in catalogue</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Prepaid IR - Activation/Deactivation(B2C)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: I don't have updated information about this.
Submission Channel: 1044,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Customer wants to activate/deactivate Prepaid IR</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Ask customer destination country</li>
	<li>Activate IR on customer number by creating order using below process</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li>Siebel &agrave; Modify &agrave; Active IR(check box) &agrave; Save &agrave; Enter comments &agrave; Submit Order</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>If customer wants to deactivate IR, then below process will be followed</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li>Siebel &agrave; Modify &agrave; Active IR(Uncheck box) &agrave; Save &agrave; Enter comments &agrave; Submit Order</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>For activation: Number should be active</li>
	<li>For deactivation: check IR is active on customer number</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>GPRS/Data services will not work on IR except KSA (Saudia Ariabia)</li>
	<li>If customer is travelling to KSA and also want IR with DATA, it is mandatory to guide DATA charges on IR</li>
	<li>If customer come back in Pakistan, his GPRS/DATA will be activated automatically no need to activate again (if previously activated)</li>
	<li>Ghanta Offer, LNO offer &amp; Daily SMS bundle package etc (discounted packages) will not be available for use while IR is active.</li>
	<li>If number is not on customer&rsquo;s name and he/she is unable to provide verification, we will guide ownership process (Mobilink NDC only)</li>
	<li>ICS does not work with IR, Auto Reply, My Status Service</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Data Overcharging
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Warid
Complaint Description: <h1>Process at Call Center</h1>

<p><strong>Scenario 1: Overcharging on Data Usage:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Check the data service status, launch complaint if data is active &amp; data sessions are shown in CDRs after deactivation of services</li>
	<li>Check HLR for data status&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Incase data is active on HLR, launch activity for OMT to deactivate data services on HLR</li>
	<li>Agent to launch complaint for the cases where wrong deduction identified using the check list bill adjustment SR will be created
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>SR Type: &nbsp;&nbsp; Bill Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit note</li>
		<li>Sub Area: &nbsp; Postpaid</li>
		<li>Mention issue detail in Summary field</li>
		<li>Assign: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Y</li>
		<li>Submit the SR</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Scenario 2: Delayed/early blocking of data services during incentive usage:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent to launch SR for backend incase expiry of the subscribed offer is not reached (however expiry time is close) but data services are blocked while having sufficient incentive</li>
	<li>Also launch SR where expiry date is far and incentive is available but data services are blocked</li>
	<li>Data incentive completely consumed or expiry of the subscribed bundle is reached but data services not blocked timely
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>SR Type: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Bill Adjustment</li>
		<li>Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Credit note</li>
		<li>Sub Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Postpaid</li>
		<li>Mention issue detail in Summary field</li>
		<li>Assign: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Y</li>
		<li>Submit the SR</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,35,1051,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.

<p>Scenario-1: Data deactive in Siebel but data session shown</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Confirm if data is active or not from assets tab of Siebel</li>
	<li>Confirm date of deactivation of data services from assets tab of Siebel</li>
	<li>Confirm deduction on data services from CDRs (exact amount) to validate the complaint</li>
	<li>Check CDRs for &ldquo;Cost&rdquo; &amp; if cost is other than &ldquo;0.0&rdquo;</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p>Scenario-2: Delayed/early blocking of data services during incentive usage</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Check DCM (clocking ticket &ndash; Data blocking ticket in Siebel/CDRs) &ndash; Data Control Module</li>
	<li>Check incentive end date &amp; time incentive in Postpaid Discount Info tab &amp; compare with DCM ticket</li>
	<li>Check if sufficient data incentive is available &amp; data is blocked (DCM ticket shown)</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Duplicate Bill Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Both
Complaint Description: <table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#e7e6e6; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:192px; vertical-align:top; width:482px">
			<p><strong>Duplicate Bill SR (Jazz)</strong></p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>If customer call for Jazz Duplicate Bill then agent will mention details in relevant fields</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<ol>
				<li><strong>Email address </strong><strong>&agrave;</strong><strong> Summary&nbsp;field</strong></li>
				<li><strong>Account number </strong><strong>&agrave;</strong><strong> Account Number&nbsp;field</strong></li>
				<li><strong>Month </strong><strong>&agrave;</strong><strong> Answer 2&nbsp;field</strong></li>
			</ol>

			<p>( For multiple months enter numeric values with comma separation i.e. 10,11,12 etc. )</p>

			<ol>
				<li><strong>Year </strong><strong>&agrave;</strong><strong>&nbsp;Answer 3&nbsp;field</strong></li>
			</ol>

			<p>( i.e. 2018,2019 etc. )</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<h2>Duplicate Bill is available through USSD Code *8812#.</h2>

<div>
<table align="left">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:top">
			<ul>
				<li>Through registered mobile number customer will dial USSD String *8812# code to get duplicate bill of past 6 months.</li>
				<li>Customer will reply in numeric value for respective month as per requirement of Duplicate bill.</li>
				<li>Only past 6-month duplicate bills can be requested through this USSD.</li>
				<li>After entering the required month through USSD customer will receive SMS with URL to download his duplicate bill. As soon as customer clicks the URL Data charges will apply.</li>
				<li>Incase Duplicate Bill is not available, customer will get intimation SMS.</li>
				<li>Only Jazz Postpaid consumer &amp; business customers can get duplicate bill from this USSD</li>
			</ul>

			<p><strong>USSD Flow:</strong></p>

			<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse">
				<tbody>
					<tr>
						<td style="background-color:#70ad47; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; vertical-align:top; width:178px">
						<p><strong>Step 1: Dial *8812#</strong></p>
						</td>
						<td style="background-color:#70ad47; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; vertical-align:top; width:178px">
						<p><strong>Step 2: Respond by Option</strong></p>
						</td>
						<td style="background-color:#70ad47; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; vertical-align:top; width:252px">
						<p><strong>Step 3: Confirmation response</strong></p>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:178px">
						<p>&nbsp;</p>
						</td>
						<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:178px">
						<p>&nbsp;</p>
						</td>
						<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:252px">
						<p>&nbsp;</p>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</tbody>
			</table>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<ul>
				<li>USSD code will not be dial able from Prepaid Jazz number.</li>
				<li>There will be no charges for duplicate bill however data charges may apply upon downloading bill from URL.</li>
				<li>USSD (*8812#) short Code is free of cost</li>
				<li>OG blocked number can also dial this USSD code however in order to access the URL received over the SMS, customer would be required to have Data services.</li>
				<li>Menu is static and it will give the option of past six months irrespective of tenure of the number.</li>
				<li>Postpaid Port Out Customer will not be able to dial JAZZ USSD code</li>
				<li>If customer has feature phone, duplicate bill URL received over the SMS can be copied and accessed through web browser.</li>
				<li>URL is not password protected.</li>
				<li>Once the link is clicked it will expire. Incase customer wants to get &lsquo;Duplicate Bill&rsquo; again customer needs to dial the code again</li>
				<li>There is no system visibility or tracking available for this USSD against any particular number</li>
				<li>There is no restriction of max attempts against any particular number for this USSD.</li>
				<li>Duplicate Bill cannot be retrieved for the current month.</li>
				<li>Once USSD is dialed, URL is received over the SMS 2-3mins Time delay.</li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
</div>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Process at Business Center</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Duplicate bill portal is available at Business Centers to facilitate customer upfront</li>
	<li>To download the bills from bulk tool, we use to upload &ldquo;csv&rdquo; file in pre-defined format. The format contains four columns with below information. Maximum 200 bills can be download in single file.
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Account number</li>
		<li>Month</li>
		<li>Year</li>
		<li>Last column will remain updated as &ldquo;N&rdquo;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>No heading will be populated in excel file.</li>
	<li>Maximum last 18 month bills can be extracted from the link.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Process at Franchise Center</h2>

<ul>
	<li>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Guide customer to dial helpline or visit nearest Business Center</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

				<li>Bill will be displayed.</li>
			</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Tax Certificate Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Both
Complaint Description: <p>Customers calls over helpline for visit Front-end offices for tax certificate/interim tax issuance. Follow below guidelines to facilitate customers</p>

<p><strong>Note</strong>:&nbsp;<span style="color:#c0392b">Interim Tax Certificate is not available at the moment</span></p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,35
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063
Point of Contact: IT-App. Dev. Team/Finance
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>If customer visit business center then Tax Certificate print will be provided upfront free of cost</p>

<ul>
	<li>Log-on to Tax Issuance Portal</li>
	<li>Enter MSISDN for Prepaid and Accoutn Number for Postpaid number</li>
	<li>Select Fiscal year</li>
	<li>Click Submit</li>
	<li>Tax Certificate will be fetched on screen</li>
	<li>Select to Print and hand-over printed Tax Certificate to customer&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>or convert to PDF for email dispatching on customer provided email address</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note</strong>:&nbsp;<span style="color:#c0392b">Interim Tax Certificate is not available at the moment</span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Attached complaint handling will be used incase of below cases:</p>

<ul>
	<li>MSISDN missing cases</li>
	<li>Wrong Tax Amount/Recharge/Payments</li>
	<li>Name Spell</li>
	<li>Address rectification.</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Tax certificates can be requested for last 5 financial years</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Tax certificates will be issued to customers as per ownership information in our system as of 30th June.</li>
	<li>Customers can also view and download his last 6 year Tax certificate from Jazz WorldApp,&nbsp;and eCare&nbsp;portal under the head of account settings.
	<ul>
		<li>
		<p>For More than 4 years, we will use eFront module to sent tax certificate on customer email address</p>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>On WhatsApp self-services custmer can get last fiscal year tax certificate&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In case the ownership has changed during the fiscal year, tax certificate will be issued to the new customer for full year.</li>
	<li>If customer&rsquo;s address has changed after fiscal year closing, old address will appear in the tax certificate; however customers may request delivery of Tax Certificate on their new address after processing of address change</li>
	<li>In case number is expired or deactivated, tax certificate will be issued provided the customer&rsquo;s information still exists in our system (for full year)</li>
	<li>For Port out numbers Tax Certificate can be taken from main Jazz office only</li>
	<li>Number converted into Postpaid from Prepaid will be issued two Tax certificates (mention in SR notes that both Tax certificates are required)</li>
	<li>Certificate available on commercial web site is for Tax redemption only</li>
	<li>If remarks are updated &ldquo;No data Available&rdquo; then need to check the Fiscal year payment / Card recharge/Top up during fiscal year, instead of making again new request</li>
</ul>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Complaint escalation process for Team Leader(B2C)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer escalation is received given handling will be followed</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1056
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Live call transfer:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront &rarr; Creator &rarr; Live Call Transfer</li>
	<li>Follow-up of an issue:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront &rarr; Creator &rarr; Siebel Escalation</li>
	<li>Follow-up of any unresolved issue: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront &rarr; Creator &rarr; Siebel Escalation-Priority</li>
	<li>Normal callback: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront &rarr; Creator &rarr; Call Back</li>
	<li>Immediate callback: &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; eFront &rarr; Creator &rarr; Call Back-Priority</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check customer complaint history/notes</li>
	<li>Check and investigate customer issue/problem/query</li>
	<li>Check if escalation is valid and routed to correct team lead</li>
	<li>1st attempt to be made within 30 minutes of receiving escalation</li>
	<li>2nd attempt to be made after one hour of 1st attempt and similarly 3rd attempt to be made after 1 hour of 2nd attempt</li>
	<li>TAT: <strong>30 minutes</strong> to be communicated to customer</li>
	<li>Total escalation handling Time: 3 hours with maximum 3 attempts</li>
	<li>For live call transfer, TL will attend the live call and agent transferring the call will make below activity for tracking purpose:</li>
	<li>Below mentioned prefix should be used in every attempt made by supervisor
	<ul>
		<li><strong>CN</strong>: Connected case (For example: &ldquo;CN&rdquo;- called the customer and guided about xyz etc.)</li>
		<li><strong>NOC</strong>: Not connected cases (For example: &ldquo;NOC&rdquo;- number power off and could not contact with customer)</li>
		<li><strong>NCR</strong>: No Contact Required&nbsp;(For example: &ldquo;NCR&rdquo;- if call back is not required about xyz DNB and marketing related cases etc.) incase CCR has mistakenly created <strong>call back activity</strong> instead of siebel escalation.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Following ISMS needs to be sent in all follow-up call attempts with contact is not established:
	<ul>
		<li><strong>&ldquo;</strong>Dear Customer, we are trying to contact you with respect to your complaint/query at 111 helpline, we will call you again. Thank you<strong>&rdquo;</strong>.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Following ISMS needs to be sent while closing the activity if contact is not established even after 3rd attempt:
	<ul>
		<li><strong>&ldquo;</strong>Dear Customer, we are unable to contact you. You are requested to dial 111 for further assistance<strong>&rdquo;.</strong></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>It is also Emphasized that Aa Supervisor end, we expect a &lsquo;Loop Closure&rsquo; approach along with following SOP only. Follow-up will remain open till resolution.</li>
	<li>Please note that any unresolved case is a repeated customer and a negative impact on customer experience</li>
	<li>For repeated/unresolved issues CCR will make <strong>Siebel Escalation Priority</strong>. Moreover, no need to create call back/live call transfer because in siebel escalation priority cases supervisor must callback customer.</li>
	<li>Use of correct and timely ISMS/Web2SMS needs to be practiced</li>
	<li>Follow-up attempts of call backs need to be followed religiously</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Complaint escalation process for Team Leader
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>We will follow below guidelines where call/case need to be escalated to team leader</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1056
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Try to resolve customer issue upfront</li>
	<li>Incase customer insists or agent is unable to facilitate customer upfront then agent will launch below eFornt activity</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Live call transfer:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Live Call Transfer</li>
	<li>Follow-up of an issue:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Siebel Escalation</li>
	<li>Follow-up of any unresolved issue: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Siebel Escalation-Priority</li>
	<li>Normal callback: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Call Back</li>
	<li>Immediate callback: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Call Back-Priority</li>
</ul>

<h3>Team Leaders Escalation Handling:</h3>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>1st attempt to be made within 30 minutes of receiving escalation</li>
	<li>2nd attempt to be made after one hour of 1st attempt and similarly 3rd attempt to be made after 1 hour of 2nd attempt</li>
	<li>TAT: <strong>30 minutes</strong> to be communicated to customer</li>
	<li>Total escalation handling Time: 3 hours with maximum 3 attempts</li>
	<li>Below mentioned prefix should be used in every attempt made by supervisor</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li><strong>CN</strong>: Connected case (For example: &ldquo;CN&rdquo;- called the customer and guided about xyz etc.)</li>
	<li><strong>NOC</strong>: Not connected cases (For example: &ldquo;NOC&rdquo;- number power off and could not contact with customer)</li>
	<li><strong>NCR</strong>: No Contact Required&nbsp;(For example: &ldquo;NCR&rdquo;- if call back is not required about xyz DNB and marketing related cases etc.) incase CCR has mistakenly created <strong>call back activity</strong> instead of siebel escalation.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Following ISMS needs to be sent in all follow-up call attempts with contact is not established:</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&ldquo;</strong>Dear Customer, we are trying to contact you with respect to your complaint/query at 111 helpline, we will call you again. Thank you<strong>&rdquo;</strong>.</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Following ISMS needs to be sent while closing the activity if contact is not established even after 3rd attempt:</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&ldquo;</strong>Dear Customer, we are unable to contact you. You are requested to dial 111 for further assistance<strong>&rdquo;.</strong></p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check customer complaint history/notes</li>
	<li>Check and investigate customer issue/problem/query</li>
	<li>Check if escalation is valid and routed to correct team lead</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>It is also Emphasized that Aa Supervisor end, we expect a &lsquo;Loop Closure&rsquo; approach along with following SOP only. Follow-up will remain open till resolution.</li>
	<li>Please note that any unresolved case is a repeated customer and a negative impact on customer experience</li>
	<li>For repeated/unresolved issues CCR will make <strong>Siebel Escalation Priority</strong>. Moreover, no need to create call back/live call transfer because in siebel escalation priority cases supervisor must callback customer.</li>
	<li>Use of correct and timely ISMS/Web2SMS needs to be practiced</li>
	<li>Follow-up attempts of call backs need to be followed religiously</li>
</ul>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

Frequently Asked Questions: <h2>Complaint Handling</h2>

<ul>

	<li>BCH/MNP helpline agent will launch ticket (TT) that will assign to the vendor</li>
	<li>BCH agent will enter details/reason for SIM not delivered from vendor portal in E-front</li>
	<li>Vendor will identify the actual issue what was the reason for sim not delivered to customer and enter details in the portal</li>

	<li>POC name: Anjum Riaz Abbasi contact number: 3000640494 Email: anjum.abbasi@myrider.pk</li>

</ul>

	<li>Hand-over/send email call details to customers</li>

</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Maximum of 15 days details can be fetched in one time</li>
	<li>Every time we fetch the data (even less than 15 days), Rs 100 will be charged</li>
	<li>Fetching details FOC, is also available (for exceptional cases)</li>
	<li>Charges will remain same for 15 days and below</li>
	<li>We can provide the Call Details of current User only</li>
	<li>If a customer demands for the Call Details of last 60 days of a number which is converted on his name 10 days ago then BCE can&rsquo;t provide him the details of last 60 days but for the last 10 days only</li>
	<li>BCE will take level 3 verification before printing or emailing the details</li>
	<li>BCE must check the last COO date (till last 60 days) as we will provide the details of only current owner</li>
	<li>Logins accessing customer CDR are being maintained under strict supervision for complaint handling</li>
</ul>
