ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Postpaid IR Activation / De-activation(B2C)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Process covers postpaid IR activation from any of the touch points</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ul>
	<li>Customers can also check updated IR tariffs from http://www.jazz.com.pk/postpaid/international-roaming/tariffs/ before going on IR</li>
	<li>If address is found unsatisfactory service will be removed &amp; remarks will be updated in Order Notes (Siebel)</li>
	<li>While guiding charges, we will add terminating fee as well as updated on Mobics for incoming calls</li>
	<li>If the required amount is present in deposit but limit is not enhanced, we can execute the IR along with forwarding credit limit enhancement</li>
	<li>In case of direct debit customer (less than 3 invoices) monitoring will be done as per assigned credit limit</li>
	<li>Incase IR is not activated due to address not verified then customer will be intimated via SMS</li>
	<li>Incase of TAT lapse then we need to escalate cases to Team lead via TL escalation, TL will follow up with CMT through email</li>
	<li>If customer had roamed once outside Pakistan and came back then VAS services can be provided even without deactivating the IR service.</li>
	<li>If IR is activated on postpaid number then customer can activate ICS service as well</li>
	<li>We also need to guide customer incase IR is currently unavailable with specific operator while guiding charges for that operator</li>
	<li>Franchise Staff in case of less than 5 invoices will ask customer to call 111</li>
	<li>International Roaming and Call Conference (MPTY) facilities together Number will be monitored on 70 % credit limit 50% of deposit billing cleared</li>
	<li>We will send below ISMS from eFront, to all customers who inquire about IR or request for activation of IR</li>
	<li>We will only select International Roaming option while using modification against number in Siebel</li>
	<li>We will select IROAM - NODATA option while using modification against number in Siebel</li>
	<li>International Roaming option will be automatically enabled if we will check IROAM &ndash; NO DATA option</li>
	<li>Incase Agent only removes IROM-NO Data product then Normal IR facility shall remain active against it and customer would be charged as per normal Data charges on International Roaming</li>
	<li>Customers can continue using their Data services in Pakistan and once they moves abroad &amp; selects any other operator then Data Services will be automatically deactivated.</li>
	<li>All the subscribers who have activated their IR services are sent for address verification.</li>
	<li>After getting response, action taken for unsatisfactory cases to add number in RM (70% monitoring) and share same accounts to regional collection managers for their knowledge by CNC.</li>
	<li>In parallel of address verification, calls are made on IR with data cases and inform customer about both services and charges if customer agree with both services then ask customer for address for sending letter of IR with data and in case customer ask to activate IR without data then in Siebel IR without data activated.</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <p>Go to Modify Order &rarr; Check relevant option</p>

<ul>
	<li>IF Customers wants to activate International Roaming along with Data services on Roaming the check&nbsp; &ldquo;IROAM &ndash; WithDATA&rdquo;</li>
	<li>IF Customers wants to activate International Roaming only without Data services on Roaming&nbsp; &ldquo;IROAM &ndash; NODATA&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Submit order</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Check Credit Limit (Minimum Rs.5,000 for all packages)</li>
	<li>While forwarding IR activation, we need to educate customers to deactivate Voice mail service/mail box through USSD command ##002# to remove service completely.</li>
	<li>While activating IR on postpaid numbers, it is mandatory to guide customer about data charges along with call/ SMS charges</li>
	<li>Voice discrimination will be regarded in IR Activation requests. For example, if female calls on help line and number is in the name of male, we will not process activation, and vice versa</li>
	<li>Educate customer regarding data services (GPRS) charges on IR as per updated International Roaming tariff sheet on Mobics.</li>
	<li>Also educate customers that smartphone applications can be updated automatically through data services, hence initiating service usage without customer&rsquo;s information. (Customers can switch off option of auto update applications from their smartphones)</li>
	<li>Guide customer that IR data service charges will be higher as compared to normal tariffs, thus increasing total payable bill</li>
</ul>

Category: Both

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Scratch Card Blocking/Replacement Process
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer claim that scratch card is faulty, over scratched or expired and contact Franchise then we will follow below guidelines</p>

<ul>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: ,1067
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Customer will visit franchise center for replacement of voucher</li>
	<li>FCCR will check physical voucher and verify expiry (should not be more than 1 year)</li>
	<li>FCCR will send the voucher ID to FSE (via email) in order to check status of voucher from Siebel and blocking entry in eFront</li>
	<li>FCCR will return the voucher to customer and guide to come back <strong>after 2 working days </strong>with voucher</li>
	<li>Voucher will be blocked as per existing process at NMT</li>
	<li>Once voucher is blocked (confrimation received from FSE) and customer is present for collection, FCCR will replace customers voucher with existing inventory of same denomination and collect the damaged voucher from customer</li>
	<li>FCCR will only give the replacement to the customer after 2 working days and when email received from FSE with blocking confirmation</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>FCCR to get the old voucher from customer on providing replacement</li>
	<li>FCCR will send data to FSE in below format</li>
</ul>

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:831px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#f8cbad; border-bottom:1px solid #c65911; border-left:1px solid #c65911; border-right:1px solid #c65911; border-top:1px solid #c65911; height:22px; vertical-align:bottom; width:103px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="line-height:105%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Customer MSISDN</span></span></span></span></p>

	</li>

	</li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Complaint escalation process for Team Leader(TL)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Below guidelines are followed when complaint is escalated to contact center team leader. This request can be entertained only at contact center</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1056
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Try to resolve customer issue upfront</li>
	<li>Incase customer insists or agent is unable to facilitate customer upfront then agent will launch below eFornt activity</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Live call transfer:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Live Call Transfer</li>
	<li>Follow-up of an issue:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Siebel Escalation</li>
	<li>Follow-up of any unresolved issue: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Siebel Escalation-Priority</li>
	<li>Normal callback: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Call Back</li>
	<li>Immediate callback: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eFront&rarr;Creator&rarr;Call Back-Priority</li>
</ul>

<h3>Team Leaders Escalation Handling:</h3>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>1st attempt to be made within 30 minutes of receiving escalation</li>
	<li>2nd attempt to be made after one hour of 1st attempt and similarly 3rd attempt to be made after 1 hour of 2nd attempt</li>
	<li>TAT: <strong>30 minutes</strong> to be communicated to customer</li>
	<li>Total escalation handling Time: 3 hours with maximum 3 attempts</li>
	<li>Below mentioned prefix should be used in every attempt made by supervisor</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li><strong>CN</strong>: Connected case (For example: &ldquo;CN&rdquo;- called the customer and guided about xyz etc.)</li>
	<li><strong>NOC</strong>: Not connected cases (For example: &ldquo;NOC&rdquo;- number power off and could not contact with customer)</li>
	<li><strong>NCR</strong>: No Contact Required&nbsp;(For example: &ldquo;NCR&rdquo;- if call back is not required about xyz DNB and marketing related cases etc.) incase CCR has mistakenly created <strong>call back activity</strong> instead of siebel escalation.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Following ISMS needs to be sent in all follow-up call attempts with contact is not established:</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&ldquo;</strong>Dear Customer, we are trying to contact you with respect to your complaint/query at 111 helpline, we will call you again. Thank you<strong>&rdquo;</strong>.</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Following ISMS needs to be sent while closing the activity if contact is not established even after 3rd attempt:</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>&ldquo;</strong>Dear Customer, we are unable to contact you. You are requested to dial 111 for further assistance<strong>&rdquo;.</strong></p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check customer complaint history/notes</li>
	<li>Check and investigate customer issue/problem/query</li>
	<li>Check if escalation is valid and routed to correct team lead</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>It is also Emphasized that Aa Supervisor end, we expect a &lsquo;Loop Closure&rsquo; approach along with following SOP only. Follow-up will remain open till resolution.</li>
	<li>Please note that any unresolved case is a repeated customer and a negative impact on customer experience</li>
	<li>For repeated/unresolved issues CCR will make <strong>Siebel Escalation Priority</strong>. Moreover, no need to create call back/live call transfer because in siebel escalation priority cases supervisor must callback customer.</li>
	<li>Use of correct and timely ISMS/Web2SMS needs to be practiced</li>
	<li>Follow-up attempts of call backs need to be followed religiously</li>
</ul>

<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Possible Churn â€“ Postpaid / Prepaid(HV)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Cases where customer contact any of the touch points &amp; threats to churn due to any reason.</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1056,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>If customer is dissatisfied due to product / service charges, identify customer need &amp; facilitate customer accordingly</li>
	<li>If customer threats to churn due to services e.g. network, deduction, service act/deact, create the relevant task/SR/activity for relevant guide while mentioning &ldquo;PC&rdquo; for &ldquo;Possible Churn&rdquo; in Summary field</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Where Postpaid customer Or mass/HV segment Prepaid customer threatens to leave JAZZ, due to dissatisfaction of Jazz services or any other complaint (for example network /billing /prepaid deduction complaint), we will launch relevant SR with respect to the complaint customer is facing by mentioning PC in Summary and will not create a separate SR.</li>
	<li>If customer is dissatisfied due to product / service charges, identify customer need &amp; facilitate customer accordingly</li>
	<li>If customer threats to churn due to services e.g. network, deduction, service act/deact, create the relevant task/SR/activity for relevant guide while mentioning &ldquo;PC&rdquo; for &ldquo;Possible Churn&rdquo; in Summary field</li>
	<li>Before creating any SR/activity need to check last SR/activity &amp; its status.</li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Declined Direct Debit Transactions
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer is facing blocking issue due to declined direct debit Transactions then we will follow below guidelines.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>Type of SR: Account Administration &rarr; Invoice Profile &rarr; Payment Method</li>
	<li>Owner: Dummy_EMP_100 (C&amp;C - Direct Debit Team)</li>
	<li>Verification level: 2 (Same CLI is mandatory)</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Incase direct debit transaction is declined by customer&rsquo;s bank. Alternatively, C&amp;C link is being used by C&amp;C team to update status against declined DD transactions. Please refer &ldquo;DD Log&rdquo; in CNC link under the head of &ldquo;Reports&rdquo; for Declined Transaction visibility.</li>
	<li>PFB the common responses updated in &ldquo;DD log&rdquo; and required action to be taken against these numbers.</li>
</ul>

<h2>Responses Checklist Required Action</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Invalid Card Number Verify credit card number through last 4 digits and expiry Guide customer to contact respective bank if card number and expiry is correct</li>
	<li>INV Account NBR If there is an issue of expiry or new credit card information needs to be updated, we will forward the relevant SR</li>
	<li>INV Issue R
	<ol>
		<li>Call Bank - We will guide the customer to contact the respective Bank</li>
		<li>Insufficient Fund</li>
	</ol>
	</li>
	<li>Over limit AMBS</li>
	<li>INV Exp Date/Expired - Verify credit card expiry date We will forward the relevant SR to update expiry</li>
	<li>Card Inactive - Request customer to get the credit card activated from respective bank</li>
	<li>Do Not Honor - Verify credit card number and expiry If there is an issue of expiry or new credit card information needs to be updated, we will forward the relevant SR</li>
	<li>Refer to Card Issue R</li>
	<li>Single Susp AMT</li>
	<li>System Error</li>
	<li>TX Not Permitted to Iss - If card number and expiry is correct then route customer to respective bank</li>
	<li>XDays Delq AMT</li>
	<li>Not Authorized</li>
	<li>Not debited</li>
	<li>Blocked Credit Card - Verify credit card number through last 4 digits and expiry If new credit card information is required to be updated then relevant SR will be forwarded.</li>
	<li>We will ask customer to contact respective bank if there is no issue with card number and expiry</li>
</ul>

<p>If a number is Suspended due to blocked credit card and customer claims that there is no issue at bank&rsquo;s end. We will guide customer to pay existing bill through Cash or Credit Card and regular bill charging through credit card will be started from next bill day. We will not forward any complaint in this scenario</p>

<ul>
	<li>Payment mode will be changed to direct debit &amp; New credit card number updation will be processed within 4 business days of the request received at Service Centers/Franchise</li>
	<li>TAT for Mandate form dispatch &amp; credit card expiry date update is 3 Business days</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul style="margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px">
	<li>DD Customers are contacted by CRM Team one month prior to the credit card expiry in order to minimize declined cases for DD transactions</li>
	<li>Successful DD transaction can be checked in Ledger Details.</li>
	<li>C&amp;C team also intimates customer via sms/call if there is any issue reported on customer&rsquo;s credit card.</li>
	<li>Payment is charged from customer&rsquo;s account maximum in 6 business days after bill generation</li>
	<li>Following Service Request is to be forwarded for Change of Payment Mode related cases:</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid

			<p><strong>DO Handling</strong></p>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:#c00000; border-bottom:4px solid white; border-left:none; border-right:4px solid white; border-top:4px solid white; height:33px; width:444px">
			<p><strong>Retailer Handling</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#f7caac; border-bottom:4px solid white; border-left:4px solid white; border-right:4px solid white; border-top:none; height:174px; vertical-align:top; width:481px">
			<p><strong>Process flow for DO</strong></p>

			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<ul>
				<li>If DO call on 1344 helpline for retailer number restoration/blocking between <strong>9AM-6PM</strong></li>
				<li>Agent didn&rsquo;t entertain DO request form helpline between <strong>9AM-6PM</strong></li>
				<li>1344 agent poiletly route <strong>DO</strong> to relvant franchise for restoration/blocking of number</li>
				<li>After <strong>6PM </strong>agent will follow current SOP &nbsp;for blocking/restoration of number</li>
				<li>Agent will also send ISMS along with routing customer<strong>Process flow for Retailer</strong></li>
			</ul>
			</td>
			<td style="background-color:#f7caac; border-bottom:4px solid white; border-left:none; border-right:4px solid white; border-top:none; height:174px; vertical-align:top; width:444px">
			<p>&nbsp;</p>

			<ul>
				<li>If retailer call on 1344 helpline for blocking/restoration of his number due to loss SIM/handset</li>
				<li>&nbsp;As per current <strong>SOP</strong> &nbsp;agent block/restore retailer number after verification</li>
			</ul>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>It is mandatory to mention Care of Care of Calling CLI in blocking order notes.</li>
	<li>Only &ldquo;Stolen&rdquo; reason should be selected while suspending bundle</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 3141

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: JazzLoad MPIN Reset(Retailer)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Retailer/DO can call over 1344 helpline to get their own or their respective retailer&#39;s PIN reset. We will verify if caller is retailer or DO/Master line and follow guidelines mentioned below</p>

Submission Channel: 1046
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 3066
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <h2><a name="_Toc15552444">Process at Call Center </a></h2>

<ul>
	<li><a name="_Hlk15552256">Verify if caller is retailer or DO/Master line</a></li>
	<li>Confirm hierarchy level for DO/Master line and L2 verification for Retailer</li>
	<li>If retailer calls:
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Verify as L2 as per EVC</li>
		<li>If verification failed and retailer falls under L0 or L1, guide retailer to change MPIN through self service and do not process request through system</li>
		<li>If verified as L2, process MPIN change request through following task creation</li>
		<li><a name="_Hlk15552163">Mobile Money Tab</a>&agrave; Search TAB&agrave; Organization Operator&agrave; Operator&nbsp; ID Retailer Number&agrave;Reset MPIN</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If DO/master line calls:
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Verify hierarchy level</li>
		<li>If hierarchy level does not match, reject request and inform DO/master line of incorrect hierarchy level match</li>
		<li>If hierarchy level verified, process MPIN change request through following task creation</li>
		<li>Mobile Money Tab&agrave; Search TAB&agrave; Organization Operator&agrave; Operator&nbsp; ID Retailer Number&agrave;Reset MPIN</li>
		<li>Additional note to be added: Care OF DO line/Master Line</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <h2><a name="_Toc15552441">Verification</a></h2>

<ul>
	<li><a name="_Hlk15551131">For retailer:</a></li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Owner&rsquo;s Name</li>
	<li>Shop Name</li>
	<li>Franchise ID</li>
	<li>Shop Address</li>
	<li><a name="_Hlk15551560">DO line number </a></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>For DO/Master Line</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li>Hierarchy level</li>
</ul>

<h2><a name="_Toc3577879">Process at ICRM- CNC </a></h2>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>All credit limits are enhanced in Siebel through Service Request under different categories. These requests are classified into different categories:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Activity Types</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>Siebel Activities.</li>
	<li>As Per Deposit Requests (APD)</li>
	<li>W/off &amp; Deprel.</li>
	<li>Waiver Code Updation.</li>
	<li>Mobile Number Portability (MNP).</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Request Initiated</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Requests are received from different touch points such as:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>Business Centers.</li>
	<li>Contact Centers.</li>
	<li>Sales Channels.</li>
	<li>Employee Reference/PG portal.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Minimum Credit Limits - Waiver</strong></li>
</ol>

			</td>
		</tr>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="background-color:#cc0000; border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; vertical-align:top; width:631px">
			<ol>
				<li><strong>Enforcement</strong></li>
			</ol>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Siebel Activities </strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>All limit enhancement service requests are routed on Credit operations&rsquo; login i.e. DUMMY_EMP_28. And if we receive business number SR on DUMMY_EMP_28 we route SR to DUMMY_EMP_227 with notes &ldquo;Dear Team, please cater &ldquo;</li>
	<li>No action will be taken on Employee package credit limit Srs by ICRM team&nbsp;</li>
	<li>CSR creates service request in Siebel for credit limit enhancement or reduction.</li>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS extracts service requests from Siebel and data is allocated to the team members for processing.</li>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS evaluates the number for limit enhancement as per the requirement.</li>
	<li>Limit is updated in the Siebel and Service request is closed.</li>
	<li>Rejected cases are closed by adding remarks in SR and inform customer SMS send through CACS.</li>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS member may grant additional limit up to 50K. For any further additional limit, Line Manager&rsquo;s approval is needed.</li>
	<li>In case of multiple subscribers in one account, CREDIT OPERATIONS will evaluate the new credit limit as per the access levels and package plans of the subscribers.</li>
	<li>In case of email request, total mail is pasted in the SR number.</li>
	<li>Error cases are highlighted to the concern.</li>
	<li>Ex PMCL package numbers are treated as per normal commercial package.</li>
	<li>Customer average billing and related accounts are checked.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Evaluation Criteria</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>All customers&rsquo; requests are routed to CREDIT OPERATIONS Siebel ID.</li>
	<li>Credit limit of individual (Non-Club account) may be enhanced, as per the request keeping in view its credit history.</li>
	<li>Customer is evaluated for the said credit limit as per his/her usage.</li>
	<li>Customer history is checked customer must not have unpaid blocking with ageing amount.</li>
	<li>Related numbers are checked through CNIC and customer must not have related suspended numbers with ageing balance &amp; W/off amount</li>
	<li>If a customer has a good credit history of the said account and having old related / woff amount, then customer can be facilitated up to some extent.</li>
	<li>Previous Credit Limit (CL) Enhancement SRs are checked.&nbsp; Customer must not be a habitual for extending his CL without usage</li>
	<li>Credit limit of new customer is not enhanced before 3 months of good credit history.</li>
	<li>Limit will only be enhanced, if customer is paying his bill regularly with no related defaulted account.</li>
	<li>Keeping in view the customer&rsquo;s history, CREDIT OPERATIONS may ask for some partial deposit as per the required credit limit.</li>
	<li>Partial deposit may also be asked where customer age is less than 3 months.</li>
	<li>The credit limit required for NBC is 4k at the deposit of 5k.&nbsp; If the deposit is less than 5k, then the number is reported to concern for the required action.</li>
	<li>The credit limit is also enhanced on special requests.&nbsp; Those are the requests received from other departments (Managers, Directors, VP, CA) as well as Personal Guarantee.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>The credit limits for Official / Employee packages are catered by OPM Team.&nbsp; SRs are intimated through auto process from CREDIT OPERATIONS module.</li>
	<li>Limits of Franchise numbers would be enhanced as per the advice of &ldquo;Commercial Operations Team ISB&rdquo; (detail mentioned below).</li>
	<li>Credit limit of write-off cases can also be enhanced as per usage once the write-off amount is cleared as per w/off policy.</li>
	<li>Ledger is checked to verify the Deprel &amp; W/off status. &nbsp;Deposit must be paid and w/off must be cleared in such scenarios.</li>
	<li>If the customer asks for the limit enhancement where account is already Deprel or Write-off, then the number is initiated to the person who restored it.</li>
	<li>Limit is reverted if number is reported in deposit cheque rejection.</li>
	<li>In case of a new sale with temporary waiver code, If initial deposit is paid with delay then the limit is not additionally enhanced. &nbsp;The limit will remain the same as per the initial deposit.</li>
	<li>Rejected SRs are closed with rejected reason and same SMS to customer through CACS ( Blocking intimation)</li>
	<li>All B2B and Club customer&rsquo;s requests are routed to B2B Operations Team ID &ldquo;Dummy_Emp_227&rdquo;.</li>
	<li>PG will be removed by the CE-development team.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>As Per Deposit</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>In some cases customer pays additional or new deposit in his/her account but CSR does not create its credit limit enhancement SR in Siebel. &nbsp;Such cases are catered in this type:</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>Data is auto-allocated in QAS module for processing.</li>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS creates service request in Siebel for credit limit enhancement and then process it with new credit limit and also enters the notes.</li>
	<li>Limits are enhanced as per the additional paid deposit.</li>
	<li>If number is restored from Deprel / Write-off reason with insufficient paid deposit then CREDIT OPERATIONS will initiate the case to the concern for additional deposit</li>
	<li>Complete notes will be entered in the same number.</li>
	<li>If number is resumed from Write-off reason and the customer has paid the full deposit as per the package plan but has not cleared the write-off amount, then CREDIT OPERATIONS will initiate the case to the concerned for additional payment for Write-off adjustment.</li>
	<li>Credit limit of the numbers activated with temporary waiver codes are not enhanced until the additional deposit is paid.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Waiver Code Updation</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS team has rights to update the security waiver code issued by FPU.</li>
	<li>SR is created in Siebel to update the correct waiver code.</li>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS team extracts the data from Siebel and update correct waiver code in Siebel.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Port Out Cases</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>CREDIT OPERATIONS also deals with the MNP Port Out numbers. &nbsp;Its purpose is to save any kind of exposure to the company; as a result, customer may port out without any balance left behind.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>Data is auto-allocated in CREDIT OPERATIONS module.</li>
	<li>Credit limit of the subscriber is reduced to 60% of its deposit, as port out is initiated.</li>
	<li>New credit limit is reported to CREDIT OPERATIONS in the daily data.</li>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS also downgrades the assess level to NWD if ISD/IR is already active.</li>
	<li>Limit is reverted back to the previous, if Port Out request is rejected.</li>
	<li>CREDIT OPERATIONS team creates service request in Siebel and enhances the credit limit.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Division</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Credit Limit Reduction</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>CREDIT OPERATIONS also reduces the credit limit as per the customer request. &nbsp;These requests come from different touch points. &nbsp;Subscribers are checked manually in the Siebel to ensure that the credit limit reduction requests for all multiple subscribers under single account have sufficient limit after reduction as per package plans &amp; access level.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Approval Authorities</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>Limit up to 50K can be assigned by the designated CRM staff, keeping in view all the company policies.</li>
	<li>In case of Demo and other franchise numbers, 3k limit is approved by default and in case of more additional limit, more deposit will be needed.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Regional CRM Managers approval is obtained for beyond CREDIT OPERATIONS jurisdiction.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Limit Enhancement On PG</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>Few special requests are also received through PG Portal, regarding the credit &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; limit enhancements which are catered on case to case basis.</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Actions To Measure Operations</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Regular monitoring of daily/weekly/monthly operations.</li>
	<li>System reconciliations (not in practice due to non-availability of Siebel Data).</li>
	<li>Audit activity carried out on regular basis for corrective measures.</li>
	<li>Regular performance reports.</li>
	<li>Data is prioritized as follows:</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li>
	<ol>
		<li>Siebel.</li>
		<li>Write-off.</li>
		<li>Deprel.</li>
		<li>Deposit Vs Limit.</li>
		<li>PP Vs Limit.</li>
		<li>Change in PP.</li>
	</ol>
	</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>In case Of Non-Execution Of Any Activity Or Report</strong></li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Intimation to stakeholders regarding issues with respective time frame to reprocess and steps taken &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for non-occurrence.</li>
	<li>Process reviews and re-engineering, in case of failure of process.</li>
	<li>Disciplinary actions.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: SIM Replacement Guidelines
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h1><strong>Experience Centre:</strong></h1>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Scenario: Without Letter head/Number is on same visiting users&rsquo; name</strong></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:square">
	<li>Business customer visits Experience Center for SIM replacement without Letter head</li>
	<li><strong>CCR will ask for the original CNIC to verify the contact details in case there is no formal letter head available ( exceptional support)</strong></li>
	<li>CCR will verify either Number contact belongs to same walk In customer OR Customer claim that belongs to same company/ Organization</li>
	<li>CCR will execute change of SIM upfront and guide the customer accordingly.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Scenario: With Letter Head request</strong></p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; Business customer visits Experience Center for SIM replacement with Letter head request</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CCR will verify either Number contact belongs to same walk In customer OR not and customer claim that belongs to same company / Organization (as per letter head)</p>

<p>&sect;&nbsp; CCR will create service request in Siebel with following mandatory details with the scanned copies of CNIC</p>

<p>and&nbsp; Letter head for validation &amp; Order execution;</p>

<ul>
	<li>General Request &agrave;Postpaid &agrave;BSD &agrave;</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>Sale Request Type:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Offer Activation&nbsp; -mandatory</li>
	<li>Location of Customer:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Franchise ID with city name &ndash; mandatory</li>
	<li>Other Contact Number:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 0301XXX2323 &ndash; mandatory</li>
	<li>Description:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SIM Change Request, scanned copy of CNIC &amp;&nbsp; Letter head attached&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (use standard remarks of SIM Change)</li>
	<li>Summary:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; SIM Num.&nbsp; 899230008134336316&nbsp; (Complete SIM number will be provided)</li>
	<li>Auto owner:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Dummy_emp_222</li>
	<li>Team&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; BSD CAT &ndash; CSR</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Ownership B2I & Internal to Commercial Conversion
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2>Process at Call Center and Communication Unit</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to visit nearest experience center</li>
</ul>

<h3>&nbsp;</h3>

<h2>Process at Business Center</h2>

<p><strong>A &ldquo;B2B verified&rdquo; customer visit Business center and ask for conversion from Company to Individual</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>BCE will ask customer to clear outstanding dues for number activation and conversion as Individual</li>
	<li>BCE will check all necessary documents i.e. NOC, CSAF &amp; CNIC (both sides)</li>
	<li>BCE will send an email by attaching scanned copy of CNIC &amp; company letter head duly signed by SPOC to BSD for seeking approval</li>
	<li>Email will be sent at BSD-CentralizedActivationTeam@mobilink.net.pk alias with suggested Subject &ldquo;B2I Approval&rdquo;</li>
	<li>After vetting, BSD will reply back the sender with Approval or Not Approval comments within 15 minutes</li>
	<li>Once a confirmation email received from BSD end; BCE will then create Change Offer Order for Business to Individual (B2I)</li>
	<li>BCE will upload the documents in CACS for approval of Change Offer Orders by BCM/TL</li>
	<li>Business Catalogue approval rights are assigned to BCM/TL for upfront Order approval</li>
	<li>After successful order approval, BCE will then perform the Biometric Verification</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Process at Franchise Center</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to visit nearest experience center</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>
	<p>Biometric Verifications</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>A &ldquo;B2B verified&rdquo; customer will visit Business center and ask for conversion from Company to Individual</p>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>BCE will also ensure to send relevant SRs for Transfer of Security Deposit and Transfer of Outstanding (if any) to concerned team for movement as per existing process</li>
	<li>There is no change in the Business To Individual conversion of &ldquo;B2B not verified&rdquo; cases (they will be catered just like a normal One Sided change of ownership case)</li>
	<li>In case a number is suspended on B2B Not Verified reason then already shared process for &ldquo;B2B Not Verified&rdquo; numbers will be followed</li>
	<li>we will use the &ldquo;Postpaid COO Tab&rdquo; to capture the Biometric Verification before Order creation</li>
	<li>BVS time stamp needs to be captured &amp; Change offer order needs to be completed on same day</li>
	<li>BVS timestamp will be updated in CRM through backend process at same day midnight</li>
	<li>BVS time stamp will be updated only against those MSISDNs whose Change Offer Order will be completed on same day ( In case of order failure or pending issue, please coordinate with CC-Operations Team to treat these cases on priority otherwise all such numbers be blocked by midnight)</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Manual Take Over Prepaid
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Customer wanted to convert a number on his/her name which belongs to his/her immediate family friends &amp; physical sim is not available due to any reason</p>

<ul>
	<li>Scenario-1:&nbsp;Death of original owner &amp; ownership transfer to any immediate family member</li>
	<li>Scenario-2: Owner is abroad &amp; Sim Lost, owner wanted to use the sim</li>
	<li>Scenario-3: Owner is abroad, Sim lost, owner wanted to transfer the ownership on to his/her friend &amp; family name for future use</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 27,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 21,28
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <h2>Process at Business Center</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Send all related documents to TL via email for vetting and manual COO processing</li>
	<li>TL will verify documents and process manual take over order in SIEBEL</li>
	<li>Manual take over order executed &amp; completed in SIEBEL</li>
	<li>TL will route the customer back to the same agent to perform CHIMSI</li>
	<li>TL will upload documents in CACS for record purpose</li>
	<li>Agent will perform CHIMSI in BVS and hand over to the sim to the customer</li>
	<li>Order will be completed in SIEBEL</li>
	<li>Manual Take Over Order from Siebel</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <h2>Verification</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Old owner verification</li>
	<li>Death Certificate</li>
	<li>OLD owner NOC &amp; original CNIC color copy (in case of living)</li>
	<li>Old owner passport &amp; valid visa (in case of original owner outside country)</li>
	<li>Successful Biometric verification of new owner</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Incase JazzCash account is NOT available on Number:</strong></p>

<ol>
	<li>Only immediate family member can get the duplicate SIM after getting ownership transferred
	<ol>
		<li>Original family registration certificate (FRC) need to be presented to verify family tree</li>
		<li>NOC/Affidavit by other family members in favor of transferee</li>
		<li>Original CNIC of deceased</li>
		<li>Original CNIC of transferee</li>
		<li>Business Center Manager/Team leader will scan and upload document in FPU portal</li>
	</ol>
	</li>
	<li>Death certificate shall be obtained/scanned and retained for life
	<ol>
		<li>Business Center Manager/Team leader will scan and upload document in FPU portal</li>
	</ol>
	</li>
	<li>Possession of SIM must be ensured
	<ol>
		<li>Optional in case of accidental death</li>
	</ol>
	</li>
	<li>Check last recharge/last call history</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Incase JazzCash account is available on Number:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Before proceeding for change of ownership, please get JazzCash account closed (as per JazzCash account closure process)</li>
</ul>

<p>Once JazzCash account is closed then change of ownership will be processed as per revised process mentioned above</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Checklist</h2>

<h3>Scenerio-1: Death of original owner &amp; ownership transfer to any immediate family member</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Verify documents (original death certificate, inheritance certificate, original CNIC)</li>
</ul>

<h3>Scenerio-3: Owner is abroad, Sim lost, owner wanted to transfer the ownership on to his/her friend &amp; family name for future use</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Verify documents (NOC from original customer, original CNIC)</li>
	<li>Verify 5N check on new owner&rsquo;s CNIC</li>
	<li>Customer who wanted to transfer ownership on his/her name will visit office with his original CNIC</li>
	<li>Agent will check new sale and Change of SIM 30 days check</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>It is mandatory to full fill require documentation where we are processing manual take over prepaid due to any reason (deceased, overseas and medical grounds) for customers as per regulatory requirement.</li>
	<li>Please note that manual take over can process through business centers only and process is applicable for all the cases regardless the transferee have the active SIM with him or not</li>
	<li>This option should be used for exceptional and urgent cases</li>
	<li>Manual take over can only be processed by BCM or TL in case of BCM absence</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <h3>Deceased Customers:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Copy of CNIC of transferee and original CNICs should be seen</li>
	<li>Death certificate from NADRA (Copy retained with original seen stamp)</li>
	<li>NOC/affidavit from transferee mentioning that Jazz will block the SIM in case any other person / family member claimed the ownership of number till the time dispute regarding number ownership is resolved between them</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h3>Overseas Customers:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Passport Copy / VISA Copy</li>
	<li>Authority letter from overseas customer authorizing any other person to initiate change of ownership on his behalf</li>
	<li>Copy of CNICs of overseas customer and other person who was authorized by overseas customer</li>
	<li>Signatures of original/overseas customer should be same on both authority letter and CNIC. Furthermore</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h3>Medical Reasons:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>Copies of CNIC and original CNIC should be seen</li>
	<li>Authority letter / NOC from original owner, authorizing any other person to initiate change of ownership on his behalf along with his CNIC copy</li>
	<li>Signatures of original customer should be same on both authority letter and CNIC. Furthermore</li>
</ul>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 3154

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Restoration on Commitment Guidelines
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h2>ROC Service Mechanics:</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Jazz Postpaid customer can dial *6767# USSD string free of cost to restore number on commitment</li>
	<li>Warid Postpaid customer can dial *147*1# string free of cost to restore number on commitment</li>
	<li>All consumers (individual customers) of any segment are eligible to avail ROC</li>
	<li>Business, Club and Non-Commercial Packages (Dealer, Employee, Official, Testing, Official Special, NBC, Call and Control, Official Dealer) are not eligible to avail this facility</li>
	<li>Customer cannot avail this facility if 100% Payment is not made against latest cheque rejected in last 30 days</li>
	<li>Dormant is eligible to take self-restoration facility at least 1 time in a month</li>
	<li>Jazz Out bound roamers will not be eligible for ROC</li>
	<li>Postpaid Bill Payment Options: Dear Customer, You can pay your bill through Scratch card, Jazz load, Jazz Cash, Online Banking, by ATM, e-Care &amp; at any nearest Jazz office. Thank You</li>
	<li>Postpaid USSD Bill Payment: Dear Customer, Please type *123* 14 Digit Scratch Code# on your mobile screen &amp; dial to pay your Bill. For queries call 111</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32,33
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,35
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <h2>Process at Call Center and Communication Unit</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to dial *6767# or if limit reached then make payment</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<h2><span style="color:#000119">Process at Business Center</span></h2>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to dial *6767# or if limit reached then make payment</li>
</ul>

<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

<h2>Process at Franchise Center</h2>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to dial *6767# or if limit reached then make payment</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Do not restoration on commitment (ROC) over the helpline (Jazz/Warid) even through TL escalation. If customer calls over the helpline regarding restoration on commitment then we need to handle as per below mentioned mandatory guidelines and steps</li>
</ul>

<p>Step 1:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Check blocking reason from system because customer is eligible for restoration through USSD if number was blocked on exceed Limit/Unpaid Bill</li>
</ul>

<p>Step 2:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Check E-front for Credit limit enhancement (CLE) status. If customer is eligible for CLE then we need to process credit limit enhancement (CLE) request without deposit
	<ul>
		<li>SR Type: Account Administration (smart script) -- Area: Credit Profile -- Sub Area: Postpaid</li>
		<li>TAT: 1 hour
		<ul>
			<li><strong>Note: Please consult &quot;Credit Limit Enhancement&quot; process for details</strong></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If not eligible then suggest the customer to increase the credit limit to avoid blocking of number by paying some security deposit in any nearest jazz office</li>
</ul>

<p>Step 3:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Need to consult system (E-front/Siebel/Tabs) to check either customer is eligible for ROC or not. If customer is not eligible then we need to guide him complete details e.g. no of attempts and %age of limit exceeded as per credit limit</li>
</ul>

<p>Step 4:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Need to guide customer alternate all channels/methods for bill payment (Scratch Card, Jazz Load, Jazz Cash, Online Banking, ATM and Jazz Office) and send below mentioned i-SMS for payment procedure and options</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C

Complaint Description: <p>Prepaid and Postpaid customers can get activate/deactivate call conference service from helpline. Below are the guidelines</p>

<ul>
	<li>MPTY Activation - Prepaid: *188#</li>
	<li>MPTY Deactivation - Prepaid: *188*1#</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>For Prepaid MPTY activation/deactivation, if customer contact then we will offer our services first&nbsp; by activating via Modify Order upfront</li>
	<li>Warid conferne call is activated by default</li>
</ul>

<p>For Postpaid:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Guide call conference charges and activate MPTY via Modify Order</li>
	<li>Warid conferne call is activated by default</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Customers can add up to 4 members including on-net, off-net and international numbers.</li>
	<li>Each new call will be charged according to the package plan</li>
	<li>If customer has free minutes they will be consumed first, followed by the balance</li>
	<li>Conference Call will not available for customers who have IR activated</li>
	<li>Conference call (MPTY) has been provisioned on entire Prepaid Subscriber base from backend.</li>
</ul>

	<li>If an MCA subscriber shifts from champion package to non-champion package then the service will continue, however customer will be intimated about the change of charging system before the start of daily charges on non-champion package</li>
	<li>Prepaid MCA Service will work only on 62 Code and not with other codes i.e. 61, 67 or 21</li>

Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER

Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Resume Order (&ldquo;Unsatisfactory Address&rdquo; and &ldquo;Related&rdquo;)</li>
	<li>TAT:&nbsp;2 hours (Only for Critical Restoration as order status will be Awaiting Approval 8AM to 6PM)</li>
	<li>Suspension Reason:
	<ul>
		<li>Rejected Cheque/Rejected VISA
		<ul>
			<li>Action Taken: If cash payment is received,&nbsp;restore number and guide TAT</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li>Related
		<ul>
			<li>Also, if cash payment received against related number, restore number and guide TAT</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Following are the critical blocking reasons:
	<ul>
		<li>Suspend on PMCL/Fraud/Unauthorized Suspend on Deposit Release Or No Deposit</li>
		<li>Suspend VISA Card Declined</li>
		<li>Dealer Owner / Business Associates (Official Special, Official Dealer) cannot get the numbers restored on their behalf against the mentioned critical reasons</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Only managers and above (no other official, no dealer owner or business associates, no contractual staff) can get the numbers restored from official hotlines/emails on their behalf.</li>
	<li>The person attending the call or catering email needs to inform the requester about the blocking reason before proceeding with restoration.</li>
	<li>For TAT over cases, Team Lead will coordinate with CC-CRM SAT TEAM through email and get customer&rsquo;s issue resolved</li>
	<li>Do not process restoration over helpline for below critical suspension reasons:
	<ul>
		<li>Unauthorized Usage: Customers&rsquo; need&nbsp;to contact PTA.</li>
		<li>Fraud/Incomplete Documents/PMCL Credit or Fraud: Customers need to visit Mobilink office</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Port IN
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <ul>
	<li>Step # 1:</li>
	<li>Service Representative will retrieve customer&rsquo;s information from Donor operator after sending MNP at short code 667 by using customer&rsquo;s Mobile</li>
	<li>CCR will guide the charges of sending SMS at short code 667 i.e. Rs.2+tax/ SMS</li>
	<li>Customer will receive following response message from his existing network operator</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Step # 2:</li>
	<li>Customer will forward 667 SMS information at short code 76300 and to CCR Number from his/her mobile number</li>
	<li>1st SMS to dedicated short code 76300</li>
	<li>2nd SMS to Representative Number (BCE/ CCR/ MSR)</li>
	<li>667 Reply to 76300 ? charges: Rs.2.00+Tax/SMS</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Step # 3:</li>
	<li>Service Representative will ask customer for the Biometric verifications as per provided New Interface</li>
	<li>New MNP Tab will be made available in existing biometric software to entertain Port IN request</li>
	<li>Following Information will be populated for Biometric verification through MNP Tab</li>
	<li>CNIC, MSISDN, IMSI (New complete SIM number), Type: Prepaid (needs to select manually)</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Step # 4:</li>
	<li>Upon successful Biometric verification, Service Representative will hand over new SIM to Customer with TAT of 4- Business Days for Prepaid Port IN Request</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Postpaid MNP Process guidelines for Business Centers</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Point of Sale will retrieve customer&rsquo;s information from Donor operator after sending MNP at short code 667 by using customer&rsquo;s Mobile</li>
	<li>Customer will also forward 667 SMS information at short code 76300 as per existing guidelines</li>
	<li>Service Representative will ask customer for the Biometric verifications as per provided New Interface</li>
	<li>Following Information will be populated for Biometric verification through MNP Tab</li>
	<li>CNIC, MSISDN, IMSI (New complete SIM number), Type: Postpaid (needs to select manually)</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Upon successful Biometric verification,Business Center and Franchise Representative will add New Postpaid In-Order in Siebel</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Service Points will submit Order for Approval from Sales Approval Team (Business Centers will not approve order itself for MNP and it will be approved by SAT Team)</li>
	<li>Service Representative will guide customer that Postpaid MNP Fee of Rs. 100 will be Invoice on his/ her First Bill</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Postpaid MNP &ndash; SAT Team</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will extract the Postpaid MNP work load from Siebel</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will verify Biometric verification status from provided Interface in addition to existing check list (CSAF, security deposit. Limit, CNIC, Billing Address etc.)</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will approve Postpaid MNP sales where the Biometric verification is successful</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will not approve Postpaid MNP orders where Biometric verification is un-successful / not verified</li>
	<li>SAT &ndash; Team will share the HOLD cases with respective touch points for corrective measures</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 27,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 26
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Biometric Verification</p>

Checklist Items: <p>There is no change in existing process except the addition of Biometric verification (BVS). All other pre-requisites &amp; check list will remain same.</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>It is mandatory to take successful Biometric verification before submitting Lead to short code 7668/ In-Order for postpaid MNP</li>
	<li>Customer needs to send &ldquo;MNP&rdquo; to 667 for both Prepaid &amp; Postpaid MNP request</li>
	<li>All documentation check list will remain same till further update for both prepaid &amp; postpaid customers</li>
	<li>BCE/ CCR will confirm if the number has passed the minimum subscription period, In case activation date is less than 60 days old there will be no response from 76300</li>
	<li>a) After activation</li>
	<li>b) Last port in</li>
	<li>Customer also needs to forward 667 reply to representative</li>
	<li>667 reply should not be tempered/edited in any way before it is sent to 76300</li>
	<li>NPR should not be initiated in case there is no response from 76300 otherwise it will be deemed as bypassed and request will be rejected by donor</li>
	<li>For prepaid cases, representative will add new SIM number followed by donor name in 76300 message and forward it to 7668 after successful bio metric verification only</li>
	<li>For postpaid port in cases, representative will create Port In order in Siebel according to the exact data received in 667 response after successful Biometric verification</li>
	<li>Send keyword NETWORK &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS</li>
	<li>Send keyword STATUS &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS</li>
	<li>Prepaid MNP is Free of Cost</li>
	<li>TAT will remain same</li>
	<li>Prepaid number will be ported in within 4 working days in case all financials and other obligations are clear at donor end</li>
	<li>Postpaid number will be ported in within 13 working days for NON-IR cases and 18 working days for IR cases</li>
</ul>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 3226

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Manual Takeover Postpaid
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h1>Process at Experience Center</h1>

<ul>
	<li>Send all related documents to TL via email for vetting and manual COO processing</li>
	<li>TL will verify documents and process manual take over order in SIEBEL</li>
	<li>Manual take over order executed &amp; completed in SIEBEL</li>
	<li>TL will route the customer back to the same agent to perform CHIMSI</li>
	<li>TL will upload documents in CACS for record purpose</li>
	<li>Agent will perform CHIMSI in BVS and hand over to the sim to the customer</li>
	<li>Order will be completed in SIEBEL</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 27,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 28
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <p><strong>Scenario 1: Death of original owner &amp; ownership transfer to any immediate family member</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verify documents (original death certificate, inheritance certificate, original CNIC)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Scenario 2: Owner is abroad, Sim lost, owner wanted to transfer the ownership on to his/her friend &amp; family name for future use</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Verify documents (NOC from original customer, original CNIC)</li>
	<li>Verify 5N check on new owner&rsquo;s CNIC</li>
	<li>Customer who wanted to transfer ownership on his/her name will visit office with his original CNIC</li>
	<li>Agent will check new sale and Change of SIM 30 days check</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Change of Ownership B2I 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Handling for the cases where customer want to convert the number number from business to individual category</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: FATIMA.ZAHEER
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 28
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Once a confirmation email received from BSD end;&nbsp; create Change Offer Order for Business to Individual (B2I)</li>
	<li>Upload the documents in CACS for approval of Change Offer Orders by BCM/TL</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Ask customer to clear outstanding dues for number activation and conversion as Individual</li>
	<li>Check all necessary documents i.e. NOC, CSAF &amp; CNIC (both sides)</li>
	<li>Send an email by attaching scanned copy of CNIC &amp; company letter head duly signed by SPOC to BSD for seeking approval</li>
	<li>Email will be sent at BSD-CentralizedActivationTeam@jazz.com.pk alias with suggested Subject &ldquo;B2I Approval&rdquo;</li>
	<li>After vetting, BSD will reply back the sender with Approval or Not Approval comments within 15 minutes</li>
	<li>Once a confirmation email received from BSD end;&nbsp; create Change Offer Order for Business to Individual (B2I)</li>
	<li>Upload the documents in CACS for approval of Change Offer Orders by BCM/TL</li>
	<li>Business Catalogue approval rights are assigned to BCM/TL for upfront Order approval</li>
	<li>After successful order approval, BCE will then perform the Biometric Verification</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Ensure to send relevant SRs for Transfer of Security Deposit and Transfer of Outstanding (if any) to concerned team for movement as per existing process</li>
	<li>There is no change in the Business To Individual conversion of &ldquo;B2B not verified&rdquo; cases (they will be catered just like a normal One Sided change of ownership case)</li>
	<li>In case a number is suspended on B2B Not Verified reason then already shared process for &ldquo;B2B Not Verified&rdquo; numbers will be followed</li>
	<li>we will use the &ldquo;Postpaid COO Tab&rdquo; to capture the Biometric Verification before Order creation</li>
	<li>BVS time stamp needs to be captured &amp; Change offer order needs to be completed on same day</li>
	<li>BVS timestamp will be updated in CRM through backend process at same day midnight</li>
</ul>

<p>BVS time stamp will be updated only against those MSISDNs whose Change Offer Order will be completed on same day ( In case of order failure or pending issue, please coordinate with CC-Operations Team to treat these cases on priority otherwise all such numbers be blocked by midnight)</p>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 3443

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Act Deact of Offers/Bundles/Package on 111
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Customer can call over helpline or visit Expereince Center to get offers, bundles or packages activated or deactivated. We will follow below guidelines in this scenario</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: Network Complaint Unit
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>All services which can be provisioned upfront, if a customer complains that he/she is unable to activate/deactivate the required product at his/her end then instead of forwarding complaints at first place agent need to follow the below process:</p>

<ul style="margin-left:40px">
	<li>Probe the error/issue faced while activating/deactivating &amp; provide possible remedy to customer</li>
	<li>check Data session &amp; guide customer to turn off data connection for activation/deactivation of desired bundle/offer.</li>
	<li>Agent to offer high value customer upfront activation/deactivation for bundle/offer</li>
	<li>Guide mass customer to try after implementing the provided remedy</li>
	<li>Activate the offer/bundle from CRM via following process, if mass customer insist to complaint that he has already tried the provided remedy
	<ul>
		<li>Siebel&rarr;IN Asset Info &rarr;Prepaid Asset &rarr;Prepaid Assets (Eligible Assets)</li>
		<li>Highlight desired bundle &rarr;select from checkbox available in &ldquo;Sub&rdquo;</li>
		<li>On successful subscription of offer/bundle product will reflect in &ldquo;Prepaid Assets (Installed Assets)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Do not launch complaint where data session is &ldquo;On/active&rdquo;</li>
	<li>In case customer agrees then no need to forward complaint and provision product from Siebel (for Mass customers).</li>
	<li>Incase customer is complaining that he has to call repeatedly for the same issue on helpline and unable to act/deact himself from IVR/SMS/USSD then in such exceptional cases generate relevant complaint in Siebel for proper issue resolution
	<ul>
		<li>SR type: Value Added Services</li>
		<li>Area: Prepaid</li>
		<li>Sub Area: Bundle offer</li>
		<li>Bundle Name: Other (if bundle/offer not available in list of values)</li>
		<li>Complaint Type: Unable to Sub</li>
		<li>Mention all the details in Summary &amp; Description field</li>
		<li>Before executing the request also check whether the required product is already attempted and failed (will Refer Activities). If a failed activity is available for the same reason, then we will process required complaint as per existing process.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Customer will receive confirmation message once any product is successfully added/deleted through Siebel. In case auto-generated activity gets failed at IN then no intimation SMS will be sent</li>
	<li>Bundle or product that is already deactivated should not be attempted again. For any product or bundle if the attribute value (Pending Cancellation) is 0, product or bundle will be auto-subscribed. Similarly, when attribute value (Pending Cancellation) is 1, we should not process deactivation, as product or bundle will be removed from installed assets at the lapse of expiry however auto subscription will no longer occur as unsub command has been processed in system</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Balance should be sufficient for required Activation of Package/Bundle or Offer</li>
	<li>Active Number</li>
	<li>Take&nbsp;customer&#39;s consent&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Inform&nbsp;subscription charges and nature of offer/bundle i.e. Once-Off or Recursive&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Consult&nbsp;In Queue Activity (if any) IN Provisioning tab for same offer/bundle</li>
	<li>Avoid&nbsp;multiple attempts on already subscribed/unsubscribed offer/bundlee</li>
	<li>Bundles or features that are not allowed on package plans should not be provisioned through Siebel and customers should be handled upfront</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>We need to offer our services first over 111 helpline, where customer has sufficeint balance, instead of guiding alternate procedure i.e. IVR/USSD</li>
	<li>Bundles or features that are not allowed on package plans should not be provisioned through Siebel and customers should be handled upfront</li>
	<li>We will not communicate any TAT to the customer and after consulting activity we will guide customer that product has been added/deleted (after refreshing page and consulting installed assets) and a confirmation SMS will also be sent</li>
	<li>Customer will receive confirmation message once any product is successfully added/deleted through Siebel. In case auto-generated activity gets failed at IN then no intimation SMS will be sent</li>
	<li>e need to offer our services first from 111, where above criteria is fulfilled, instead of guiding alternate procedure i.e. IVR/USSD</li>
	<li>If SMS Plus Offer is unsubscribed in between validity time, it will immediately be removed from Installed Assets and customer will not be able to use the remaining SMS. However, if Daily SMS Bundle, Daily GPRS bundle (which is also a recursive offer) is unsubscribed in between validity time period then offer will be available in Installed Assets till the expiry time and customer can also use remaining SMS/data till expiry time</li>
	<li>We can subscribe following 7 bundles on low balance. However; these bundles will be subscribed in suspended state and will be available installed assets in suspended state. SMS notifications will also be sent to customer at the time offer is subscribed in (Suspended status) via CRM; mentioning your offer has been subscribed and can be availed after recharging amount equal to subscription.
	<ul>
		<li>Daily SMS Bundle - Bundle01</li>
		<li>Daily GPRS Bundle</li>
		<li>GPRS Late Night offer</li>
		<li>GPRS LBC GJR, RYK,BWH</li>
		<li>GPRS Ramadan Offer</li>
		<li>Jazba Bachat Bundle</li>
		<li>RBT Daily Bundle</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<h3>Delayed Activation/Deactivation of Offers/Bundles/Package Conversion (IN Provisioning) - Handling:</h3>
	</li>
	<li>All services which can be provisioned upfront, if a customer complains that he/she is unable to activate/deactivate the required product at his/her end then instead of forwarding complaints at first place</li>
	<li>Incase customer is complaining that he has to call repeatedly for the same issue on 111 for activation/deactivation for a particular offer and unable to process himself from IVR/SMS/USSD then in such exceptional cases we will process relevant complaint for proper issue resolution</li>
	<li>Before executing the request we will also check whether the required product is already attempted and failed (will Refer Activities). If a failed activity is available for the same reason then we will process required complaint as per existing process.</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 4399

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: XPMCL Package Activation
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Jazz employees after resigning can activate XPMCL package on any one of their connections. We will guide employee to visit nearest Jazz Experience center for XPMCL package activation after Biometric verificaiton</p>

Submission Channel: 1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 33
Point of Contact: CC-CRM Official Phone Management Team
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Jazz employees after resigning can activate XPMCL package on any one of their connections. We will guide employee to visit nearest Jazz Experience center for XPMCL package activation after Biometric verificaiton</p>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p>Below is the Charging Plan for the package</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: BVS Process for Senior Citizens/Special Persons
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer wants to get duplicate SIM/Change of ownership, however issue is faced in biometric verification due to senior citizen or special persons then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 33
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Guide customer to visit nearest Jazz Experience&nbsp;Center</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Process will be applicable on the following categories of Senior/Disable customers only
	<ul>
		<li>Old Age/Senior Citizen</li>
		<li>Disabled from Both Hands (unable to provide thumb/finger impressions and it should be marked as amputated in NADRA)</li>
		<li>Diseased/Allergy (Finger prints do not match and customer record should be updated in NADRA)</li>
		<li>This process only applicable for change of SIM &ndash; Prepaid postpaid both</li>
		<li>8 hours change of SIM check</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Corporate Billing Process at Experience Centers
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Corporate customer should be facilitated at Experience Centers for living with value being Customer obsessed. Please find below the Corporate Billing process which needs to be followed</p>

Submission Channel: 1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: Respective KAM
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <h3>If Corporate Billing Cases Less than Ten:<br />
For cases where number of corporate (bulk) bill payments by visiting POC is less than or equal to Ten:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>
	<h3>BCE will make payment upfront and will handover payment invoice</h3>
	</li>
</ul>

<h3>If Corporate Billing Cases More than Ten:</h3>

<ul>
	<li>
	<h3>For Cases where number of corporate (bulk) bill payments by visiting POC is more than Ten:</h3>
	</li>
	<li>
	<h3>BCE will issue manual receipt of aggregate amount to visiting POC</h3>
	</li>
	<li>
	<h3>BCE will guide POC that computerized receipts against each bill will be delivered/emailed by respective CAM</h3>
	</li>
	<li>
	<h3>BCE will park this request till day end</h3>
	</li>
	<li>
	<h3>At the day end, BCE will make individual payments against each account and will fetch receipts</h3>
	</li>
	<li>
	<h3>Original Receipts will be couriered to respective CAM</h3>
	</li>
	<li>
	<h3>CAM will deliver or email scanned receipts to POC but this should be done in the same day, otherwise customer may face blocking</h3>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>We need to ensure that our corporate customers are being acknowledged and payments shall be processed with in same day to avoid delays in restoration/ un-necessary blocking due to lapse of grace time period &nbsp;</li>
	<li>It is requested to inform KAM at day end over email for bulk payments status</li>
	<li>It is mandatory for ECE to ask the POC that please confirm the numbers those are blocked in case of more than ten case of bulk billing then BCCR will process block numbers payments &nbsp;&amp; restoration at spot to avoid any inconvenience&nbsp;</li>
	<li>In case, POC don&rsquo;t have details of blocked number then BCCR will guide POC to request CAM to check and activate the block/suspended numbers on one day commitment by sharing the manual receipt with CAM, so that on day end payments will be processed by BCCR and next day blocking will be avoided automatically</li>
	<li>We should not refuse or hold the customer for less than ten cases to arrange the list of MSISDNs in soft form at respective experience center from KAM/TAM where customer is visiting for processing of payments<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 4441
