ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Credit Limit Enhancement
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Postpaid customer can call over helpline or visit Experience Center/Franchsie Center to get their credit limit enhanced or decreased. We will follow below guidelines to facilitate customer</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063,2067
Point of Contact: Credit and Collection Team
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Launch SR Type: Account Administration--&gt;Area: Credit Profile--&gt;Sub Area: Postpaid</li>
	<li>Owner: DUMMY_EMP_28</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check if sufficient deposit is available or&nbsp;deposit waiver reflecting</li>
	<li>In case of multiple subscribers in one account, CREDIT OPERATIONS will evaluate the new credit limit as per the access levels and package plans of the subscribers.</li>
	<li>Customer average billing and related accounts are checked.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If any customer wants to enhance his Credit Limit Enhancement then we will check number from E front Promo CRM Lead Project Tab.
	<ul>
		<li>If number available in it then we need to forward SR by mentioning new limit in SR summary field.&nbsp;</li>
		<li>All eligible Postpaid Warid &amp; Jazz regular numbers data has been uploaded in E front CRM Lead Project Tab</li>
		<li>We need to guide New Limit which can be enhanced and same limit has to mention in Credit Limit Enhancement request</li>
		<li>It is mandatory to mention in notes that &ldquo;Number fall in E-front CRM Lead Project&rdquo;</li>
		<li>If a number is not available in E front Lead Project then he cannot enhance his credit limit without deposit</li>
		<li>Every month pool will be refreshed and uploaded in E front</li>
		<li>If number is not eligible for limit enhancement then E-front will show the self-explanatory message Limit can be enhanced with Deposit</li>
		<li>Club, Business, Company, Employee Package and Official numbers will not fall in the Credit Limit Enhancement Project</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If any customer does not fall in Lead Project and still insists to forward his request then we can forward Credit Limit Enhancement request with no commitment</li>
	<li>In case of Direct Debit based deposit waiver &ldquo;Change of Payment Mode&rdquo; will be processed first and waiver will be subject to existing promotions &amp; approvals</li>
	<li>Request on Company&rsquo;s letterhead required in case of the company accounts</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Check if Services are active in Siebel &amp; in HLR and will launch activity under OMT Tab in eFront as per below scenario:<br />
	o For Barring issue we will make &ldquo;SMS barring&rdquo; activity<br />
	o For SMS Parameter missing issue &ldquo;SMS Reset&rdquo; activity</li>
	<li>Check NTT if there is any known issue</li>
	<li>Check for ICS service<br />
	o Buffer SMS complaint will be catered on immediate basis &amp; Irrespective of coverage area with complete note pad details<br />
	o We do not commit SMS on GO CDMA, PTCL, V wireless numbers<br />
	o We will not take complaint if customer reports any delay issue of sending/receiving SMS</li>
	<li>Buffer SMS complaint will be catered on immediate basis &amp; Irrespective of coverage area with clear notepad details</li>
	<li>In case customer is receiving error of Check Operator Services on outgoing SMS, we will guide voice barring code alongwith forward following activity in OMT TAB (E-front), instead of creating outgoing SMS</li>
	<li>In case an SMS outgoing/Incoming complaint for all number (with no error prompt received and message stuck in outbox) is received from customer using any handset then we need to guide customer that he is facing issue due to handset and guide below reasons and remedies.</li>
	<li>Delete previous messages from inbox, sent items, drafts, outbox</li>
	<li>Do a Handset Restart of cell phone</li>
	<li>Guide for SMS settings as well</li>
	<li>If all above remedies do not work, then ask customer to change handset as well</li>
	<li>We will forward normal SMS outgoing complaints incase customer is facing SMS outgoing issue on Geo Alerts/designated VAS shortcodes</li>
	<li>We do not commit SMS on GO CDMA, PTCL, V wireless numbers</li>
	<li>We will not take complaint if customer reports any delay issue of sending/receiving SMS</li>
	<li>Any SMS exceeding 480 characters (3+ SMS length) may be converted into an MMS in some of the handsets available in market (mostly smartphones). This may result in;</li>
	<li>Charging according to MMS package</li>
	<li>Sending failure if MMS service is not enabled on sender end</li>
	<li>No delivery of MMS on non-compatible handsets on receiver end</li>
	<li>Check if Services are active in in HLR and will launch activity under OMT Tab in eFront as per below scenario</li>
	<li>For Barring issue we will make &ldquo;SMS barring&rdquo; activity</li>
	<li>o For SMS Parameter missing issue &ldquo;SMS Reset&rdquo; activity</li>
	<li>Check NTT if there is any known issue</li>
	<li>Check Current Balance if sufficient to make Outgoing SMS</li>
	<li>Buffer SMS complaint will be catered on immediate basis &amp; Irrespective of coverage area with clear notepad details</li>
	<li>We will not take complaint if customer reports any delay issue of sending/receiving SMS</li>
	<li>SMS delivery time for switched off number is 4 Hours and for MCA notification SMS maximum validity is 48 hours</li>
	<li>For Check Operator Services on outgoing SMS, we will guide voice barring code along with forwarding SMS Barring - Prepaid activity in eFront - OMT TAB (TAT: 2 hours)</li>
	<li>For SMS outgoing/Incoming complaint with no error prompt received and message stuck in outbox, we need to guide customer to delete messages from inbox, sent items, drafts, outbox. Check SMS settings and restart handset. Customer can check with other handset as well</li>
	<li>Any SMS exceeding 480 characters (3+ SMS length) may be converted into MMS in some of the handsets available in market (mostly smartphones). This may result in: Charging according to MMS, sending failure if MMS service is not enabled on sender end, No delivery of MMS on non-compatible handsets on receiver end</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: eSIM activation process
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>eSIM (Embedded SIM) is now available for ordering at Experience centers and Franchise centers nationwide. We will follow below guidelines to facilitate customer</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 33
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Process the required CHIMSI or New sale as per existing process and&nbsp;use IMSI provided on eSIM packet
	<ul>
		<li>BCE/FCE will process the required CHIMSI or New sale &amp; use IMSI provided on eSIM packet</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p>Current list of eSIM enabled handsets is shared below. Please note that this list is not exhaustive as various new upcoming high-end handsets are eSIM supported therefore customers should be entertained accordingly</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u><span style="color:#c00000">eSIM enabled handsets </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="height:284px; width:277px" /></span></span></p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>eSIM is an advanced SIM technology which is embedded in your phone to activate your mobile number without having to insert a physical SIM</li>
	<li>There is no change in verification or BVS process, Instead of IMSI number on back of SIM card FCE will enter IMSI number on the back of eSIM as shown in screen shot</li>
	<li>Apart from digital registration / activation, eSIM will work exactly like a regular SIM with respect to connectivity</li>
	<li>BCE/FCE will now hand over eSIM to customer and follow below for eSIM activation on handset</li>
	<li>Please note lifting of stock for eSIM is currently restricted to 10 per order. Please make sure while ordering on online portal not more than 10 are ordered</li>
	<li>Before processing any activity on eSIM, Make sure to follow above guidelines as once processed 8 hours check will apply same as normal SIM scenario</li>
	<li>Apple watch or any other gadgets are not supported. Only listed phones will work with eSIM</li>
	<li>Kindly ask customer not to share their QR code with anyone, Customer can save QR Scan by capturing through phone camera and sharing on their own email address if required</li>
	<li>if customer Primary/Physical and digital both IMEIs are PTA compliant but still while installing the profile error is occurred related to carrier then we will share the details in mentioned below format with provided recipients
	<ul>
		<li>To: ahmed.nauman@jazz.com.pk</li>
		<li>CC: zohaib.qaiser@jazz.com.pk, CC-STANDARDIZATIONTEAM@jazz.com.pk</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

Checklist Items: <p>Guide customer to visit Jazz Expereinece Center or Franchise Center with below documents:</p>

	<li>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Only immediate family member can get the duplicate SIM and ownership transferred</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:80px">a.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Original family registration certificate (FRC) need to be presented to verify family tree</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">b.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;NOC/Affidavit by other family members in favor of transferee</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">c.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Original CNIC of deceased&nbsp;(Photocopy to be scanned if original CNIC surrendered at NADRA and surrender confirmed via 7000 response)</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">d.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Original CNIC of transferee</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">e.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Signed undertaking from applicant (Party-B) shall be arranged as per standard template (Draft attached)</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Death certificate (issued by Govt. body like Union Council, NADRA etc.</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Possession of SIM must be ensured.which should be scanned and saved in system</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Check last recharge/last call history</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Duplicate SIM to new owner will be issued/activated after BVS through NADRA as per process</li>
	<li>Attached undertaking will be taken filled and signed by transferee that in case of any dispute over this connection or fake documents, the subject connection/SIM will be blocked, and the customer will have no legal right to challenge the same</li>
	<li>For closing of &nbsp;deceased account the legal heirs of deceased can submit all the requisite documents in Jazz Business centers/ or Mobilink Bank Branches as per existing process. Once JazzCash account is closed then change of ownership will be processed</li>
	<li>If SIM is lost, Experience Center after receiving Change of ownership request will block the SIM. Change of ownership will be done after <strong>four working days</strong> of receipt of request and new SIM to be issued via BVS after COO</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Do Not Block Process(Delete)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Inccase number needs to be excluded from daily credit monitoring (due to certain issues/disputes) then we will follow below handling of Do Not Block facility</p>

Submission Channel: 1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: CC-CRM Credit Monitoring Team
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Agent will create Siebel Escalaiton activity in eFront for respective Team Leader</li>
	<li>Business Center CCR will send email to BC TL or Manager to process the number in DO NOT Portal<br />
	TL will access below mentioned Do Not Block Portal and enter the details and press the ADD button</li>
	<li>DNB Portal New Link &nbsp; http://lhe-ccpdm-01.mobilink.net.pk:8329/DNB/Add</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>If customer wants to restore his number on commitment for more than 24 hours till 3 days then CCR will make Siebel Escalation in E-front with Number and Valid Till Date<br />
	Number should be active or OG blocked on exceedl limit</li>
	<li>Number blocked on anyother reasons will not be entered in DNB portal</li>
	<li>Number should be Consumer catalogue (J packages)</li>
	<li>Billing Dispute &ndash; Billed/ unbilled dispute where case is escalated to Postpaid Recovery Team
	<ul>
		<li>Customer can get his number restored through helpline till the rectification of his bill dispute. Agent needs to escalate the case to TL for addition in DNB</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Agent will provide confirmation regarding his number will be added in DO NOT BLOCK within 1 Hour</li>
	<li>On Behalf Option is also available to add number in DNB<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>In case link is not available, then we will escalate to CC-CRM Credit Monitoring Team&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Portal can be accessed through Google chrome explorer only</li>
	<li>History is available against pre entered numbers</li>
	<li>For number on IR total responsibility is on executor against any financial exposure</li>
	<li>Number can be entered in DNB maximum for 3 days</li>
	<li>Cannot remove the number from DNB but can update/edit</li>
	<li>Auto Email Intimation will be sent on addition and expiry of DNB to the executor</li>
	<li>Upper usage Limit 125% (for Regular) 150% (for Plat) is implemented for ROC if customer exceed this limit then he/she will unable to use restoration facility via USSD/DNB</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: &nbsp;Internal audit is in place against all entries of DNB to monitor/manage any exception</p>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

</ul>

		<li>Email: imei@pta.gov.pk</li>
		<li>Visit PTA Headquarters or nearest PTA Zonal Office</li>

<p>The complainant can also contact Citizens Police Liaison Committee (CPLC) helpline 1102, 021-35662222 &amp; 021-35682222 for lodging complaint of snatched / stolen / lost mobile phone.</p>

<p>If customer asks, guide that below Information is required to be provided to PTA&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>All IMEI&rsquo;s of Stolen / lost Mobile Phone&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Father&rsquo;s name / Mother&rsquo;s name</li>

	<li>Brand / Model / Color&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Date of incident</li>

	<li>Address</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>The status of blocking can be checked after 16 working hours of reporting via 3 methods given below. Once blocked, following status shall be displayed against the stolen IMSI search;&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Your mobile device (IMEI#) is blocked (Reported Stolen / Lost / Misused to PTA)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How to Check Status of Phone
	<ul>
		<li>SMS: Send 15-digit IMEI to 8484</li>
		<li>Website: https://dirbs.pta.gov.pk/</li>
		<li>Android App: Check status of device via android application (DVS)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Notes:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>PTA&rsquo;s mandate is only limit to blocking of phone. In order to trace / track stolen phone, local police may be approached</li>
	<li>IMEI of a mobile device can be found by dialing *#06#. It can also be checked in the &ldquo;settings&rdquo; of a mobile device. IMEI is also printed on the device box</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Stuck Order Handling(Pending, Open, To be Verified)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer is contacts us for any product/servie however order could not be launched due to stuck Order (Pending, Open, To be Verified) then we will follow below handling to cancell/complete the order.</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: IT-CRM Ops
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>For Order Status in pending/provisioning failure state:</strong>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Resubmit the order if completed and guide customer accordingly&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>If order again goes into provisioning failure state then we will follow stuck order complaint handling process mentioned below</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>To be Verified Order Handling: Order is in To be verified status (Prepaid/Postpaid)- Provisioning Failures cases</strong></p>

<p><strong>If Only existing stuck Order resolution is required</strong><br />
We will attempt (only once) to Re-Submit order as per process mentioned below:<br />
1. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Click Order Number&rarr;Go to Activities&rarr;Create Activity &ldquo;Action Required&rdquo;&rarr;&rdquo;Order Error&rdquo;&rarr;Description &ldquo;.&rdquo;&rarr;Change Owner to any team member<br />
2. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Then go to Line items&rarr;Line details&rarr;Click &ldquo;Failure Resolved&rdquo; Check Box to /<br />
3. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Then Submit order and wait for Change of Order status (&ldquo;Completed&rdquo; or &ldquo;To be Verified&rdquo;)<br />
4. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; If status is changed to &ldquo;Completed&rdquo; then we will guide customer that instructions processed<br />
5. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; If status remains &ldquo;To be Verified&rdquo; then we will follow below guidelines:<br />
&nbsp;<br />
We will consult eFront&rarr;OMT activities&rarr;</p>

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:985px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; vertical-align:top; width:162px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;Activity Status</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; vertical-align:top; width:411px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Prepaid</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; vertical-align:top; width:402px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Postpaid</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:72px; vertical-align:top; width:162px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">No Activity Available</span></span></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">or</span></span></span></p>

			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Pending without Notes</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td colspan="2" style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:73px; vertical-align:top; width:815px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guide customer that issue will be resolved within&nbsp;2<strong> hour</strong>&nbsp;and customer will be informed via SMS</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:162px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">On-Hold</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:411px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Issue will be resolved within&nbsp;<strong>48 hours</strong>&nbsp;from the time of entering notes. Customer will be informed via SMS(except Blocking Orders)</span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; vertical-align:top; width:402px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Issue will be resolved within&nbsp;<strong>4 hours</strong>&nbsp;from the time of entering notes. Customer will be informed via SMS(except Blocking Orders)</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>If a new order is required along with resolving the stuck Order</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>We will attempt to Re-Submit order and consult eFront&rarr;OMT header as per abovementioned handling</li>
	<li>For new Order we will Escalate to Team Leader via eFront Siebel Escalation mentioning new Order requirements in notes
	<ul>
		<li>Team Leader will keep activity in follow-up till stuck order completion and then launch order for new instructions</li>
		<li>Customer will be informed via SMS once issue will be completely resolved</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&bull; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Incase new request is for blocking/restoration we will process via eFront-OMT &amp; for 3G/4G Activation we will guide customer USSD code along with existing &nbsp;order rectification<br />
&nbsp;<br />
TAT: 2hrs (for resolution of stuck order)<br />
TAT: 3hrs for Escalation to Team Leader for new order processing)Open Orders (For Prepaid/Postpaid)</p>

<p><strong>Open Orders Handling</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If an existing Order is in Open status &amp; tat has been lapsed (Known Issue)</li>
	<li>Guide customer that issue will be resolved earliest possible and customer will receive SMS intimation (system generated)</li>
</ul>

<p>For new Order we will Escalate to Team Leader via eFront Siebel Escalation mentioning new Order requirements in notes</p>

<ul style="margin-left:40px">
	<li>Team Leader will keep activity in follow-up till stuck order completion and then launch order for new instructions</li>
	<li>Customer will be informed via SMS on issue resolution</li>
</ul>

<p>Incase new request is for blocking/restoration we will process via eFront-OMT &amp; for 3G/4G Activation we will guide customer USSD code along with existing &nbsp;order rectification</p>

<p>&nbsp;<br />
TAT: ASAP (for resolution of stuck order)<br />
TAT: ASAP (for New Order Creation by Team Leader)</p>

<p><strong>If an existing Order is in Open status &amp; tat has been lapsed (Issue Exists)</strong><br />
Ask the complainant if biometric request was successful then go to order TAB and enter MSISDN and check weather order is available or not if order is available but still pending or open then go for complaint in e-Front<br />
Go to E-Front&rarr;Siebel&rarr;Enter MSISDN and select the required reason for Prepaid or Postpaid accordingly and select the reason Order completion required<br />
Mentioned error message in notes also</p>

<p><br />
<strong>&ldquo;Pending&rdquo; Orders Cancellation:&nbsp;</strong><br />
Pending Order Cancellation Procedure</p>

<ul>
	<li>For Pending orders, we will first take confirmation regarding previous request made by customer</li>
	<li>Then we need to check the line items of pending order
	<ul>
		<li>Incase line items are not Available in that order: new order will be created and previous request needs to be submitted in same order (as per confirmation from customer)</li>
		<li>Incase line items are Available: Will follow the below process&nbsp;
		<ul>
			<li>We need to cancel the pending order.&nbsp;</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>For Cancel/Submit a Pending Order in Siebel we need to route the activity of Action Required ïƒ  Order Error from our login to any Fellow Team Member and then route back the activity on our own Siebel login (owner ID), after which cancel/submit option will become enabled.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Important Note</strong>: In case any activity is routed to any person other than our team member OR even to our Team Leader then we will not be able to reroute that activity to our login.</p>

<ul>
	<li>After cancellation of order, new order needs to be created and previous request needs to be processed in same order (as per confirmation from customer)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: It is mandatory to check our own pending orders before shift end, in case any order is not submitted we need to submit order on daily basis.&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Awaiting for Approval: CRM team TBD</strong></p>

<p>PFB handling for orders in Awaiting for Approval status where line detail status reflect in pending status. Please note that we will not cancel such orders and follow the below guidelines:</p>

<ul>
	<li>In case any order is in &ldquo;Awaiting for Approval&rdquo; status (exceptional cases) we will escalate number to team leader via Siebel escalation and provide TAT of ASAP to customer, team leader will further escalate number to respective team via email&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Postpaid Stuck Orders (To be Verified,Open)- Billing Failures cases</strong></p>

<p>For all Postpaid scenarios where any order is stuck (To be Verified, Open status) or any error is received while executing the order then we will create an activity in efront under Siebel TAB</p>

<p>Create the activity in Efront against the following issue by selecting the respective Reason in Efront from drop down menu:</p>

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:1048px">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-color:black; border-style:solid; border-width:1px; height:21px; vertical-align:top; width:569px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Issues </span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:1px solid black; height:21px; vertical-align:top; width:470px">
			<p style="text-align:center"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Reason in Efront activity </span></span></strong></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:1px solid black; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:21px; vertical-align:top; width:569px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:blue">To be Verified Orders</span></span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#1f497d">:</span></span></span></span></p>

			<ol>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">An Old Order is in To be verified</span></span></span></li>
				<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">New Order creation required but an old order is in To be verified status</span></span></span></li>
			</ol>
			</td>
			<td style="border-bottom:1px solid black; border-left:none; border-right:1px solid black; border-top:none; height:21px; vertical-align:top; width:470px">
			<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">Order Completion Required</span></span></span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>TAT:&nbsp;<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Billing Failure cases TAT is 1 hour for normal case&nbsp;<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;IT dependent Cases Exceptions TAT will be 4 Hours</p>

Checklist Items: <p>Verify if Order exists in pending/open/To be verify state</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Siebel asset status will also be updated accordingly as per the request of Restoration &amp; Blocking processed via OMT header in efront. (No Order will reflect in Siebel only status will be updated to avoid mismatch cases)</li>
	<li>Handling for Pending &amp; Awaiting Approval Order status will remain the same</li>
	<li>In cases like Block on stolen/Restoration etc. Notes are mandatory to be filled. Scenarios where notes/Order field are not mandatory, we will leave these fields blank</li>
	<li>Order number should be mentioned in Order ID field for clarification of complaint</li>
	<li>E-front activity will be automatically routed to Concerned team will create the requested order in Siebel &amp; also clear the previous order</li>
	<li>Incase Change of Sim Order is in Open Status and number is not active, we will create activity in Efront as per above guidelines&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Incase Order is in To Be Verified status and customer calls within TAT for status confirmation of the same product/service then we will guide customer to wait for 1 hour (Provisioning failure &amp; billing failure cases)</li>
	<li>Notes are mandatory to be filled in all the cases for required actions.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Block on Stolen
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer contacts us for Block on Stolen then we will follow below guidelines</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent after verifying mandatory <strong>verifications</strong> and validating <strong>process checklist</strong>&nbsp;block the number on Stolen keeping in view avaliable scenerios&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1062,6105
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Launch Suspend Order in Siebel</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check CRM (Siebel) history to verify Count of blocking</li>
	<li>If less than 2 blocking found in a calendar week in History, then</li>
	<li>We will block number if caller verifies Name + CNIC and any two of the below verifications:
	<ul>
		<li>Last Invoice Amount</li>
		<li>FNF added</li>
		<li>Offer/Bundle/VAS active on number</li>
		<li>Any other Jazz Number active on Customer CNIC</li>
		<li>Package Plan</li>
		<li>Bill payment (as last option)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: If customer is calling from Same Account CLI then no alternate verification is required</p>

<ul>
	<li>In case VIP TAG is updated then we will take 2 alternate verification along with Level 3</li>
	<li>We need to consult efront and Siebel. If number is tagged as &ldquo;No Action&rdquo;, we will politely ask the customer to visit main office. We will not take request of blocking/Restoration/Change of Ownership over 111</li>
</ul>

<p><u><strong>2nd Time Blocking in a calander week</strong></u></p>

<p>In case 2nd time number is going to blocked in a calendar week from helpline then agent will block number for last time and guide customer&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;<br />
&ldquo;Sir/Madam we can block number 2 times in a week from helpline. Please visit front office for further blocking of same number&rdquo; &nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;<br />
Restoration will be processed from helpline if number is blocked without consent as per normal restoration process</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>We will entertain customer not more than 2 times from helpline in a calendar week&nbsp;</li>
	<li>After blocking we will guide customer block on stolen USSD *8822#for empowerment &nbsp;</li>
	<li>We will restore NO ACTION Tag number if mistakenly blocked from helpline</li>
	<li>We need to handle customer call with courtesy while providing details of self-care option for number blocking</li>
	<li>Helpline agent to inform customer that in case of any special tag such as &ldquo;No Action&rdquo; tag, number will not be blocked</li>
	<li>Team Leader Escalation &amp; Call Back Process need to be followed with priority handling to block customer number once details are verified&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Any exceptions need to be escalated to reporting floor team leader for effective customer facilitation</li>
	<li>After blocking Guide customer the procedure for Duplicate SIM issuance.</li>
	<li>We need to guide Jazz OMNI SIM Deliverey details if customer exist in relevant cities Jazz
	<ul>
		<li>Go through --&gt; Omni Channel Launch (SIM Delivered at Doorstep) Process</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>it is mandatory to mention verification/notes/CLI in the upper Comments box available at order applet.</li>
	<li>If number is blocked/restored from franchise without any clear notes then we will consider it level 2/3 blocking/ restoration</li>
	<li>We will not cater Block on Stolen If: Number is on UAO668, Suspended on Deposit Release.</li>
	<li>Retailer Number can be blocked on Stolen over the helpline (111) after Level III verification.</li>
	<li>In case a postpaid number is blocked on reconciliation, we will restore it, after level 3 verification, IF outstanding dues are under defined credit limit.</li>
	<li>Need to guide USSD *8822# for self-service where customer asking to getting his number blocked&nbsp;from helpline/frontend along with Blocking or Restoration from Siebel</li>
</ul>

	<li>Guide basic requirements as per checklist and important points mentioned above</li>
	<li>Guide customer to visit Nearest Franchise/Jazz Experience Center</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p>Prepaid Change of Ownership:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Number should be active</li>
	<li>There should be no Mobile Wallet attached against the number
	<ul>
		<li>Mobile Account need to be closed before processing Change of Ownership</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>30 days check for change of ownership after new sale/change of Sim (180 days for Special numbers)</li>
	<li>Successful verification of new owner</li>
</ul>

<p>Postpaid Change of Ownership:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Party A and B biometric is required to perform Change of Ownership of postpaid numbers against Jazz/Warid Postpaid numbers</li>
	<li>Expereience Center staff have the option to skip Party A biometric</li>
	<li>Successful Biometric verification</li>
	<li>Security deposit will be required if number was active on wavier</li>
	<li>Bill balance must be cleared</li>
	<li>30 days check for change of ownership after new sale/change of Sim (180 days for Special Numbers)</li>
	<li>There should be no Mobile Wallet attached against the number
	<ul>
		<li>Mobile Account need to be closed before processing Change of Ownership</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Change of Ownership is Free of Cost</li>
	<li>COO of other NDC will be processed on business center only</li>
	<li>Other NDC disowned number can be owned at business centers only</li>
	<li>After COO existing waivers will be reverted back and limit will be reassigned as per new deposit</li>
	<li>For cooperate, request on letter head is required</li>
	<li>If original customer is not present, then his/her org CNIC and NOC (with signature &amp; thumb impression) is required.</li>
	<li>TAT for financial movements will also remain same (i.e, 5 working days) for franchise</li>
	<li>Disown to Own BVS process details are attached</li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>It is mandatory to take successful Biometric verification before submitting In-Order for postpaid MNP</li>
	<li>Customer needs to send &ldquo;MNP&rdquo; to 667 for both Prepaid &amp; Postpaid MNP request</li>
	<li>Confirm if the number has passed the minimum subscription period, In case activation date is less than 60 days old there will be no response from 76300
	<ul>
		<li>a) After activation</li>
		<li>b) Last port in</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>667 reply should not be tempered/edited in any way before it is sent to 76300</li>
	<li>NPR should not be initiated in case there is no response from 76300 otherwise it will be deemed as bypassed and request will be rejected by donor</li>
	<li>For postpaid port in cases, create Port In order in Siebel according to the exact data received in 667 response after successful Biometric verification</li>
	<li>Send keyword NETWORK &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS to check currnt network</li>
	<li>Send keyword STATUS &lt;Space&gt; Mobile number at short code 76367 - charges 2.50+tax/SMS to check MNP request status of number</li>
	<li>Prepaid number will be ported in within 4 working days in case all financials and other obligations are clear at donor end</li>
	<li>Postpaid number will be ported in within 13 working days for NON-IR cases and 18 working days for IR cases</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C

Complaint Description: <p>This is a generic process for effective use of static map and NTT page</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Known Issue on NTT page in eFront</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:48px"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">For prepaid numbers, below process needs to be followed </span></span></p>

<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Sir, Aap ne jo akhri call 0300/0321/ etc. pay ki thi us main XYZ issue aaraha tha ? </span></span>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If multiple issues updated on NTT for same cell ID then we need to probe for City </span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If No, will ask for time, duration &amp; prefix etc. to identify the exact Cell ID and paste in NTT (Efront) to check known issues </span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If any open ticket is there only then probe location and area. No need to ask Exact Address or Handset </span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Along with launching complaint/guiding known issue, we also need to guide customer to check with different handset too</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Country Code feature functioning</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>T</strong>ake the <strong><em>Country Code</em></strong> from CDR (Siebel)</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Step 2</strong>: Agent will search this particular country code from <strong><em>NTT page</em></strong></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Step 3</strong>: If there is <strong>Open </strong>trouble ticket in NTT then agent will not acknowledge the complaints and will guide customer as per normal SOP <strong>(Punching of work code is mandatory in this case)</strong></span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Step 4: </strong>If there is closed ticket then agent will pick<strong> Site Code </strong>from NTT and will search this site code from Static Map</span></span></li>
		<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Step 5:</strong> Check Static Map coverage: </span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<ul>

</ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:black">We do not acknowledge Complaints for basements and Higher than 3<sup>rd</sup> Floor</span></span></span></li>

Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Static map acces has been provided to Call Center agents, Backend Teams and Jazz Experience Center executivies</li>
	<li>Users have to Log-in by providing their own User Name and Password to access Coverage Maps Portal</li>
	<li>Call center will access static Map through SSO portal link and other teams will access throgh URL available in Quick Links
	<ul>
		<li>Forgot Password feature is available on Static Maps portal home page</li>
		<li>Email will be received from: TEC-NOC OSS AND CONTROL TEAM &lt;TEC-NOCOSSANDCONTROLTEAM@jazz.com.pk&gt; with current password</li>
		<li>Call center users who have no email address can coordinate with CC-VENDOR MANAGEMENT TEAM POC for password retrieval.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>User must change password immediately after first-time log-in</li>
	<li>Please make sure to log out if you are not using the system to avoid any misuse of your login.</li>
	<li>Report:option is available for CEM/QAST teams only for audit and monitoring purpose to check if any misuse of system</li>
	<li>Report: Logged in user can view the LOG of the searched Cell IDs.&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>CEM/QAST Team can view SEARCH LOGS for provided Cell ID/Site Code and between the selected dates.&nbsp;</li>
		<li>This report can be extracted and saved in EXCEL FORMAT.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Color codes are also has been updated and described on screen for understanding</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

TYPE: SOP

ID: 9025

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: How to Create, Check and Cancel Service Request - SR in Siebel
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>We will follow below guidlines to create correct and complete Service Request (SR)</p>

Submission Channel: 1058,1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 3068
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Enter MSISDN in Account tab in Siebel</li>
	<li>On Account Level in Siebel go to Service Request applet&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Click Smart Script</li>
		<li>Select SR Type</li>
		<li>Click Next</li>
		<li>Select Area</li>
		<li>Click Next</li>
		<li>Select Sub Area</li>
		<li>Click Next</li>
		<li>Select Complaint Type</li>
		<li>Click Next</li>
		<li>Enter details in answer fields</li>
		<li>Description and Summary field is mandatory to fill</li>
		<li>Select Y under Do you want to Assign the Service Request</li>
		<li>Click Finish</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>How to check SR details</p>

<ul>
	<li>Click on SR # to check details of SR</li>
</ul>

<p>How to Check Audit Trail (To check who and when created, routed and re-routed SR)</p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to Audit Trail</li>
	<li>Check User ID (Siebel ID), Field, Value and Date to track changes made in SR</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>How to Cancell an&nbsp;SR (which is in &quot;Open&quot; or &quot;In Progress&quot; status)</p>

<ul>
	<li>Re-route SR to your own workload by entering your Siebel ID in Owner: field</li>
	<li>Select Conclusion as per scenario&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Select Status as Cancelled</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Detailed process is attached with screen shots</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: How to launch, submit and cancel Modify Order in Siebel
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>These guidelines will help to&nbsp;launch, submit and cancel an order in Siebel as per scenario</p>

Submission Channel: 1058,27,1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Enter MSISDN in Account tab in Siebel</li>
	<li>On Account Level in Siebel, click &quot;Modify&quot; button&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Select required product from drop down list for activation
		<ul>
			<li>or select blank product from dropdown list for deactivation</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li>Check product for Activation or Uncheck for deactivation</li>
		<li>Click &quot;Done&quot; once required product selected</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Enter notes in comments field about action taken and product name</li>
	<li>Submit Order</li>
</ul>

<p>How to Cancell an Order</p>

<ul>
	<li>An order can be cancelled before submitting&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Select Order reason as &quot;Order Cancellation&quot;</li>
		<li>Enter comments with reason for order cancellation</li>
		<li>Click Cancel Button</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>How to Check which product was activatin/deactivated via Order</p>

<ul>
	<li>Click on Order #</li>
	<li>Expand Linke Items</li>
	<li>Product activated/deactivated will reflect in line items</li>
</ul>

<p>How to check order failure reason</p>

<ul>
	<li>Click on Order #</li>
	<li>Go to Line details</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Guide charges, pro-ration impact and if any conflict with other products before launching an order</li>
	<li>Need to select correct prodcut as per customer requirement and package plan</li>
	<li>Mention action and product/package name in comments which is being activated/deactivated</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

<table cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse:collapse; width:492px">
	<tbody>

<ul>
	<li>Customers have to pay on delivery for (New connection Price, MNP, Change of SIM &amp; 4G device) as per existing applicable charges</li>
	<li>In addition security Deposit as per postpaid package plan and Number Price as showing in CYN system will be charged from customer</li>
	<li>Customer can pay via cash or JazzCash against his selected order price</li>
	<li>Upon request generation, customer request will be routed to nearest available franchise&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Customer will not be able to initiate new request against a number unless previous request is completed</li>
	<li>Customer will receive confirmation notification and will receive call from respective franchise in 1 Working Hour of request generation</li>
	<li>Assigned franchise POC will contact customer within 1 working hour</li>
	<li>Lead generation will be open for customers 24/7, however delivery will be facilitated only in active business hours 9AM to 6PM (Monday to Saturday)</li>
	<li>Lead notification will be shared with concern TSS, Franchise Manager &amp; Franchise Master SIM number</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>Customer will receive confirmation notification and will receive call from respective franchise POC in 1 working hour of request generation</li>
	<li>Customer will not be able to initiate new request against a number unless previous request is completed</li>
	<li>Franchise POC will update iEfront with proper notes along with selecting correct request type and customer number for which request is processed</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Grey Traffic, Spammer Fraud -FMT -PTA Blocked Numbers Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: I don't have updated information about this.
Submission Channel: 1044,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Blocking Reson:&nbsp;Grey traffic-FMT or&nbsp;Fraud-FMT</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Incase number is blocked in Siebel by FMT and no record in eFront then will launch auto-complete request in eFront with MSISDN, CNIC, Blocking Reason, Unblocking Type and Call back number(CBN)</li>
	<li>Guide customer that customer will be informed via SMS on blocked number if number is restored and on Call back number if cannot be restored or need to visit Office for further processing.</li>
</ul>

<p>TAT: 24 Hours (including Saturday/Sunday) For example: activity launched at 11:00 AM will be resolved by 10:59 AM next day</p>

<p>How to check FMT response against Restoration Request launched in eFront:</p>

<ul>
	<li>FIN-FMT will receive eFront data automatically via email</li>
	<li>FIN-FMT will evaluate if number can be restored or not</li>
	<li>Incase number is restored by FIN-FMT then system generated restoration SMS is sent on problematic number</li>
	<li>ncase number is not restored by FIN-FMT then need to check eFront iSMS history against Call Back number to check FIN-FMT response and guide customer accordingly</li>
	<li>Incase number is not restored and no details available in iSMS history against call back number then we will again launch same complaint in eFront</li>
</ul>

<p><br />
<strong>Blocking Reson:&nbsp;</strong><strong>Grey Traffic_PTA&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p>Experience Center/Franchise Center Handling:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Verify the status of number from CRM and Backend systems (Blocking Reason: Grey Traffic_PTA).</li>
	<li>Get below documents/information from customer for restoration of his/her number
	<ul>
		<li>Written request duly signed by customer</li>
		<li>Customer&rsquo;s CNIC copy</li>
		<li>Image of IMEI # of customer handset used at the time of blocking</li>
		<li>Date of Blocking (from CRM)</li>
		<li>BVS info</li>
		<li>Sales Channel info</li>
		<li>Alternate contact number of customer</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Create &ldquo;General Complaints&rdquo; activity in eFront by mentioning reason for customer visit in notes (FCCR will keep respective Postpaid Executive in loop for eFront activity creation)<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;TAT: 5 working days for restoration/PTA response&nbsp;<br />
o&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Guide customer that number will be restored in 5 working days and if it is not restored in 5 working days then customer need to contact PTA directly</p>

<p>ECE/FCCR will send the above documents/ information to below mentioned email IDs, CRA (interconnect) and keeping RAFM in loop<br />
To: CRAInterconnect@jazz.com.pk &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; CC: FRMU@jazz.com.pk</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Helpline Handling:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to visit nearest Jazz Office for further processing
	<ul>
		<li>Incase customer has already visited office and wants to know the status then we will consult eFont to check if &ldquo;General Complaints&rdquo; activity is available</li>
		<li>If activity is not available then we will guide customer to visit Jazz Office again for further processing (We can launch Franchise Staff Related complaint if customer complains)</li>
		<li>If activity is available and TAT is over however number is not restored then we will guide customer to contact PTA</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Blocking Reason: Spammer-PTA,&nbsp;Spammer-FMT,&nbsp;Spammer&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Number blocked by Jazz FMT team on the request of PTA&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Customer only needs to coordinate PTA offices or use their online portal at <span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#1f3864"><a href="https://complaint.pta.gov.pk/RegisterComplaint.aspx" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://complaint.pta.gov.pk/RegisterComplaint.aspx</a></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Bloking Reason:&nbsp;Fraud-PTA</strong></p>

<p>These number are blocked by Jazz CRA&nbsp;team on the request of PTA&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Need to send the request to CC Operation Team by following the below mentioned guidelines (already shared in trailing email)<br />
TAT: 7 Business Days<br />
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;or&nbsp;<br />

	<br />
	<br />
	<br />
	<br />
	&nbsp;
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
	<li>&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<ul>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>When Grey Traffic/Fraud related e-Front activity is in pending or completed state, OCN/Call Back number will be visible in notes field. Please note that previously OCN was not visible in this activity due to which agent cannot check or verify the other contact number</li>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase change of ownership or change of SIM of a number is required, however current customer is abroad then below handling will be followed</p>

Submission Channel: 1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 28
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Business Center Agent should send CNIC number of transferrer and transferee at 7000 and verify name/father name according to NADRA database to further verify details before processing this Change of Ownership Request</li>
	<li>Change of Onwership will be processed using Skip Party A option</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p>Required Documents:</p>

<ul>
	<li>NOC from owner/transferor on company&rsquo;s Performa shall be obtained and retained for life. &nbsp;</li>
	<li>Original CNIC and passport including proof of living abroad shall be obtained/scanned and retained for life</li>
	<li>Original CNIC and undertaking from transferee&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Business Center Manager/Team leader will review/verify the documents and upload scanned document in FPU portal<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If customer is abroad and all documents are verified along with NOC as per Jazz format, business center manager should do the verification of all the documents and approve the request</li>
	<li>Same process for verification of documents and processing of COO will be applicable for requests received at Franchises which are then forwarded to Business Center for execution with all verified scanned documents. These requests will be sent by respective FSEs&rsquo; to Business center Manager/supervisor with all verified scanned documents and standard undertaking form</li>
	<li>For above request received from Franchise channel, Business center manager/supervisor will process manual takeover and block number under PMCL Tag. Number will be resumed once biometric verification is performed by new owner</li>
	<li>Attached filled undertaking of &ldquo;Letter for COO - Abroad case Party-A&rdquo;&amp; &ldquo;COO Undertaking Party-B (Abroad case)&rdquo;will be taken so that in case of any dispute over this connection or fake documents, the subject connection/SIM will be blocked, and the customer will have no legal right to challenge the same</li>
	<li>For all other scenarios Business centers should not use SKIP option without written approval from shared CRA POCs&rsquo; as per existing communicated process</li>
	<li>Only Business Center managers/Supervisors are allowed to send email at Jazz regulatory for any exception after verification of all documents and check if process is followed as per direction of Standardization email</li>
	<li>For numbers where, Jazz Cash account is active, it needs to be closed before processing change of ownership as per process</li>
	<li>Extra cautious approach be adopted while processing request for COO of special category numbers to avoid any possible fraudulent transaction<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

		</ul>

	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Scenario 2: Handset/device sale on installment</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Show customer list of handsets/devices available for sale on installment</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Check eligibility of customer against the numbers on his/her CNIC to get handset on installment based on a set credit scoring criteria</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Eligibility criteria</span></span>
			<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
				<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Device eligibility tagged in CRM</span></span>
				<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
					<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Siebel <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Summary <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Assets <span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span> Device Eligible</span></span></li>
				</ul>
				</li>
				<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Only CRM shows eligibility if following criteria is met so consult CRM</span></span>
				<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
					<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Active Postpaid user </span></span></li>
					<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Minimum of 6 months payment history </span></span></li>
					<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Should belong to Silver and above price plan segment</span></span></li>
					<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Should be a part of Green &amp; Orange Category ( As per Internal Credit scoring attached in the email)</span></span></li>
				</ul>
				</li>
			</ul>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">After evaluation process, customer will provide the necessary documentation</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">After verification, a formal agreement will be signed (Attached for reference)</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer will pay the down payment (if applied) and receive the device upfront after agreeing to terms and conditions</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">It is mandatory to write same customer name and number to which handset is being sold</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer wants to avail another handset early payment procedure to be followed as available in chain mail</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="line-height:105%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">After entering handset in efics, installment will be <strong>automatically</strong> added to customer number in <strong>CRM</strong></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="line-height:105%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">There is no need to add installment manually, however ECE needs to check CRM for auto order generation for handset installment</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="line-height:105%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Same product cannot be added twice</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="line-height:105%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If customer insists to purchase similar handset or any other handset with similar bundle previous one will have to be unsubscribed</span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer will be charged complete amount in coming invoice</span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer will be billed for the handset in the next billing cycle</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">System level checks</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">After entering handset in efics, installment will be <strong>automatically</strong> added to customer number in <strong>CRM</strong></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">There is no need to add installment manually, however ECE needs to check CRM for auto order generation for handset installment</span></span></li>

------------------------------------------------------------

Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Customer can&nbsp; visit Experience Center to get offers, bundles or packages activated or deactivated. Submission Channel: 1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Probe the error/issue faced while activating/deactivating &amp; provide possible remedy to customer</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">check Data session &amp; guide customer to turn off data connection for activation/deactivation of desired bundle/offer.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Agent to offer high value customer upfront activation/deactivation for bundle/offer</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Guide mass customer to try after implementing the provided remedy</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Activate the offer/bundle from CRM via following process, if mass customer insist to complaint that he has already tried the provided remedy </span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Siebel&rarr;IN Asset Info &rarr;Prepaid Asset &rarr;Prepaid Assets (Eligible Assets)</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Highlight desired bundle &rarr;select from checkbox available in &ldquo;Sub&rdquo;</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">On successful subscription of offer/bundle product will reflect in &ldquo;Prepaid Assets (Installed Assets)</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Do not launch complaint where data session is &ldquo;On/active&rdquo;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case customer agrees then no need to forward complaint and provision product from Siebel (for Mass customers).</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase customer is complaining that he is unable to act/deact himself from IVR/SMS/USSD repeated then in such exceptional cases generate relevant complaint in Siebel for proper issue resolution</span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">SR type: Value Added Services</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Area: Prepaid</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Sub Area: Bundle offer</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Bundle Name: Other (if bundle/offer not available in list of values)</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Complaint Type: Unable to Sub</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Mention all the details in Summary &amp; Description field</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Before executing the request also check whether the required product is already attempted and failed (will Refer Activities). If a failed activity is available for the same reason, then we will process required complaint as per existing process.</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customer will receive confirmation message once any product is successfully added/deleted through Siebel. In case auto-generated activity gets failed at IN then no intimation SMS will be sent</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Bundle or product that is already deactivated should not be attempted again. For any product or bundle if the attribute value (Pending Cancellation) is 0, product or bundle will be auto-subscribed. Similarly, when attribute value (Pending Cancellation) is 1, we should not process deactivation, as product or bundle will be removed from installed assets at the lapse of expiry however auto subscription will no longer occur as unsub command has been processed in system</span></span></span></p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">We will offer IN provisioning to customer to provide FCR in case of bundle SUB/Unsub issue</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Balance should be sufficient for required Activation of Package/Bundle or Offer</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Active Number</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Take&nbsp;customer&#39;s consent&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Inform&nbsp;subscription charges and nature of offer/bundle i.e. Once-Off or Recursive&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Consult&nbsp;In Queue Activity (if any) IN Provisioning tab for same offer/bundle</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Avoid&nbsp;multiple attempts on already subscribed/unsubscribed offer/bundlee</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Bundles or features that are not allowed on package plans should not be provisioned through Siebel and customers should be handled upfront</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">We need to offer our services first over 111 helpline/EC, where customer has sufficient balance, instead of guiding alternate procedure i.e. IVR/USSD</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Bundles or features that are not allowed on package plans should not be provisioned through Siebel and customers should be handled upfront</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">We will not communicate any TAT to the customer and after consulting activity we will guide customer that product has been added/deleted (after refreshing page and consulting installed assets) and a confirmation SMS will also be sent</span></span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">If SMS Plus Offer is unsubscribed in between validity time, it will immediately be removed from Installed Assets and customer will not be able to use the remaining SMS. However, if Daily SMS Bundle, Daily GPRS bundle (which is also a recursive offer) is unsubscribed in between validity time period then offer will be available in Installed Assets till the expiry time and customer can also use remaining SMS/data till expiry time</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">We can subscribe following 7 bundles on low balance. However; these bundles will be subscribed in suspended state and will be available installed assets in suspended state. SMS notifications will also be sent to customer at the time offer is subscribed in (Suspended status) via CRM; mentioning your offer has been subscribed and can be availed after recharging amount equal to subscription. </span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Daily SMS Bundle - Bundle01</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Daily GPRS Bundle</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">GPRS Late Night offer</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">GPRS LBC GJR, RYK,BWH</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">GPRS Ramadan Offer</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Jazba Bachat Bundle</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">RBT Daily Bundle</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><strong>Delayed Activation/Deactivation of Offers/Bundles/Package Conversion (IN Provisioning) - Handling:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All services which can be provisioned upfront, if a customer complains that he/she is unable to activate/deactivate the required product at his/her end then instead of forwarding complaints at first place</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Incase customer is complaining that he has to call repeatedly for the same issue on 111 for activation/deactivation for a particular offer and unable to process himself from IVR/SMS/USSD then in such exceptional cases we will process relevant complaint for proper issue resolution</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Before executing the request we will also check whether the required product is already attempted and failed (will Refer Activities). If a failed activity is available for the same reason then we will process required complaint as per existing process.</span></span></span></p>
