ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Stuck Order Handling(Pending, Open, To be Verified, Awaiting Approval)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer contacts us for any New Sale, Change of SIM, activation of any product/service however order could not be launched due to stuck Order (Pending, Open, To be Verified) then we will follow below handling to cancell/complete the order.</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>&ldquo;Pending&rdquo; Orders Cancellation:&nbsp;</strong><br />
Pending Order Cancellation Procedure</p>

<ul>
	<li>For Pending orders, we will first take confirmation regarding previous request made by customer</li>
	<li>Then we need to check the line items of pending order
	<ul>
		<li>Incase line items are not Available in that order: new order will be created and previous request needs to be submitted in same order (as per confirmation from customer)</li>
		<li>Incase line items are Available: Will follow the below process&nbsp;
		<ul>
			<li>We need to cancel the pending order.&nbsp;</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Click Order Number&rarr;Go to Activities&rarr;Create Activity &ldquo;Action Required&rdquo;&rarr;&rdquo;Order Error&rdquo;&rarr;Description &ldquo;.&rdquo;&rarr;Change Owner to other Siebel ID of same Franchise and the route back</li>
	<li>Click on same sceen next to order numer</li>
	<li>Click on Exceute Query button on top right of the screen</li>
	<li>After which cancel/submit option will become enabled</li>
	<li>Select reason: Order Cancellation and Cancel order</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Important Note</strong>: In case any activity is routed to any person other than our own Franchise then we will not be able to reroute that activity to our login.</p>

<ul>
	<li>After cancellation of order, new order needs to be created and previous request needs to be processed in same order (as per confirmation from customer)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: It is mandatory to check our own pending orders before day end, in case any order is not submitted we need to submit order on daily basis.&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>For Order Status in pending/provisioning failure state:</strong>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Resubmit the order (just one) and if it gets completed then guide customer accordingly&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>If order again goes into provisioning failure state then we will follow stuck order complaint handling process mentioned below</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>To be Verified Order Handling: Order is in To be verified status (Prepaid/Postpaid)- Provisioning Failures cases</strong></p>

<p><strong>If Only existing stuck Order resolution is required</strong><br />
We will attempt (only once) to Re-Submit order as per process mentioned below:<br />
1. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Click Order Number&rarr;Go to Activities&rarr;Create Activity &ldquo;Action Required&rdquo;&rarr;&rdquo;Order Error&rdquo;&rarr;Description &ldquo;.&rdquo;&rarr;Change Owner to other Siebel ID of same Franchise<br />
2. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Then go to Line items&rarr;Line details&rarr;Click &ldquo;Failure Resolved&rdquo; Check Box to / (tick)<br />
3. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Then Submit order and wait for Change of Order status (&ldquo;Completed&rdquo; or &ldquo;To be Verified&rdquo;)<br />
4. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; If status is changed to &ldquo;Completed&rdquo; then we will guide customer that instructions processed<br />
5. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; If status remains &ldquo;To be Verified&rdquo; then we will follow below guidelines:<br />
&nbsp;<br />
We will consult ieFront&rarr;OMT activities&rarr;</p>

<table cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>&nbsp;&nbsp;Activity Status</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Prepaid</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Postpaid</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>No Activity Available</p>

			<p>or</p>

			<p>Pending without Notes</p>
			</td>
			<td colspan="2">
			<p>Guide customer that issue will be resolved within&nbsp;2<strong> hour</strong>&nbsp;and customer will be informed via SMS</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>On-Hold</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Issue will be resolved within&nbsp;<strong>48 hours</strong>&nbsp;from the time of entering notes. Customer will be informed via SMS(except Blocking Orders)</p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Issue will be resolved within&nbsp;<strong>4 hours</strong>&nbsp;from the time of entering notes. Customer will be informed via SMS(except Blocking Orders)</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p><strong>Open Orders Handling</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If an existing Order is in Open status &amp; tat has been lapsed (Known Issue)</li>
	<li>Guide customer that issue will be resolved earliest possible and customer will receive SMS intimation (system generated)</li>
</ul>

<p>TAT: ASAP (for resolution of stuck order)<br />
&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>If an existing Order is in Open status &amp; tat has been lapsed (Issue Exists)</strong><br />
Ask the complainant if biometric request was successful then go to order TAB and enter MSISDN and check wether order is available or not if order is available but still pending or open then go for complaint in ieFront<br />
Go to ieFront&rarr;Siebel&rarr;Enter MSISDN and select the required reason for Prepaid or Postpaid accordingly and select the reason Order completion required<br />
Mentioned error message in notes also<br />
<strong>Awaiting for Approval:</strong></p>

<p>PFB handling for orders in Awaiting for Approval status where line detail status reflect in pending status. Please note that we will not cancel such orders and follow the below guidelines:</p>

<ul>
	<li>In case any order is in &ldquo;Awaiting for Approval&rdquo; status (exceptional cases) we will escalate number to relevant team&nbsp;and provide TAT of ASAP to customer&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Postpaid Stuck Orders (To be Verified,Open)- Billing Failures cases</strong></p>

<p>For all Postpaid scenarios where any order is stuck (To be Verified, Open status) or any error is received while executing the order then we will create an activity in ieFront under Siebel TAB</p>

<p>Create the activity in ieFront against the following issue by selecting the respective Reason in Efront from drop down menu:</p>

<table cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p><strong>Issues </strong></p>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p><strong>Reason in Efront activity </strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>To be Verified Orders:</p>

			<ol>
				<li>An Old Order is in To be verified</li>
				<li>New Order creation required but an old order is in To be verified status</li>
			</ol>
			</td>
			<td>
			<p>Order Completion Required</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<p>TAT:&nbsp;<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Billing Failure cases TAT is 1 hour for normal case&nbsp;<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;IT dependent Cases Exceptions TAT will be 4 Hours</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Verify if Order exists in pending/open/To be verify state</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Siebel asset status will also be updated accordingly as per the request of Restoration &amp; Blocking processed via OMT header in iefront. (No Order will reflect in Siebel only status will be updated to avoid mismatch cases)</li>
	<li>Handling for Awaiting Approval Order status will remain the same</li>
	<li>In cases like Block on stolen/Restoration etc. Notes are mandatory to be filled. Scenarios where notes/Order field are not mandatory, we will leave these fields blank</li>
	<li>Order number should be mentioned in Order ID field for clarification of complaint</li>
	<li>iefront activity will be automatically routed to Concerned team will create the requested order in Siebel &amp; also clear the previous order</li>
	<li>Incase Change of Sim Order is in Open Status and number is not active, we will create activity in ieFront as per above guidelines&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Incase Order is in To Be Verified status and customer contacts within TAT for status confirmation of the same product/service then we will guide customer to wait for 1 hour (Provisioning failure &amp; billing failure cases)</li>
	<li>Notes are mandatory to be filled in all the cases for required actions.</li>
</ul>

View Type: Franchise
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: VoLTE for Jazz Officials - Activation/Deactivation
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase Jazz official calls over helpline or visit Experience Center/Franchise center for VoLTE service activation/deactivaiton then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1058
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6127
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>VoLTE will be activated/deactivated via Tech team directly in batches. First batch of &ldquo;official numbers&rdquo; will be activated as per criteria (see important points).</p>

<ul>
	<li>In case we receive any request for VoLTE activation at call center or any other touchpoint, below process will be followed
	<ul>
		<li>Agent will guide all pre-requisites for VoLTE service as mentioned in important points</li>
		<li>Agent will politely guide customer to send email to official.phone@jazz.com.pk for provisioning/de-provisioning request of VoLTE service</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Provisioning of VoLTE service will not be done from frontend channels</li>
	<li>In order for VoLTE service to work, LTE must be pre-activated on number</li>
	<li>Currently only official numbers are eligible for activation of VoLTE service</li>
	<li>The numbers which are eligible for VOLTE provisioning must meet the following criteria: :&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Numbers must not have IR service activated</li>
		<li>The following VAS services must not be tagged against the number :
		<ul>
			<li>VIP Call</li>
			<li>My Status</li>
			<li>Wireless Caller ID</li>
			<li>ICS</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>The number should be installed in the whitelisted handset (List will be uploaded in KMS)</li>
	<li>The customer should be in VoLTE covered area (List will be uploaded in KMS)</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Currently eligible base of official numbers will be provisioned for VoLTE directly from backend (Tech) (List will be updated in KMS)</li>
	<li>VoLTE will be visible in assets as &ldquo;VoLTE Postpaid&rdquo;</li>
	<li>VoLTE service activation//deactivation is hidden from CRM</li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Refund (Post to Pre, Port Out, Sale Return)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Warid
Complaint Description: <p>Handling for the cases where postpaid customer request for live refund</p>

Submission Channel: 27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>For Cash refund agent will first move customer deposit into bill through (Adjustment deposit to bill) Process is below</p>

<ol>
	<li><strong>Go to TABS &rarr;&nbsp;Billing &rarr;&nbsp;CSR Billing Toolkit &rarr;&nbsp;Credit &amp; Deposit Allocation &rarr;&nbsp;Select Deposit Allocation</strong></li>
	<li>Enter Subscriber number in Customer. Hierarchy Level Number field.</li>
	<li>Select INVOICE PAYMENT</li>
	<li>Select adjustment amount in field</li>
	<li>And Save the activity.</li>
	<li><strong>Go to Customer Services &rarr;&nbsp;Collection Management &rarr;&nbsp;Invoice Payment</strong></li>
	<li>Enter MSISDN in invoice number field and press TAB.</li>
	<li>Check on &ldquo;Get Invoice&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Enter amount to be adjusted in paid amount field.</li>
	<li>Enter &ldquo;Adjustment deposit to bill&rdquo; in notes field.</li>
	<li>Select &ldquo;Adjustment Deposit in Minus&rdquo; in Payment Method field.</li>
	<li>Press &ldquo;Send Action&rdquo; to save the activity</li>
	<li><strong>Go to Customer Services &gt;&nbsp;</strong><strong>Collection Management &gt;&nbsp;</strong><strong>Subscriber Payment</strong></li>
	<li>Enter MSISDN in subscriber number field and press TAB.</li>
	<li>Enter amount to be adjusted in paid amount field.</li>
	<li>Enter &ldquo;Adjustment deposit to Bill&rdquo; in notes field.</li>
	<li>Select &ldquo;Adjustment Payment&rdquo; in Payment Method field.</li>
	<li>Press &ldquo;Send Action&rdquo; to save the activity.</li>
	<li><strong>Go to TABS &rarr;&nbsp;Billing--Back office Toolkit &rarr;&nbsp;Dispute &amp; Adjustment &rarr;&nbsp;Single Adjustments</strong></li>
	<li>Enter Subscriber number in Customer. Hierarchy Level Number field.</li>
	<li>Select &ldquo;New Debit&rdquo; in Adjustment document field.</li>
	<li>Select GL account code &ldquo;CRF&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Enter &ldquo;Amount to be refund&rdquo; in unit price field.</li>
	<li>Select charge type as&rdquo; ALL&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Press &ldquo;Send Action&rdquo; to save the activity.</li>
	<li>Agent will fetch report from below link for documentation</li>
	<li>Agent will refund from Petty cash available at Business Center and keep refund form and CNIC for record</li>
</ol>

<ul>
	<li>For refund amount than 20000 create following task for process</li>
</ul>

<ul style="margin-left:40px">
	<li>Register complaint &rarr;&nbsp;Complaint &rarr;&nbsp;Bill Adjustment &rarr;&nbsp;Postpaid refund</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Maximum Rs.20,000 refund can be processed via Cash/JazzCash</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>At Jazz, we facilitate our customers with state of the art products and services, however there are situations when customer calls over the &nbsp;helpline and make irrelevant queries and inquire about topics not related to Jazz Products or services.&nbsp; They are intentionally irritating &amp; calling over the helpline again &amp; again, thus leaving an unpleasant experience.&nbsp;Such behavior is not at all tolerated and calls for an appropriate action against &ldquo;Crank Callers&rdquo; after investigation.&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 41
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Incase customer repeatedly calls over helpline, then we need to probe and guide customer to ask about a query related to Jazz services.</li>
	<li>We will request customer twice to ask information related to Jazz but if customer is still inquiring about services not related to Jazz or where customer insists or repeatedly calls, &nbsp;then case will be escalated to TL for callback .</li>
	<li>Complaint will be forwarded by Helpline (TLs/Managers)/ &nbsp;Vendor QA &nbsp;and shall report such cases to VMT.<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Restoration Process:&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to visit Jazz Office, where restoration can be done after receiving written Apology along with CNIC copy and share scanned copy of letter CNIC with VMT.</li>
</ul>

<p>TAT : 1 Business day<br />
&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Warning is issued to such callers through SMS/Call prior to blocking .&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Logs/record of warning call &amp; SMS will be maintained for Complaint management in E-front for visibility. &nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once Crank Callers are tagged in e-front, they are not allowed to route their calls to agents.</li>
	<li>In case customer&rsquo;s helpline is blocked for 111/777, their call will disconnect immediately once they dial IVR</li>
	<li>For self-service IVR, blocked customer can dial 3111 helpline directly&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: GPRS Activation/De-Activation-DBSS
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Handling for the cases where customer request for data service activation</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055,2065
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1062
Point of Contact: Respective Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>To Activate/Deactivate DATA services:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to CSRTB</li>
	<li>Click Contracts</li>
	<li>Enter MSISDN</li>
	<li>Select DATA BARRING</li>
	<li>Select &quot;&quot;temporary barring on customer request&quot;&quot;</li>
	<li>Click on checkbox to add barring</li>
	<li>Press Save (to remove barring uncheck the checkbox and press save)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>To Change connection type (2G,3G,4G):</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to &nbsp; CSRTB</li>
	<li>Click Contracts</li>
	<li>Enter MSISDN</li>
	<li>Press &quot;&quot;change&quot;&quot; on connection type</li>
	<li>Select from 4G,3G,2G</li>
	<li>Press save&quot;</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: Guide customer to switch off &amp; on handset after 15 minutes</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check package plan</li>
	<li>Handset compatibility</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Guiding Charges (prepaid &amp; postpaid) &amp; confirming required GPRS Package Plan (for postpaid) is mandatory</li>
	<li>Please note that prepaid customers who request for IR activation, would continue using their data services in Pakistan</li>
	<li>Currently GPRS is already provisioned in all new prepaid sales</li>
</ul>

Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063,2067
Point of Contact: Respective Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Step 1</strong>: Agent will check ADM for handset detection time (date and time will be probed)<br />
<strong>Step 2</strong>: Check CSRTB Consumption Tab CDRs for data usage after handset detection</p>

<ul>
	<li>If usage shown&rarr;Agent will treat the complaint as browsing complaint and guide customer accordingly.</li>
	<li>&nbsp;If usage not shown&rarr; Agent will check ADM history from &ldquo;Show History&rdquo; tab in ADM and probe status of the last settings sent&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Step 3</strong>: Agent will then ask customer if he saved the settings or not</p>

<p>1.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If settings were saved&rarr; Agent will then probe for the actual issue. Agent will also check the below&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Data Sign&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Standard APN</li>
	<li>SIM in slot 1</li>
	<li>SIM management for data usage</li>
</ul>

<p>2.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If settings were not saved and usage is not shown&rarr;Agent will ask if any changes in APN settings were made&rarr; If changes are made Agent will guide customer the Standard APN and have it updated</p>

<p><strong>Step 4</strong>: In case still setting are required and auto settings available in ADM then the Agent will follow below HV &amp; Mass handling.</p>

<p><strong>Step 5</strong>: If customer is unable to receive settings via ADM then move to below step of manual settings instead of sending the settings or guiding code again.</p>

<p><strong>Step 6</strong>: Standard APN where Manual Settings are Required: Generic APN (any alphabet) for handset settings should not be guided where manual settings are required and we need to educate customers about Standard APN for all cases where manual settings are required however we can guide the customer as per below mentioned suggested statement where customer is unable to perform manual settings.</p>

<p><strong>Standard Statement</strong>:</p>

<p>Moaziz Sarif, Bahtar internet speed hasil karny kay liye Mobile Network option main ja kar Access Point Name settings ko RESET TO DEFAULT kar lain. Shukria</p>

<p>While handling IR with data related requests/queries, please make sure that customers are aware of data settings to use internet services while on roaming. Please follow given process to cater IR customers&rsquo; internet settings related requests/queries.</p>

<ul>
	<li>On activating IR with Data services, guide customers to enable following services from Network/Mobile/Cellular settings
	<ul>
		<li>Mobile Data</li>
		<li>Data Roaming</li>
		<li>Turn Off Wifi</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Guide customer to check APN in Mobile Data settings and update APN as &ldquo;jazz&rdquo; (lower case) to use uninterrupted data services on roaming</li>
	<li>If required, send APN settings from ADM/ISMS and guide customer accordingly</li>
	<li>Note: Same handling to be followed where IR with Data already active and customer inquire about IR with Data services status/details</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Handset should be compatible</li>
	<li>Check the ADM history</li>
	<li>Check the CSRTB for GPRS activation status it should be active</li>
	<li>To check Internet activation status/data barring:
	<ul>
		<li>1. Go to CSRTB--&gt; enter MSISDN in contracts--&gt;click on MSISDN--&gt; scroll down in subscription window--&gt; check connection type (2G,3G,4G)</li>
		<li>2. check in barring window --&gt; check data barring --&gt; data barring should not be active</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>If Mass customers are unable to do manual settings then we should route customers to visit nearest Jazz office as per current practice</li>
	<li>If HV customer is unable to do manual settings then escalate the case to TL for manual settings as per existing handling</li>
	<li>We need to educate customers about below mentioned Standard APN for all cases where manual settings are required</li>
</ul>

Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>The number should be of B2C Catelogue with&nbsp;Gold, J or M series as current package.</li>
	<li>Total credit limit needs to be checked before processing change of package plan(Irrespective of credit limit)</li>
	<li>Clearly guide about pro-ration impact and also send iSMS for details</li>
	<li>Voice discrimination will not be regarded in this case. For example, if female calls on helpline and number is in the name of male, we will process instructions, and vice versa</li>
	<li>Package once&nbsp;converted to Gold or J package will not be allowed to convert to M package</li>
	<li>M / W package can be converted to Gold package only</li>
	<li>Check if device/handset Installment plan is attached on customer MSISDN
	<ul>
		<li>If it is subscribed then guide customer that it will be automatically removed and remaining complete amount will be charged in bill once package plan is changed</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Below error will be received if customer&#39;s bill already reached near to assigned credit limit. Guide customer to either pay more deposit or make bill payment for bundle activation
	<ul>
		<li>&quot;Package XXXX cannot be activated. Subscription bundle percentage is less than decided percentage for bundle subscription, Subscription 923xxxxxxx account credit limit insufficient. Left credit limit -xx.xx&quot;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Data Roaming Bundle Deactivation on Change of Package Plan:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Incase Data Roaming Bundle is active on customer number then it is MANDATORY to guide that data roaming bundle will be auto-deactivated and customer need to resubscribe it after change of package plan is executed (on 2nd of the month.</li>
	<li>Please make sure that we do not schedule any ADD ON activation or deactivation in CSRTB.</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Disown / Re-Own (Prepaid)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer wants to Disown a Prepaid connection then guide customer to visit nearest Business Center or Franchise center.</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6115
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Eligibility Criteria:</strong></p>

	<ul>
		<li>&nbsp;Number must be active for at least <strong>60 days</strong> (or <strong>180 days</strong> for Special Numbers).</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Outstanding Balance (Jazz Advance):</strong></p>

	<ul>
		<li>No outstanding balance should exist for Jazz Advance.</li>
		<li>If Jazz Advance is due, an <strong>error will appear</strong> on the BVS screen.</li>
		<li>If the customer <strong>pays the Jazz Advance</strong>, they must <strong>wait 15 minutes</strong> before reattempting the disown process.</li>
		<li>If disown is reattempted <strong>before 15 minutes</strong>, the same <strong>Jazz Advance due error</strong> may appear again.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Verification &amp; Processing:</strong></p>

	<ul>
		<li>Verify in <strong>CSRTB</strong> that the number exists against the same <strong>CNIC</strong>.</li>
		<li>Disown can proceed even if the number is <strong>blocked for any reason</strong>.</li>
		<li><strong>Fin-FMT blocked numbers</strong> need to be <strong>restored first</strong>, then blocked again for the same reason after disown.
		<ul>
			<li>Numbers blocked by <strong>FMT (Jazz Internal Team - Fin Fraud Management Team)</strong> can be disowned <strong>only after FMT approval</strong>, as per SOP. The disown process should be conducted after <strong>BVS alignment</strong>, and the number must remain <strong>suspended for the same reason</strong> after disowning.</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li>Numbers blocked due to <strong>PTA, PMCL, or dispute reasons</strong> <strong>cannot be disowned</strong> until they are properly restored.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>PMD count will be updated -1 (Real time) (Incase of Disown) and +1(incase of reown)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">

	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Change of Ownership B2I (Available at Selected Franchises)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer visits selected Franchises for Business to Individual Change of Ownership process then we will follow below guidelines. This process is applicable at selected Franchises(list attached)</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 28
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Customer-SPOC-ESEHandling</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer will contact SPOC to initiate Business to Individual conversion</li>
	<li>SPOC will email the request at Business Care/JBC</li>
	<li>Business Care/JBC will get the document vetted from the BSD- Centralized Activation Team &nbsp; (JBC &amp; CAT to vet only those documents where username is the same as CSRTB) &nbsp;(Business Care/ JBC /CAT to ensure the pre-check before forwarding the approval to Franchise)</li>
	<li>Once vetted the same approval email will be sent to the nominated Franchise and its respective ESE&nbsp;to process B2I ( Franchise to process only those cases where letterhead has the same credentials as CSRTB and user has the original CNIC)</li>
	<li>ESE will review documents and forward case to respective Franchise for B2I processing once customer is present in Franchise</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Franchise Handling:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Create case in Super office&nbsp;for business back office team and enter the required details. Following steps will be followed at the franchise as mandatory guidelines:
	<ul>
		<li>Customer will walk in at Franchise Centre for B2I conversion request with active SIM &amp; all necessary documents (Company letter head duly signed by SPOC, Active SIM, CNIC), 5 number check stays intact</li>
		<li>Check the letterhead is (signed /stamped &amp; SAF # mentioned)</li>
		<li>Along with all other pre-requisites should include stamp of sales channel (Franchise) and required signatures</li>
		<li>FCCR&nbsp;need to clear all outstanding *(billed &amp; unbilled)&nbsp;for number activation and conversion as Individual</li>
		<li>Perform the Biometric Verification once go ahead received from BSD-CAT
		<ul>
			<li>
			<p><strong>First Step: On Demand Invoice Creation</strong></p>

			<ul>
				<li>Enter customer MSISDN in CSRTB contracts tab</li>
				<li>Search MSISDN &amp; click on subscription type</li>
				<li>In customers window, click on billing accounts</li>
				<li>Click on billing account details</li>
				<li>Check if customer &quot;Unbilled usage&quot; amount is 0 or has some value *(In case 0, skip first step and go to 2nd step)</li>
				<li>In case amount is available in Unbilled usage, Scroll up and click on billing account ID</li>
				<li>In next window, under open invoices tab click on create on demand invoice</li>
				<li>Check on demand invoice, check billing account (visible on screen) and press save</li>
			</ul>
			</li>
			<li>
			<p><strong>Second Step: Bill/Payment Clearance</strong></p>

			<ul>
				<li>We will now clear customer payment (exact value)</li>
				<li>Go to CSRTB</li>
				<li>Enter customer MSISDN in CSRTB contracts tab</li>
				<li>Search MSISDN &amp; click on subscription type</li>
				<li>In customers window, click on billing accounts</li>
				<li>Click on billing account details</li>
				<li>Check &amp; note down exact bill of customer</li>
				<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; Shop</li>
				<li>scroll down to other sales</li>
				<li>select payments &rarr; Invoice payment &rarr; MSISDN &rarr; Enter MSISDN &rarr; Press continue</li>
				<li>Under invoice information select payment type&nbsp;&rarr; pay as per customer &rarr; enter exact amount &rarr; click submit</li>
			</ul>
			</li>
			<li>
			<p><strong>Third Step: B2I Conversion</strong></p>

			<ul>
				<li>Go to CSRTB</li>
				<li>Click on contracts</li>
				<li>Search number</li>
				<li>click on change in front of subscription type</li>
				<li>under price plan &amp; subscription type change, select checkbox &quot;change to B2C&quot; and select &quot;Change to postpaid&quot; or &quot;change to prepaid&quot; as per customer request</li>
				<li>press next</li>
				<li>for postpaid, select package plan as per customer request and select&nbsp;deposit also check &quot;source customer available&quot; checkbox</li>
				<li>Click on capture fingerprint</li>
				<li>Take fingerprints and submit request</li>
			</ul>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li>After successful BVS, FCCR will create below case&nbsp;and attach&nbsp;Company Letter Head, CNIC Front/Back Scanned Copy
		<ul>
			<li>Create following case in Super office
			<ul>
				<li>General Request &rarr; Postpaid &rarr; BSD in Super office</li>
			</ul>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:&nbsp;</strong>Whenever a B2B number is converted to B2C, there is an option named as <strong>Change to B2C</strong> which <strong>must </strong>be checked in order to have a correct conversion.</p>

<p>Incase front-end only selects the B2C price plan and forgets to select <strong>Change to B2C</strong> option then it will change the package to B2C but the number still remains in B2B hierarchy, hence upfront charges are deducted for a B2C number due to not selecting the <strong>Change to B2C</strong> checkbox</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>This process is applicable at selected Franchises(list attached)</li>
	<li>Franchise will initiate Business to Individual only on ESE email (as mentioned in below process). Franchise will <strong>not </strong>initiate B2I without ESE email</li>
	<li>CNIC</li>
	<li>Active SIM</li>
	<li>5 number check stays intact</li>
	<li>Company letter head duly signed by SPOC, stamped &amp; SAF # mentioned)</li>
	<li>FCCR&nbsp;need to clear all outstanding *(billed &amp; unbilled)&nbsp;for number activation and conversion as Individual</li>
	<li>We should not process requests if the letter&#39;s validity of One Month has expired.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Below handling will be applicable where number is not registered on same customer name but customer has letterhead stating to transfer number on his name in individual name
	<ul>
		<li>Franchise team will share the letter head to BSD-CAT for validation and after successful validation they will share the letter head with OPS team for change of user name processing</li>
		<li>OPS team will update the user name as per letter head and guide franchise team to take BVS of the customer and rest franchise will follow the normal process</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>In case of any delay or further support franchise staff can escalate details over email to Business.Escalations@bpo.abacus-global.com &nbsp;or contact on Hotline 03096666256. This should be followed for any delay observed within 24 hours and not for any routine queries &nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>CSAF form scanned copy print can be used for this purpose if not available however along all other pre-requisites should include stamp of sales channel (Franchise) and required signatures</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>If Change of User Name is required then it will be done before processing B2I. Please note incase username is matches then B2I will not be processed</li>
	<li>Franchise will create below Self-completed Super Office case for JBC/BSD-CAT team&rsquo;s response visibility record keeping and audit purpose, however that case will not be routed to BSD-CAT or JBC
	<ul>
		<li>General Request--&gt;Postpaid/Prepaid--&gt;BSD</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>SPOC acknowledgment will be authentic and needs to be mentioned on letterhead , otherwise refund will not be processed</li>
	<li>Franchise to follow refund process for processing refund amount</li>
</ul>

View Type: Franchise
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Refund of Sale Return, Post to ,Port Out & Deceased case
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer wants to get refund after Sale Return, Post to Pre or Port Out then below process will be followed.</p>

Submission Channel: 1050,35,1051,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Check if Refund case&nbsp;is already in progress and guide status as per notes</li>
	<li>Incase no Refund case&nbsp;found, however Sale Return, Post to Pre&nbsp;already processed against that number then Agent to launch bill adjustment complaint for the cases using the available check list
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Case Type:&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Bill Adjustment</span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Refund</span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Sub Area: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <span style="font-size:14px"><span style="color:black">Payment\Deposit &ndash; Cash , Payment\Deposit &ndash; PO , Payment\Deposit &ndash; Jazzcash , Payment\Deposit &ndash; Jazzload , Payment\Deposit - OTC(JazzCash)</span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Mention issue detail in Summary field:</span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Mention target MSISDN (to receive refund) in Description field</span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Submit the case</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Port Out refund:</span></li>
</ul>

<p>Login Service Now --&gt; Efront --&gt; Enter number --&gt; Select activity Type --&gt; Port out refund --&gt; Select Sub area accordingly --&gt; Alternate Contact number&nbsp;</p>

<p>We need to enter Bill Account Number &amp; Jazz Cash number in Title Field of a refund case in Super Office where refund payment mode is JazzCash Mobile Account (of same CNIC)</p>

<p><strong>Format in Title Field of the Case:</strong><br />
Billing Account Number, Jazz Cash Number<br />
For example:<br />
1244476, 923018489619</p>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> Billing Account here means billing account number against which refund is to be processed and that is terminated billing account.</p>

<p>Payment against terminated postpaid subscribers &ldquo;<strong>having paid invoice details under billing account</strong>&rdquo; can be taken using Shop option Invoice payment under invoice information &ldquo;<strong>Pay per customer option</strong>&rdquo;</p>

<p>Guide customers that they will be intimated on his given contact number once his/her refund amount will be processed at his CNIC as per TAT&nbsp;</p>

<p>Case notes and e-Front will be updated accordingly to guide customer about refund status</p>

<p><strong>TAT:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Refund via JazzCash in Mobile Account &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; : 04&nbsp;working days&nbsp; (1&nbsp;working days for Backend and 3&nbsp;working days for Finance)&nbsp;Final ISMS will be sent once amount is successfully posted by Finance/bank</li>
	<li>Refund via JazzCash on CNIC &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;: 04&nbsp;working days&nbsp; (1&nbsp;working days for Backend and 3&nbsp;working days for Finance) Final closure ISMS &ldquo;to visit Business Center / Franchise / Jazz Cash point&rdquo; will be sent once amount is successfully posted by Finance/bank.</li>
	<li>Refund via Cash &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;: 1&nbsp;working days&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Refund via Cheque &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; : 04&nbsp;working days&nbsp; (1&nbsp;working days for Backend and 3&nbsp;working days for Finance)</li>
	<li>Refund via Jazz Load &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;: 1 working day</li>
</ul>

<p>Note: B<em>ack office team adds bank free slab charges against OTC CNIC refund cases so&nbsp;customer can get refund amount without any over the count deduction.</em></p>

Checklist Items: <p>Refund via JazzCash in Mobile Account</p>

<ul>
	<li>Offer refund through Jazz Cash at his/her any Jazz Cash account (Mobile Wallet) on same CNIC as first option</li>
	<li>If customer has already any existing Jazz Cash (M Wallet) account, then process the case&nbsp;for refund through Jazz Cash by mentioning the jazz cash account in the case</li>
	<li>If customer don&rsquo;t have already Jazz Cash (M Wallet) account, then guide to activate Jazz Cash account by dialing *786# and process the refund case&nbsp;at his/her Jazz Cash (M Wallet) account.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Refund via JazzCash on CNIC</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer is unable to provide or don&rsquo;t want to avail refund through Jazz Cash then offer/guide customer that his refund amount will be sent at his CNIC by which he can get his security refund amount by visiting any nearest retailer shop.</li>
	<li>We need to guide customers positively that company will bear fee charges and they will receive their actual amount of refund as required.</li>
	<li>Refund through CNIC can only be processed for Individual Postpaid Jazz customers only.</li>
	<li>Maximum Rs.50,000 amount can be refunded via Jazz Cash on CNIC (While for upfront Cash refund this limit is Rs.50,000)</li>
	<li>JazzCash rules apply at the time of cash-out</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Refund via Cash</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Maximum Rs. 50,000 refund can be processed via Cash&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Original customer visit required for Cash collection (or NOC, Original CNIC of visitor and CNIC copy of original customer)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Refund via Cheque</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Any amount more than Rs.20,000 will only be processed via Cheque (if Cash or JazzCash option not selected)</li>
	<li>Customer cannot opt for Cheque payment if amount is less than Rs.20,000</li>
	<li>Active Bank account should be available on customer name</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Refund into another Postpaid number on same CNIC</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Refund can be adjusted with financial adjustment case&nbsp;as per customer requirement<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Refund via Jazz Load</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>We should try our best in convincing the customer to opt above two options however if customer is not agreed then we can go for Jazz Load as last option</li>
	<li>Maximum limit for Jazz Load refund is Rs.5,000 while minimum is Rs.30</li>
	<li>Incase Refund amount is less than Rs.30 then it will be processed via JazzCash on CNIC</li>
	<li>Status of Refund can be checked from Refund case&nbsp;notes and Prepaid number&rsquo;s recharge history</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><strong>Refund via Jazz Load</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Maximum limit for Jazz Load refund is Rs.5,000 while minimum is Rs.30</li>
	<li>Incase &ldquo;Jazz Load&rdquo; option is selected for Refund, however final Refund amount is less than Rs.30 or more than Rs.5,000 then same will be processed via Cash(at Business Center) or Pay Order(Remote Areas)</li>
	<li>We need to guide above mentioned point to customer upfront. Customer can opt Refund via Jazz Cash option incase any concern.</li>
	<li>All taxes and fee will be deducted as per normal jazz load transaction.</li>
	<li>For example Jazz Load against Rs.100 will be Rs.88.86.</li>
	<li>Process is being launched at Business Centers and Franchises on Post to Pre conversion refunds only</li>
	<li>Status of Refund can be checked from Refund case&nbsp;notes and Prepaid number&rsquo;s recharge history</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>PO/Cheque:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>PO/cheque is sent on customer address provided at the time of case&nbsp;creation.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Refund via Jazz Cash</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Process is being launched at Business Centers and Franchises on Post to Pre conversion refunds only</li>
	<li>BCE/FCCR need to consult CPS Portal to check if Mobile Account is already available against customer CNIC</li>
	<li>Status of Refund can be checked from Refund case&nbsp;notes and CPS portal/eFront</li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Voluntary Blocking 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case any prepaid/postpaid customer calls on helpline and asks for VOL block, below are the guidelines to be followed.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067,1062,6075
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Postpaid Voluntary Blocking:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; enter number in contracts &rarr; in barring tab, click on change button in front of Vol suspension<strong>&quot;</strong> &rarr; write complete verifications and note CLI &rarr; click checkbox on &quot;voluntary&quot;&nbsp;&rarr; press save &rarr; refresh page and check in memos for notes &amp; instructions completed

	<ul>
		<li>Do not select &quot;Predefined message&quot; &amp; update complete notes in &quot;Message&quot; field</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Prepaid Voluntary blocking ( 90 days from last revenue generating activity)</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; enter number in contracts &rarr; in barring tab, click on change button in front of<span style="color:#ffffff"><strong><span style="background-color:#16a085">&nbsp;<span style="font-size:14px">&nbsp;Vol barring</span></span></strong></span>&nbsp;ïƒ  write complete verifications and note CLI &rarr; click checkbox on &quot;voluntary&quot; &rarr; press save &rarr; refresh page and check in memos for notes &amp; instructions completed</li>
	<li>Do not select &quot;Predefined message&quot; &amp; update complete notes in &quot;Message&quot; field mentioning blocking reason &amp; verification</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p><strong>Prepaid Voluntary blocking ( 90 days from last revenue generating activity)</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Charged activity in last 30 days (revenue generating activity)</li>
	<li>Ask reason for Voluntary blocking</li>
	<li>Probe customer to &nbsp;clarify between block on stolen / Disown and Voluntary blocking. Ensure that BOS or Disown requests are not catered under VOL block</li>
	<li>VOL block will not be committed for more then 90 days from the last revenue generating activity</li>
	<li>After 90 days, number may be permanently blocked/recycled as per policy</li>
	<li>In case of balance availability, customer must be guided to utilize available balance (through balance share/usage etc.)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Postpaid Voluntary blocking</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Valid original customer.</li>
	<li>Number can&#39;t be restored if calling CLI is not the same</li>
	<li>While blocking any number on voluntary tag, it is mandatory to mention verifications in notes</li>
	<li>For Company numbers customer will be routed to KAM/BHL</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:yellow">Agent will guide customer to clear all outstanding dues before VOL block to avoid any late payment fee charges.&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:yellow">If customer insists to block without paying outstanding amount, agent will guide regarding late payment fee.</span> </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Source Sans Pro&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Oustanding balance should not be greater than security deposit. If a number has deposit and his total debt amount&nbsp;is equal to deposit, agent can process the blocking with voluntary suspension tag. <strong>For Example:</strong> A number has 1200 security deposit, then outstanding should not be more than 1200.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> Additional oustanding amount need to be taken from customer.</p>

<ul>
	<li>For Direct debit cases, outstanding dues clearance is not mandatory.</li>
	<li>If number is on waiver so unbilled should be zero, then agent can process voluntary suspension.</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="background-color:yellow">If number suspension exceeds from 60 days - deposit will be released and collection path will be changed to DNR_B2C</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Restoration from Voluntary Blocking (Postpaid)</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p>For the restoration of number customer will call on helpline or visit experience center.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Number can&#39;t be restored if calling CLI is not the same</p>
	</li>
	<li>Check collection path before restoration.Collection path in billing TAB must not be <strong>DNR_B2C.</strong>
	<ul>
		<li>Auto restoration is not applicable on this collection path. Before restoration following checks needs to be taken</li>
		<li>Deposit should be as per Package plan</li>
		<li>In case of write off, write off amount should be cleared&nbsp;</li>
		<li>Pending dues should be cleared.</li>
		<li>If Number is Vol block with Waiver amount and customer wans to restore the number within 60&nbsp;Days,&nbsp;agent can restore the number.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Restore the number from CRM with note proper notes.</p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Restoration from Voluntary Blocking (Prepaid)</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Number can&#39;t be restored if calling CLI is not the same.</li>
	<li>If customer is calling with same CLI &amp; insists to restore the number, agent will enter number in contracts ---&gt; go to barring window &amp; uncheck the TAG of VOL block</li>
	<li>Number can remained blocked for 90&nbsp;days .</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: CallCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: E-Sim Activation Process Information
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>E-sim (Embedded SIM) is an advanced SIM technology which allows you users to a mobile number without having to insert a physical SIM. It will work exactly like a regular SIM with respect to connectivity.</p>

<p>Below guidelines will be followed to facilitate customer</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6115
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Guide customer to visit nearest Jazz Experience Center or Franchise Center for E-Sim issuance or QR Code/scanning complaint</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Except watches, all E-Sim compatible handsets.</li>
	<li>A working Wi-Fi/Internet connection at the time of enabling on handset.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><strong>Pre-requisites</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>There is no change in verification or BVS process.</li>
	<li>Kindly ask customer not to share their QR code with anyone, Customer can save QR Scan by capturing through phone camera and sharing on their own email address (if required)</li>
	<li>QR is scannable via phone.</li>
	<li>There is no limit on <strong>E-SIM scanning</strong> on the same handset. However, if the E-SIM is deleted or removed, it <strong>cannot</strong> be used on a new or changed handset..</li>
	<li>In case handset is stolen, customer will have to purchase E-sim again.</li>
	<li>Any device (Apple watch or other gadgets) that does not support Jazz E-sim will be&nbsp;customer&#39;s responsibility.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong>&nbsp;It is <span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>MANDATORY </strong></span>to ask customer before issuing E-Sim that it will be the customer&#39;s responsibility if the handset is carrier-locked. (No acknowledgement of any complaint in this regard)</p>

<p><strong>E-Sim Availability</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>E-sim is available for ordering at Experience &amp; Franchise Centers nationwide.</li>
	<li>E-sim can now also be&nbsp;issued to WARID customers through Experience Center or Franchise Center.</li>
	<li>E-sim will be charged to Business Customer as per charges mentioned in <strong>Service Charges</strong> field above.</li>
	<li>Jazz employees can get FOC E-sim on their official number only from Experience Center.</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Category: Both

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Change of Ownership (Deceased Case)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In order to make deceased customer&rsquo;s change of SIM/ownership process more secure, please find below revised handling.</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6115
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p><strong>FIR requirement related FAQs on Non-possession of SIM</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Does the customer need to provide FIR or police complaint?</span></span></span></span>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Original FIR is required as per PTA.</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Any particular information to be mentioned in FIR?</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">It should explicitly mention that SIM/MSISDN (Mobile Number) which was registered on the deceased relative&rsquo;s CNIC was lost/misplaced by the claimant.</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Are there any exceptions in this scenario?</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">No exceptions as of now </span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">In case FIR is provided, do we still need to block number for 2&nbsp;days?</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Yes, in absence of SIM number should be blocked for 2&nbsp;days</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Can the number be blocked before FIR (all other requirements are fulfilled &amp; inform customer to bring FIR) or block the number once FIR is provided?</span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Yes the number can be blocked provided he has given all the other pre-requisite documents and his relation with deceased is verified by the provided documents.</span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <p>Guide customer to visit nearest Jazz Experience Center or Franchise Center with required documents</p>

Checklist Items: <p>Guide customer to visit Jazz Experience Center or Franchise Center with below documents:</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Only immediate family member can get the duplicate SIM and ownership transferred</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">a.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Original family registration certificate (FRC) need to be presented to verify family tree</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">b.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;NOC/Affidavit by other family members in favor of transferee</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">c.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Original CNIC of deceased&nbsp;(Photocopy if original CNIC surrendered at NADRA and surrender confimed via cancellation certificate issued by NADRA)</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">d.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Original CNIC of transferee</p>

<p style="margin-left:80px">e.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Signed undertaking from applicant (Party-B) shall be arranged as per standard template (Draft attached)</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Death certificate (issued by Govt. body like Union Council, NADRA etc.</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Possession of SIM must be ensured.which should be scanned and saved in system</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Check last recharge/last call history</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">(v)&nbsp; &nbsp; Possession of SIM must be ensured. In case of non-possession of SIM, original FIR should be provided to be obtained/scanned and retained for life(Check FAQs for details)&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px">Note: Also For refund case, above documents are required.</p>

<p style="margin-left:40px"><strong>Cancel Case scenario</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Debt payment can&rsquo;t be taken against&nbsp;takeover/ownership terminated billing account subscribers&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Refund requests are being put on hold as where billed amount = &gt; 100 was not cleared against multiple billing accounts and Ported out subscribers.</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:40px">Note: Refund will only be processed where debt amount is &lt; 100 against&nbsp;takeover cases.</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Possession of SIM must be ensured. In case of non-possession of SIM, original FIR to be obtained/scanned and retained for life</li>
	<li>Duplicate SIM to new owner will be issued/activated after BVS through NADRA as per process</li>
	<li>Attached undertaking will be taken filled and signed by transferee that in case of any dispute over this connection or fake documents, the subject connection/SIM will be blocked, and the customer will have no legal right to challenge the same</li>
	<li>For closing of &nbsp;deceased account the legal heirs of deceased can submit all the requisite documents in Jazz Business centers/ or Mobilink Bank Branches as per existing process. Once JazzCash account is closed then change of ownership will be processed</li>
	<li>If SIM is lost, Experience Center after receiving Change of ownership request will block the SIM. Change of ownership will be done after two<strong>&nbsp;working days</strong> of receipt of request and new SIM to be issued via BVS after COO</li>
	<li>Same documents to be provided for refund cases. New customer is eligible to have the&nbsp;refunded&nbsp;amount present in previous account. New undertaking&nbsp;form is attached.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>TAT: 2 BD (Normal number) if sim is lost</strong></p>

<p><strong>4 BD (golden number &amp; above) if sim is lost</strong></p>

</ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">For number on IR total responsibility is on executor against any financial exposure.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">DNB request will be catered for a dispute or exceptional case.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#333333"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">DNB numbers&rsquo; timeline can be updated/edited for pending cases only, by following all guidelines</span></span></span></span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Restoration on Deposit Release/ No Deposit/ Write off/DNR_B2C/Dormant_B2C
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase Postpaid number is blocked on Insufficient/no deposit/DNR_B2C&nbsp;then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6175,1062
Point of Contact: CC-CRM Credit Monitoring Team
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Create below case in Super Office for restoration and credit limit enhancement of number blocked on deposit released if required payment received and reflecting in system</p>

<p><strong>Scenario 1: Where sufficient deposit is available</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Case Type: &nbsp; Account Administration</li>
	<li>Area: &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Credit Profile</li>
	<li>Sub Area: &nbsp; &nbsp; Postpaid/without financial adjustment</li>
	<li>Summary Field: &ldquo;Deposit Released Restoration and Credit Limit&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Fill all LOV&#39;s and create case</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Scenario 2 : where deposit is insuffIcient &amp; customer has over payment as bill in CSRTB</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Case Type: &nbsp; Account Administration</li>
	<li>Area: &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Credit Profile</li>
	<li>Sub Area: &nbsp; &nbsp; Postpaid/with financial adjustment created</li>
	<li>Fill all LOV&#39;s and create case</li>
	<li>TAT: Every 4 hours, and cases created between 1 pm to 5 pm will be processed next day</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Also make 2nd case:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Case Type: Billing adjustment</li>
	<li>Area: Financial movement&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Sub area: bill to deposit</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>The restoration process of DNR_B2C collection Path</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p>After checking the&nbsp;check list, restoration task should be created in Super office under &ldquo;Credit Management Team&rdquo; header. ( Collection path can be checked in attachment)</p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>TAT</strong>: 3 hours (for cases created between 9:30 AM till 5:30 PM) Monday to Saturday</p>

<ul>
	<li>.Any case which will be created after 5:30Pm will be catered after 9:30am on next working day.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>All cases which will be created after 5:30 Pm on Saturday will be catered on Monday</strong></p>

<p><strong>The restoration process of Dormant_B2C collection Path</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Number will be auto resumed after required payment</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Credit limit:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>For CL increase/decrease make task in super office&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Type</strong> : Account administration</p>

<p><strong>Area</strong>: Credit profile</p>

<p>Sub area : As required</p>

<p>TAT: 3 hours</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><strong>DNR_B2C&nbsp;</strong>collection path should be checked.</li>
	<li>Waiver amount will not be considered in DNR_B2C collection path.</li>
	<li>Customer has to pay security deposit in cash/credit card&nbsp;at Front-end channel before restoration.</li>
	<li>If customer has enough negative balance&nbsp;and he wants to adjust that balance in the deposit, then financial adjustment case&nbsp;is also mandatory in relevant system, mentioning the complete supporting information as per financial adjustment process</li>
	<li>In case of Deposit release/write off/collection cases old waiver code is not acceptable. Customer has to pay security deposit according to package plan.</li>
	<li>Security deposit amount should be received from&nbsp;customer at front-office as per package plan and access level requirement (keeping track of all associated subscriptions of a single account) before restoration request
	<ul>
		<li>CSRTB&rarr;Contracts&rarr;Customers windown&rarr;Billing accounts tab&rarr;click on &ldquo;Billing account details&rdquo;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Clearance of total debt amount is also mandatory for restoration if applicable (along with security deposit amount)</li>
	<li>In case if there is any amount written off, customer also needs to pay the written off amount with required security deposit in order to get the number restored.
	<ul>
		<li>Write off amount can be confirmed from billing tab&nbsp;(C&amp;C info)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:bottom">
			<p style="text-align:center"><strong>C&amp;C Info</strong></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>Take Write-off amount RS. XXX and Deposit as per package plan Requirement</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td style="vertical-align:bottom">
			<p>Deposit released XXX -Take deposit as per package plan requirement</p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

<ul>
	<li>If the collection path is DNR_B2C and as per CC-Info number is suspended due to write-off (the number can be suspended for other reasons) then the customer must pay the mentioned write-off amount and a security deposit as per the assigned package plan before the restoration and front-end staff needs to ensure this before restoring the number. The number must not be on the write-off suspension reason in barring tags.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
	<li>Incase call lands with Warid postpaid segment agent for details of Jazz number or vice versa (where legacy system login is not available with agent) then agent will create Escalation activity for Escalatin desk/Team Leader and guide customer to wait for call back</li>
	<li>However if customer insists then agent will confirm details from Escalatin desk/Team Leader by requesting customer to hold on the call.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>The restoration process of DNR_B2C collection Path</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Auto restoration is not applicable on this collection path. Before restoration following checks needs to be taken</li>
</ul>

<ol>
	<li>Deposit should be as per Package plan</li>
	<li>In case of write off, write off amount should be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Pending dues should be cleared</li>
	<li>For Ex-employee package plan Rs.1000 Security deposit is required.</li>
</ol>

<p><strong>Note: </strong>IR access will be disbaled at the time of restoration on deposit release &amp; write off.</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>No restoration on commitment is taken in this scenario.</li>
	<li>DNR-B2C collection path should be checked. Auto Restoration in this scenario is not applicable. All the checklist must be followed.</li>
	<li>In case any postpaid number is suspended on Deposit Released (suspension reason in CSRTB is reflecting as &ldquo;Deposit Released&rdquo;) then we need to refer to blocking notes and ledger properly</li>
	<li>Consult system CSRTB for billing details of Postpaid number.</li>
	<li>Guide customer to pay his outstanding if any and ask for security deposit amount as per package plan &nbsp;prior to resume number</li>
	<li>ECE will ask customer to clear write off amount along with deposit as per Package plan.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Implementation of RPA/BOT (automated system)</strong></p>

<p>CNC team has implemented BOT(automated system)&nbsp;for Deposit released &amp; write-off restoration cases.&nbsp;BOT will resume only those cases where below scenarios will be True and accurately provided</p>

<p>&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Collection path = DNR_B2C<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;C&amp;C is not Null<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Deposit paid as per package plan<br />
&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Write off amount cleared if any</p>

<p>Therefore, for change of collection path for conversion or termination sufficient security deposit need to be available to avoid any undue financial exposure</p>

<ul>
	<li>Please be informed that&nbsp;for the DNR Restoration Tasks\waiver issuance for Pre to post during Ramadan. Team will handle these tasks from 9:00 am to 3:00 pm, and on Friday from 9:00 am to 12:00 pm.</li>
</ul>

SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Grey Traffic, Spammer Fraud -FMT, Fraud,Fraud -CU-PTA Blocked Numbers Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case customer reacher to jazz touchpoints&nbsp;for restoration of a number blocked&nbsp;on Grey Trafice, Fraud or Spamming reasons then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Blocking Reson:&nbsp;Grey traffic-FMT or&nbsp;Fraud-FMT, Fraud</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Incase number is blocked in CSRTB by FMT and no record in eFront then will launch auto-complete request in eFront with MSISDN, CNIC, Blocking Reason, Unblocking Type and Call back number(CBN)</li>
	<li>Guide customer that customer will be informed via SMS on blocked number if number is restored and on Call back number if cannot be restored or need to visit Office for further processing.</li>
</ul>

<p>TAT: 24 Hours (including Saturday/Sunday) For example: activity launched at 11:00 AM will be resolved by 10:59 AM next day</p>

<p>How to check FMT response against Restoration Request launched in eFront:</p>

<ul>
	<li>FIN-FMT will receive eFront data automatically via email</li>
	<li>FIN-FMT will evaluate if number can be restored or not</li>
	<li>Incase number is restored by FIN-FMT then system generated restoration SMS is sent on problematic number</li>
	<li>ncase number is not restored by FIN-FMT then need to check eFront iSMS history against Call Back number to check FIN-FMT response and guide customer accordingly</li>
	<li>Incase number is not restored and no details available in iSMS history against call back number then we will again launch same complaint in eFront</li>
	<li>ECE&nbsp;will send the above documents/ information in below format&nbsp;to mentioned email IDs</li>
</ul>

	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li>Dear Customer, your number has been restored. Thank you!</li>
	</ul>
	</li>

	<li>Customer can directly coordinate PTA offices or use their online portal at <span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><a href="https://complaint.pta.gov.pk/RegisterComplaint" style="color:#0563c1; text-decoration:underline">https://complaint.pta.gov.pk/RegisterComplaint</a></span></span></li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p><strong>Blocking Reson:&nbsp;Grey traffic-FMT or&nbsp;Fraud-FMT, Fraud</strong></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Check number status in CSRTB and eFront activities to check if any previous request available</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>When Grey Traffic/Fraud related e-Front activity is in pending or completed state, OCN/Call Back number will be visible in notes field. Front end agent will continue to make activity as per existing process however when they have to check the OCN in same activity then they can refer notes field where required. Please note that previously OCN was not visible in this activity due to which agent cannot check or verify the other contact number</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Blocking Reason: Grey Trafic-PTA</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Restoration request of PTA blocked Grey Traffic numbers should be send before 04:00 PM, the request sent after 04:00 PM will be catered in the compiled file sent on the day end next day.</li>
	<li>All required documents should be attached in a single zip folder in the same email.</li>
	<li>Customer may also contact to PTA for restoration of such numbers</li>
	<li>Written Undertaking statement should describe that number is in personal/ Business use and is not involved in illegal activities</li>
	<li>If customer&rsquo;s numbers is reported 2nd time in grey traffic then customer needs to coordinate with PTA only</li>
</ul>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer calls over helpline and asks for VoLTE services activation/deactivation then below guidelines will be followed</p>

Submission Channel: 41,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ul>
	<li>Attached</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <p><strong>VoLTE Activation:</strong></p>

<p>In case we receive any request for VoLTE activation at call center&nbsp;below process will be followed</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will guide all pre-requisites for VoLTE service as mentioned in Checklist</li>
	<li>VoLTE will be activated&nbsp;in CSRTB: Go to CSRTB&rarr;Enter MSISDN in contracts&rarr;In barring window click on VAS&rarr;VoLTE&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Guide customer that auto notification will be pushed once VoLTE will be subscribed</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>VoLTE Deactivation:</strong></p>

<p>In case we receive any request for VoLTE deactivation at call center&nbsp;below process will be followed</p>

<ul>
	<li>VoLTE will be deactivated&nbsp;in CSRTB: Go to CSRTB&rarr;Enter MSISDN in contracts&rarr;In barring window click on VAS&rarr;&nbsp;VoLTE&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Guide customer that auto notification will be pushed once VoLTE will be Un-subscribed</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>To check handset compatibility with VolTE consult ADM
	<ul>
		<li>Check ADM--&gt;VoLTE--&gt;Support--&gt;Yes/No
		<ul>
			<li>Request will be launched <strong>only if </strong>handset(visible in ADM) is mentioned&nbsp;<strong>Yes</strong> in above fieled</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Service is committed on IPHONE X and above models
	<ul>
		<li>There will no separate sign of HD on IOS handset during call like android sets, only LTE will be written and data will be connected</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>VoLTE service is available for all Postpaid and Prepaid service classes</li>
	<li>VoLTE will be visible in CSRTB: Go to CSRTB&rarr;Enter MSISDN in contracts&rarr;In barring window click on VAS&rarr;Check if VoLTE is active</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>The number should be installed in the VoLTE enabled handset and VoLTE enabled in handset settings to use this service</li>
	<li>In case any customer wants to deactivate VoLTE service or is complaining regarding USSD/Short code /CLI issue *(where VoLTE service is active) We will guide customer to deactivate/disable VoLTE service</li>
</ul>
