ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: System Not Available / No Communication | No Response/Distortion/ Call drop
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">At jazz we aspire to live up to &nbsp;become a &ldquo;Customer Obsessed&rdquo; organization, &nbsp;and each day of our week, we engaged with &nbsp;our customers at the Call Centers. </span></span></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">We have&nbsp;established certain guidelines(given below) where &nbsp;customer face &ldquo;No Response/Distortion/ Call drop&rdquo; and to avoid ways where this &nbsp;work code may hinder our NPS and FCR negatively.</span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1045
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><em><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Process for Handling Customers during distortion. </span></span></span></em></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Step 1: Listen, Use your best listening skills. ...</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Step 2: Remain Calm, Actively sympathize, Apologize gracefully for distortion &hellip;. </span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Step 3: Repeat Information. ...</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Step 4: Avoid the Hold Button. ...</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Step 5: Do not <strong><span style="background-color:white">hang up</span></strong><span style="background-color:white">&nbsp;the phone on <strong>customers</strong></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Step 6: Find a solution and wait for <strong>25-30 seconds</strong> if contact is not established &hellip; </span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">Step 7: Make the Caller Happy&hellip;.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">The Long List of Things That Can Destroy Our Customer Service</span></span></span></strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040"> and below are few <strong>Coaching</strong> pointers &nbsp;that can help in improving NPS and FCR<strong> </strong></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#404040"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Do not give<strong> false information</strong> to customer in order to bring the contact to a swifter conclusion. </span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#404040"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Pretending to Not Hear the Caller</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">: There are calls where agents were &nbsp;pretending they could not hear the caller and advising them to call back. This will increase repeat calls on contact center.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="color:#404040"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Burying Important Information</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">, &nbsp;or unclear about information. this will hurt NPS and brand image. Please use standard scripts and information flow during call.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#404040"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Customers want to speak to <strong>good listeners</strong> that hear the problem the first time. Improve listening skills</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#404040"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">System Failures, <strong>Know the Contact Centre Systems,</strong> improve IT skills , the more tech-savvy agent will be he or she is most likely be quicker to complete a call. </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#404040"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Avoid Silence on Calls or Excess Hold Times</span></span></strong></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#404040"><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Take Ownership of the Conversations and queries and assist them upfront or guide self-service where applicable. </span></span></strong></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#404040"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Pick Up on Reasons for Customer Stress and Unhappiness that is &ldquo;what was making the customers so upset earlier?&rdquo;&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#404040">In this spirit we should be vigilant while serving all our customers.</span></span></span></span></span></p>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.

Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C

Complaint Description: <p>Incase number is blocked on &quot;Operator&quot; or &quot;Customer&quot; reason then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 41,27,32

Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP

Service Request Activity: <p>Blocking Reason: &ldquo;Operator&rdquo;:&nbsp;Call Center and Experience Center</p>

<ul>
	<li>Process restoration upfront if verification and checklist is OK</li>
	<li><strong>TAT:</strong> Immediate</li>
</ul>

<p>Blocking Reason: &ldquo;External&rdquo;:&nbsp;Call Center and Experience Center</p>

<ul>
	<li>Process restoration upfront after level 3 verification</li>
	<li><strong>TAT</strong>: Immediate</li>
</ul>

<p>Blocking Reason: &ldquo;Operator&rdquo;: Franchise Center (through respective FSE)</p>

<ul>
	<li>FSE to create below case in&nbsp; Super Office if verification and checklist is OK&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Creator Tab&rarr;Restoration - Postpaid&rarr;Restoration &ndash; Prepaid or Postpaid</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>TAT:</strong> 4 Hours</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Blocking Reason: &ldquo;Customer&rdquo;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Create below case in Super Office for backend team if verification and checklist is OK
	<ul>
		<li>Creator Tab&rarr;Restoration - Postpaid&rarr;Restoration &ndash; Prepaid or Postpaid</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>TAT:</strong> 4 Hours</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Bill payment should be clear (check credit limit and outstanding balance) (if Postpaid)&nbsp;and no visa expiry issue</li>
	<li>Incase blocking reason is &ldquo;Customer then&nbsp; Check BVS timestamp(CNIC sale) or document verified/visa expiry (Passport sales)&nbsp;along-with Same CLI+Name+CNIC verification
	<ul>
		<li>Check BVS timestamp from Biometric tab or from MEMOs. For passport document validation check MEMOs under Type &quot;services barrings&quot;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Both Postpaid/Pre-paid/Other Network customer, can buy Digit4G hand set on full payment </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Ported out/other networks SIM will only work in SIM slot 2</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer wants to buy DIGIT4G Handset with existing Jazz Sim <u><strong>OR</strong></u></span></span>&nbsp;<span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">In case customer wants to buy DIGIT4G handset with new SIM/CYN</span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">All cash sale handsets are not network locked </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Sim slot 1 will only be workable with Jazz sims</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Sim slot 2 can have any other network sim activated</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">On cash sale incentives (free Mins+MBS) will be activated within 72 hours if slim slot 1 has Jazz network sim in case customer insert other network sim 1<sup>st</sup> time in sim slot 1 incentive will not posted</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Data usage should be performed in order to be eligible for above incentive </span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Handset free minutes and MBs are only provided to pre-paid customers, Post-paid is not eligible for this offer </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">All Digit4G handset are PTA approved</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Digit4G handset can be used as a wifi device through hotspot</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Warranty claim will only be processed by Jazz Digit4G warranty claim centers</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Guide all related product details </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Full price handsets both slots are 4G</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The above mentioned process is DFP installment plan offered to customer </span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Experience Center agent will make sure to guide customer below steps before making a sale, it is of utmost importance that both agent and customer are aware of DFP policy</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Total handset price will be 1800+340+340 = 2480/- which will be guided by agent to the customer before processing sale as 2 bundles required for activation at time of sale</span></span></li>

	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">IMSI which is being activated with handset will be considered paired IMSI, Therefore bundle will also be activated on same number and same need to be guided to customer</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Currently there is no system level check of IMSI &amp; handset being sold separately, EC agent must use the paired IMSI and IMEI for sale carefully</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Entry in EFRONT is a must step and will be performed carefully (IMEI1 + Customer CNIC + CNIC Issuance date)</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Data must be connected on paired number (IMSI should be same which is provided in box) after sale to report sale in KAI OS</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e74c3c"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Bundle activation other than paired number will not be considered as installment payment</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="color:red">There is no option to change the paired number</span></span></span></li>

------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>To handle the cases where customer request to add / edit email address for billing, following guidelines will be followed</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1045,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: pringle.charles
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6175,6111
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; Enter customer number in Consumer tab &rarr; In customer window, scroll down to field &ldquo;email&rdquo; &rarr; Click change in front of email</li>
	<li>Enter New Email Address and Click Save</li>
	<li><s>Customer will receive&nbsp;link&nbsp;for email address validation in 24 hours.&nbsp;</s><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:yellow">(Email validation&nbsp;has been removed)</span></span></span></li>
	<li><s>Guide customer to click on the link whenever he recieves on his email adress.</s></li>
	<li><s>On clicking the link, email will be verified and CSRTB will be updated</s></li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Verify customer email address</span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Go to CSRTB<span style="font-family:Wingdings">&agrave;</span>Customer tab</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>We need to update email address and also change their bill handling code to email if it is SMS only so that customer can receive monthly bill regularly onwards</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Guide customer that email address updated against one number on a CNIC will be applicable for all numbers on that CNIC</li>
	<li>In case asked, guide customer that option to update email on only one number, whereas mutiple numbers exist on a CNIC, is not possible</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Email address update self-service through SMS to 2000</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customers can get their email address updated in CSRTB by sending email address to 2000 via SMS from any CLI active on their CNIC</li>
	<li>This will update same email address against all numbers active against a CNIC in CSRTB</li>
	<li>We need to promote email address update self-service for future reference if change in email address is required (along-with facilitating customer for same service upfront)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: CVM Offers Deactivation Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer contacts Jazz for details or deactivation of offer/bundles offered by CVM team then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 27,32,3069
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Information Handling:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Consult CSRTB&rarr;Notifications and guide offer details as mentioned in CVM broadcast SMS</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Deactivation Handling:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customers can unsubscribe the bundle via USSD string which is always communicated within the promotional message</li>
	<li>Guide customer to dial the USSD string for un-subscription mentioned in SMS broadcast</li>
	<li>Or Consult CSRTB&rarr;<strong>Notifications </strong>and guide un-subscription string upfront</li>
	<li>We will not create CVM offer deactivation case in Super Office but if customer complaint that he\she is unable to deactivate offer through USSD then create a case in super office with proper checklist</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Case LOV&#39;s:&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>Type:&nbsp;</strong>Value Added Services</p>

<p><strong>Area</strong>:&nbsp;Prepaid</p>

<p><strong>Sub area</strong>:&nbsp;CVM Offer&nbsp;</p>

<p>If case will received with incomplete details then the backend team will cancel the case and&nbsp;send the relevant deactivation SMS to customer.</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Check Notifications in CSRTB</li>
	<li>Guide offer deactivation USSD&nbsp;to customer</li>
</ul>

<p>If customer is unable to deactivate offer through USSD then agent needs to create a case in super office and below mentioned checlost needs to be followed:</p>

<ol start="1" style="list-style-type:decimal">
	<li>Bundle Name</li>
	<li>Deactivation Code</li>
	<li>Exact Error</li>
	<li>The date &amp; Time of the issue</li>
</ol>

<p>If case will received with incomplete details then the backend team will cancel the case and&nbsp;send the relevant deactivation SMS to customer&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Bill Info / Restoration Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase customer contacts Jazz and wants to know bill details of his/her number or wants to get number restored (blocked on Credit Control) then we will follow below guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1044,1056,1045
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067,1062
Point of Contact: Respective Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Bill Details</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>incase customer contacts Jazz to inquire about their postpaid bill amount then we need to consult CSRTB and guide bill details as per customer query. For example:
	<ul>
		<li>Unbilled Amount if customer asks for ongoing months usage</li>
		<li>Last Invoice Amount if customer asks for last month bill amount</li>
		<li>Total Debt amount if customer asks for total bill amount</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>If a Postpaid number is blocked on billing reasons then we need to consult CSRTB, check bill details and guide customer to make required payment for auto-restoration. We will <span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>NOT </strong></span>restore Postpaid number blocked on &ldquo;Credit Control&rdquo; reason in any case</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note:</strong> For postpaid number if number is not auto restored after required bill payment then agent will create case in below mentioned cataogeries.&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Creator Tab-&gt;&gt; Restoration- Postpaid-&gt;&gt; Restoration- Postpaid&nbsp; </strong></p>

<p>However please check if collection path is&nbsp;DNR_B2C then &quot;Restoration on Deposit Release/ No Deposit/ Write off/DNR_B2C&quot; process will be followed</p>

<p><strong>MRA - Minimum Restoration Amount</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer specifically asks for minimum payment required for restoration then check Minimum Restoration Amount mentioned in billing account details in CSRTB and guide customer to make this&nbsp;<strong>exact&nbsp;</strong>payment for auto restoration</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Jazz Digital Drive</strong></p>

<p>Billing Info</p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer calls for billing information, politely guide customer
	<ul>
		<li>&ldquo;Sir/Madam, ap apne bill k malumaat bilkul free Jazz World App, WhatsApp ya&nbsp;*1111#/*446# dial kar ka nahiyat asani sa khud hasil ker saktay hain&rdquo;.
		<ul>
			<li>&lsquo;kaya ma ap ko yahan sa bata do yea malumat khud check kerna ka tarika bhaj do?</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>if &lsquo;Yes&rsquo; then</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will send iSMS for billing related information. (Call Closed with NPS statement)</li>
</ul>

<p>If &lsquo;No&rsquo; or customer insist to provide details upfront then</p>

<ul>
	<li>we will extend our help towards customer and guide him/her as per current process along&nbsp;with guiding self-service procedure for future reference (Call Closed with NPS statement)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Postpaid Package/ Incentive Info</p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer calls for Postpaid Package/ Incentive Info, Agent will politely guide customer
	<ul>
		<li>&ldquo;Sir/Madam, ap apne Package/Incentive k malumaat bilkul free Jazz World App, WhatsApp&nbsp;ya *2222#/*446# dial kar ka nahiyat asani sa khud hasil ker saktay hain&rdquo;
		<ul>
			<li>&lsquo;kaya ma ap ko yahan sa bata do yea malumat khud check kerna ka tarika bhaj do?</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>if &lsquo;Yes&rsquo; then</p>

<ul>
	<li>Agent will send relevant ISMS for Package/ Incentive Info. (Call Closed with NPS statement)</li>
</ul>

<p>If &lsquo;No&rsquo; or customer insist to provide details upfront then</p>

<ul>
	<li>We will extend our help towards customer and guide him/her as per current process along&nbsp;with guiding self-service procedure for future reference (Call Closed with NPS statement)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>*6767# - ROC (Restoration on Commitment)</p>

<ul>
	<li>Incase number is Outgoing blocked only then we can guide *6767# self-service facility if customer insists for restoration as payment will be made later (as per restoration on commitment process available in KMS). Please note that&nbsp;*6767# will NOT&nbsp;work if incoming is also blocked</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p>Barring type &quot;OG Barring&quot; and &quot;Bar Suspend&quot; with reason &quot;Credt control&quot; reflect if number is barred on billing reasons</p>

<p>Barring Type &quot;Bar Suspend&quot; - Both Incoming and Outgoing Blocked and No Line Rent Charging<br />
<img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," /></p>

Important Points: <ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Blocking of Numbers/Related Numbers using objectionable/derogatory language
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incase a customer uses objectionable/derogatory language against Jazz staff/company then we will follow below process for&nbsp;blocking of number&nbsp;and related Numbers. Restoration guidelines are also given</p>

Submission Channel: 41,35
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6132
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Complaint Escalation:</strong><br />
Communication Unit/Social Media Team will forward email to Legal team with relevant snapshot of email/Tweet/Message as an attachment for record purpose</p>

<ul>
	<li>Call center Team Leader will escalate case via email with CX-VMT with call landing details</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;<br />
<strong>Complaint Validation by CX-VMT/Comm. Unit</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>CX-VMT/Comm. Unit Team will evaluate and update response in relevant case
	<ul>
		<li>For call center, CX-VMT team will listen to the call and aforementioned process will be followed.&nbsp;</li>
		<li>If required, will arrange call listening for legal team (No recordings to be shared)</li>
		<li>Comm. Unit will ensure only relevant number(s) are blocked which are established with the case(to avoid irrelevant number blocking). This is critical as email/social media can mention any CLI (even if not owned by abuser)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>In case blocking not recommended: CX-VMT/Comm. Unit will update notes in Super Office case and close the case</li>
	<li>In case blocking recommended: CX-VMT/Comm. Unit will update notes in Super Office case and send case to legal team to get their verdict</li>
</ul>

<p>TAT: 1 business hour</p>

<p>Legal Team response TAT: Same day</p>

<ul>
	<li>Once Legal teams&rsquo; verdict received, CX-VMT/Comm. Unit team will forward email to help desk team (along with copy to channel from where blocking request was initiated) for number blocking</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Case Creation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Communication Unit/CX-VMT/Social Media Team will create below self-completed case in Super Office with relevant snapshot of email/Tweet/Message as an attachment for record purpose while sending email for blocking to CX-Helpdesk
	<ul>
		<li>Type: General Complaint Area: Operational Sub Area: Operational</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Restoration Handling</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Customer will visit Jazz Experience/Franchise Center and submit prescribed written apology letter/undertaking on Rs.50/Rs.100 stamp paper</li>
	<li>Experience Center team will share scanned copies with legal team for their go ahead and will keep in loop CX-Helpdesk.</li>
	<li>Once go ahead is received from legal, help desk team will proceed for relevant number(s) restoration along with proper comments (for other channels future visibility and record).</li>
</ul>

<p>CX-Helpdesk TAT: 1-hour</p>

<ul>
	<li>Hardcopy of received documents will be dispatched to Legal Team, DHQ-1, Islamabad by relevant experience center/franchise team</li>
	<li>Appology letter/undertaking sample is attached</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Validation by CX-VMT/Comm. Unit Team</li>
	<li>Number will be blocked/suspended in this case only after Legal team&rsquo;s go ahead</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Verifications:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>For Blocking/suspension of service: Legal team&rsquo;s go ahead</li>
	<li>For Restoration: Presence of original customer with prescribed apology letter and undertaking on stamp paper not to repeat such behavior</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>For customer to customer obnoxious calls/SMS we will continue to follow &ldquo;Obnoxious Call &amp; SMS Handling-DBSS&rdquo; available in KMS</li>
	<li>B2B numbers will not be blocked if found against related numbers in CNIC</li>
	<li>If same/related number is already blocked then its tagging needs to be changed to PMCL blocking(except if blocked on critical reasons like PTA/Fraud/Grey/Spamming/Unverified)</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Handling of Jazz Officials Calling over 111/777 Helpline
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Jazz Employee helpline 2211 is not available from Feb 1st ,2019. We will facilitate our Jazz family by guiding them to use Jazz World App, self-service channels or through our Call center(111/777). Below are the important guidelines.</p>

Submission Channel: 1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ul>
	<li><span style="color:#000000"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;,sans-serif">Can International roaming be activated on Employee and EXPMCL package from the helpline ? if yes then how much deposit/Limit required?</span></span></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="color:#000000"><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">IR can be activated on customer request over the helpline and minimum deposit of Rs 5,000 is required for IR activation</span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>If case any official or employee calls over the helpline (111 or 777), we need to acknowledge/cater their information requests and complaints against their number as per existing customer SOP applicable on these helplines</li>
	<li>In case official asks for details related to other number, we will politely guide them that such details cannot be provided</li>
	<li>We need to handle official with care and due courtesy</li>
	<li>We need to communicate self-service option to employees for queries where details are not available in Jazz World APP</li>
	<li>For IR activation on official number, Official need to coordinate with CC-CRM-OFFICIAL PHONE MANAGEMENT over email as per existing process</li>
	<li>For IR activation on employee package we need to guide customer that Rs.5,000 deposit is required</li>
	<li>For 4G activation on Jazz Official or Employee number process details available in KMS processes</li>
	<li>Employee package activation handling from Experience Center and Official phone management will remain same</li>
	<li>Official and employee package details are updated in KMS</li>
	<li>Any escalations need to be handled by respective team leader</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Do not route Jazz official/ employee connection users towards Business Helpline (03000160160)</li>
	<li>Employee connection can avail 10GB data for 30 days in Rs.500</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: VAS Deactivation
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Incaes customer asks to unsubscribe or is unable to unsubscribe service through SMS, USSD IVR, Web or APP or complains about subscriptin without consent then we will follow below guidelines</p>

<p><strong>LOV:</strong> Respective VAS to be&nbsp;selected according to requirement of vas deactivation<br />
<strong>Team</strong>: Network Complaint Team</p>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067,1062
Point of Contact: Respective Team Leader
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>For all the service having Deactivation option in CSRTB should be catered upfront</p>

<ul>
	<li>Go to CSRTB &rarr; enter number In contracts &rarr; on barring window select VAS &rarr; search and process UNSUB via change button for respective service</li>
	<li>
	<p>Where VAS is not active in CSRTB VAS TAB but still are charging to the customers ( Verification from CSRTB financial TAB). Agent&nbsp; will unsub the VAS by using the respected VAS portal empowered via SSO.</p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Case Creation for De-Activation(Where Required):</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Where CSRTB - VAS tab is not available or</li>
	<li>Portals not working or</li>
	<li>Don&rsquo;t have front-end empowerment</li>
</ul>

<p>Then create Case type in&nbsp;Super office</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Type:</strong>Value Added Services</li>
	<li><strong>Area:</strong> Respective VAS Name</li>
	<li><strong>Sub Area:</strong>&nbsp; Respective complaint header</li>
</ul>

<p>Below VAS are added in RPA (Robotic process automation)</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ol start="1" style="list-style-type:decimal">
	<li>Value Added Services/Deikho - Unsub</li>
	<li>Value Added Services/Fauri SMS - Unsub</li>
	<li>Value Added Services/Game now evolve - Unsub</li>
	<li>Account Administration/Credit Profile/Postpaid Waiver Issuance</li>
	<li>Value Added Services/Slypee - Unsub</li>
	<li>Value Added Services/Bajao - Unsub</li>
	<li>Value Added Services/Hungama Music - Unsub</li>
	<li>Value Added Services/Double UP - Unsub</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>BOT will be run by back office&nbsp;as per the workload, 3-4 times a day on average</p>

<p><strong>TAT</strong>: 24 Hours</p>

<p><strong>Note: </strong>if customer is still being charged after Un-subscribing service from CSRTB or any channel. Agent will follow below checklist</p>

<ol>
	<li>Package history with date of deactivation&nbsp;</li>
	<li>VAS TAB (to check Enabled/Disabled status)</li>
	<li>Notification tab</li>
	<li>Memos</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Once All verified then adjustment and troubleshoot process will followed, mentioning the details in notes as per below scenario</p>

<ol>
	<li>No case will be created within 24 hours after deactivation from any channel</li>
	<li>Service functionality issue (Troubleshoot process will be followed)</li>
	<li>Adjustment/deduction related complaint will be processed as per normal SOP</li>
</ol>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Suggested Statement:</p>

<p>&ldquo;Sir/madam, hum ne apki service yahan say khatam kar de hai or apka number aglye 24 ghante mein charging mukamal kar k system say nikal jayega&rdquo;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Relevant iSMS to be send to customer&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Prepaid Information Calls Handling Over Postpaid Queue
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">This process covers cases where a prepaid customer calls over 777 helpline and asks for information related to postpaid process, product and systems or vice versa. Below guidelines will be followed.</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 1045
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6106
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Agent to address customer query as per available systems. If customer is satisfied, then no need to transfer call. </span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Where agent is unable to address prepaid query of a postpaid customer, agent to transfer such call to <strong>Escalation Desk</strong> by using below standard statement and guidelines:</span></span></span></span></span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><em><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&ldquo;Sir/Ms XYZ maloomat ke liay aap ki call hamare supervisor ko transfer ki jaa rahi hai. Baraye meharbani intezar farmaiye. Shukria.&rdquo;</span></span></span></em></span></span></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Create <strong>&ldquo;Live call activity&rdquo;</strong> activity in Super Office, for instances where call is dropped during hold, so that Escalation Desk agent can call back customer. </span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:9px"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:yellow"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Note:</span></span></span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="background-color:yellow"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333"> Do not guide customer to call again on the 777&nbsp;helpline from the postpaid&nbsp;number.</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">For IBEX:</span></span></span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333"> Incase postpaid call lands in prepaid queue (due to any IT/other issue) then agent will transfer the call to available <strong>Escalation desk TL </strong>of respective site.Escalation Desk to address customer query/concern.</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">For Abacus VDN will be used in this scenario:&nbsp;<strong>EXT 0056&nbsp;</strong>to transfer call&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Incase call dropped by customer while waiting in Escalation Desk queue:&nbsp;</span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Escalation Desk will make outbound call to customer within 30 minutes (as per call back process) and use below statement:</span></span></span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">&ldquo;<em>Sir/Ms aap ne haal he mein XYZ maloomat ke liay helpline par call ki thi. Mai is silsilay me aap se raabta kar raha/rahi hoon. Baraye meherbani btaiye ke mai aap ki kya madad kar sakta/sakti hoon&rdquo;</em></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>

	<li>CNC team will cater the request recieved from any jazz touchpoint through super office.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Blocking Reason: &ldquo;Rejected Cheque&rdquo;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Process restoration upfront if verification and checklist is OK.</li>
	<li>Bill clearance through cash is must.</li>
	<li>CNC team will cater the request recieved from any jazz touchpoint through super office.</li>
</ul>

<p>TAT: 3 hours</p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Bill payment should be clear (check credit limit and outstanding balance) (if Postpaid)</li>
	<li>Check BVS timestamp from Biometric tab or from MEMOs. For passport document validation check MEMOs under Type &quot;services barrings&quot;</li>
	<li>No visa expiry issue</li>
	<li>In case of Incomplete document , Security deposit must to be checked along with credit limit and outstanding clearance.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p>Note: If customer again pays the bill through cheque, CNC team will check payment history and wont restore the number if cheque was rejected twice &amp; will add remarks in super case.</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Kistpay Smartphone Financing Plan
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Kistpay is a colaboration with jazz for smartphones financing.Customer can get smartphone on installments from jazz experience centers.Below are the guidlines</p>

Submission Channel: 27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ul>
	<li>Installment paid but not updated in portal?
	<ul>
		<li>Customer can call on kistpay helpline +92-21-111-111-222/or email at <a href="mailto:support@kistpay.com">support@kistpay.com</a></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Installment paid but set is still blocked?
	<ul>
		<li>Customer can call on kistpay helpline +92-21-111-111-222/or email at <a href="mailto:support@kistpay.com">support@kistpay.com</a></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Double/Triple/4x/5x/6X Installment paid but one is updated only?
	<ul>
		<li>Customer can call on kistpay helpline +92-21-111-111-222/or email at <a href="mailto:support@kistpay.com">support@kistpay.com</a></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Handset unblocked after payment but blocked again in few days?
	<ul>
		<li>Blocking/unblocking is done via system , however, incase of any issue customer can call on kistpay helpline +92-21-111-111-222/or email at <a href="mailto:support@kistpay.com">support@kistpay.com</a></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Support Portal is provided to CC agent</li>
</ul>

<p>a. To check handset status (active/not active)</p>

<p>b.&nbsp;To check System generated notification to customer</p>

<p>c.&nbsp;To Verify the sold handsets details against the MSISDN</p>

<p>d.&nbsp;Payment plan visibility</p>

<p>Eligibility criteria:</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li>MSISDN must be Pre Approved (Whitelisted)</li>
	<li>6 months network Life on Jazz</li>
	<li>Minimum recharge/invoice must be 1000Rs each month</li>
	<li>Active MSISDN (prepaid &amp; postpaid)</li>
</ul>

<p>NOTE:Customer can get the handset from nearest experience center.</p>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li>The phone is&nbsp;integrated with Kistpay App. Through the app, the consumer will have complete program visibility, enabling them to check on the device&#39;s payment status whenever they want.</li>
	<li>For any query customer can also call on Kistpay helpline (+92-21-111-111-222) during 09:30 AM-5:30 PM Monday till Friday</li>
	<li>Jazz x Kistpay Smartphone Installment Plan, now available through Kistpay WhatsApp Ordering service.
	<ul>
		<li><strong>WhatsApp Ordering number</strong> : +92-21-111-111-222</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<ul style="list-style-type:disc">
	<li>Support Portal for CC &amp; Business Centers <a href="https://kistpay-portal.kistpay.com/login">https://kistpay-portal.kistpay.com/login</a></li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><strong>Blocking Mechanics / Reminders:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Payment reminders will be sent to customers through app and SMS (10 Days , 5 Days , 3 Days ,1 Day , Due date &amp; 1 Hour before the payment is due )</li>
	<li>In case of non-payment system will block the IMEI which will be restored after making payment.</li>
	<li>Customer can pay via 1 bill/Jazz cash &amp; Jazz buisness center.</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Terms &amp; Conditions:</strong><br />
1.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Handset will not be setup without following the Kistpay activation process<br />
2.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Kistpay financing APP is pre-installed in the device which holds the right to block/unblock the device and notify the customer about the pending dues.<br />
3.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Complete installment plan details will be available on Kistpay financing App<br />
4.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Customer must be whitelisted to avail this financing facility<br />
5.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Handset will be blocked in case customer failed to make the payment on scheduled date<br />
6.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Customer/Experience/Franchise center agent can call on Kistpay Helpline (+92-21-111-111-222) or email at support@kistpay.com<br />
7.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;No SIM activation or BVS required<br />
8.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;The warranty terms are mentioned in the warranty card of the smartphone&nbsp;<br />
9.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Kistpay financing App screens are attached</p>

<p>10.&nbsp;Terms &amp; Condition of this contract has been added along with the OTP for the customer</p>

<p>11. The customer&rsquo;s insurance Doc In Kistpay Portal will be available for the customer after a successful sale</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Postpaid Package related Info
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case customer contacts Call center for postpaid package information, below are the guidlines.</p>

Submission Channel: 1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.

Verification Status: 18,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><strong>Credit Limit</strong></p>

<p>It is the limit of a postpaid number according to paid deposit or waiver.when customer reaches near to the limit his number gets blocked. <em><strong>*1111#</strong> is the ussd for details</em></p>

<p><strong>Deposit</strong></p>

<p>Deposit is the amount paid by customer at the time of sale accoridng to package plan to set his credit limit.Customer can pay an additional deposit as security &amp; is refundable.&nbsp;<em><strong>*1111#</strong> is the ussd for details</em></p>

<p><strong>PRO-RATION</strong>&nbsp;</p>

<p>In case, date of joining Postpaid is any day other than the 2nd of a month, subscribers will be allocated free resources and charged line rent according to the new package,&nbsp;<strong><em>based on days remaining until the next bill date</em></strong></p>

<p><strong>CHARGING PULSE</strong></p>

<p>Once usage exceeds free resources in a price-plan/bundle, charging is done every&nbsp;<em><strong>60 seconds for calls&nbsp;</strong>and<strong>&nbsp;512 KB for data.</strong></em></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Smart Call
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Smart Call is a service that allows users to make calls via another user&#39;s mobile phone while displaying their own CLI on the receiver&#39;s screen. Call charges are deducted from the Smart Call subscriber&#39;s balance, and authentication is done using a unique PIN code. It&#39;s a convenient solution for individuals who need to make important calls without access to their own mobile phone.</p>
<quillbot-extension-portal></quillbot-extension-portal>
Submission Channel: 1058,27,1050,32
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: noman.aslam1
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p>&nbsp;</p>
<quillbot-extension-portal></quillbot-extension-portal>
Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Smart Call Activation:</strong></p>

<p>Agent will guide customer to <strong>Send &ldquo;Sub&rdquo; to 2234 for subscription</strong> if customer is unable to&nbsp;activate the service&nbsp; agent will lock a complain in super office.<br />
Value Added Services&nbsp;=&gt;&nbsp;Smart Call =&gt; Jazz Smart Call Sub</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Smart Call Deactivation:</strong></p>

<p>Agent will guide customer to <strong>Send &ldquo;Unsub&rdquo; to 2234 for unsubscription</strong> if customer is unable to deactivate the service&nbsp;agent will lock a complain in super office.&middot;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>Value Added Services&nbsp;=&gt;&nbsp;Smart Call =&gt; &nbsp;Jazz Smart Call Un-Sub&nbsp;</p>

<p>Value Added Services&nbsp;=&gt;&nbsp;Smart Call =&gt; Troubleshoot</p>
<quillbot-extension-portal></quillbot-extension-portal>
Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>Number Should be active in CSRTB</li>
	<li>PayG rate is applicable on every call till the daily limit is reached (25 smart calls/day)</li>
	<li>Party A whose phone will be used to make call will not be charged</li>
	<li>Charging of smart call can be verified from financials in CSR TB</li>
	<li>UCIP for prepaid is&nbsp;<strong>JazzSmartCallPayGPre&nbsp;</strong>(will be visible in financials)</li>
	<li>UCIP for postpaid is&nbsp;<strong>JazzSmartCallPayGPost&nbsp;</strong>(will be visible in financials)</li>
	<li>The blacklisted numbers will be unable to make a Smart call using the subscriber&rsquo;s number.</li>
	<li>In case Party A dials wrong pin code 3 times, that number will be blocked to use smart call service</li>
</ul>
<quillbot-extension-portal></quillbot-extension-portal>
Required Questions: <p>&nbsp;</p>
<quillbot-extension-portal></quillbot-extension-portal>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Usage Related Info 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>In case customer calls over helpline to get the information about usage of his number, below will be the handling.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 1050
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 2067,1062
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <p>If Deduction observed in multiple scenarios in one call, then multiple usage info work codes will be punched?</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>The usage-related work code is punched <strong>once</strong> when the agent provides information on balance deduction. If multiple services contribute to the deduction, relevant work codes are pushed against each specific service.</li>
	<li>For service deactivation, only the &#39;deactivation&#39; work code is applied. The &#39;information-related&#39; work code is reserved for inquiries about service features, pricing, and similar inquiries.</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.

		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Customers can&nbsp;check&nbsp;<span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">the <strong>Usage History</strong> option in the self-service menus (*444# for prepaid and *446# for postpaid customers) to check&nbsp;last 10 transactions, including Calls, SMS, and Data, with proper validation and following instructions will be given.</span></span>
	<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><span dir="ltr" lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Select Duration:</span></span></strong></span></span></p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Abusive Callers- Helpline/ IVR Blocking
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>At Jazz, we facilitate our customers with state of the art products and services, however there are situations when customer calls over the&nbsp;helpline and use abusive and unethical language.They are intentionally irritating &amp; calling over the helpline again &amp; again, thus leaving an unpleasant experience.&nbsp;Such behavior is not at all tolerated and calls for an appropriate action against &ldquo;Abusive Callers&rdquo; after investigation.&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 1044
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Incase customer repeatedly calls over helpline, and using abusive language&nbsp;then we need to guide customer as per below statement.</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Standerd Statement:&nbsp;</strong></p>

	<p>&quot;<strong>1st Warning</strong>: &ldquo;Moaziz Sarif, aap se guzarish hai ke mohzibana zaban istemal kijiye taakay aap ki behtar rahnumayi ki jaa sakay.&rdquo;</p>

	<p><strong>&nbsp;Before Call drop</strong>: &ldquo;Moaziz Sarif, ghair muhzibana zaban istemal karne par aap ki call drop ki jaa rahi ha.&rdquo;</p>

	<p>&nbsp;</p>
	</li>
	<li>We will request customer once to use appropriate language&nbsp;but if customer is still using abusive language&nbsp;then case will be escalated to TL for callback .</li>
	<li>Complaint will be forwarded by Helpline (TLs/Managers)/ &nbsp;Vendor QA &nbsp;and shall report such cases to VMT</li>
	<li>VMT shall escalate such cases with Jazz Quality Assurance Team via email</li>
	<li>Jazz QA shall verify and send their feedback as &ldquo;Established as Abusive Customer&rdquo; &amp; &ldquo;Not Established as Abusive Customer&rdquo;</li>
	<li>Once a case is established, VMT shall send Warning SMS and create case in Super Office with detailed notes</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Super Office Case:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Type</strong>: Helpline Or IVR Blocking</li>
	<li><strong>Area:&nbsp;</strong> Abusive Caller</li>
	<li><strong>Sub Area</strong>: Warning or Blocking</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Restoration Process:&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Guide customer to visit Jazz Office, where restoration can be done after receiving written Apology along with CNIC copy and share scanned copy of letter CNIC with VMT.</li>
	<li>
	<p>TAT : 1 Business day</p>

	<p>Note:&nbsp;&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Attachment of approval email is mandatory in Super Office while creating IVR Blocking case for Helpdesk</p>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>Warning is issued to such callers through SMS/Call prior to blocking .&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Logs/record of warning call &amp; SMS will be maintained for Complaint management in Super Office for visibility. &nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once Abusive Callers are tagged in system, they are not allowed to route their calls to agents.</li>
	<li>In case customer&rsquo;s helpline is blocked for 111/777, their call will disconnect immediately once they press zero to connect with Agent with below IVR prompt
	<ul>
		<li>
		<p>&ldquo;Dear Customer, You cannot reach customer services, this service has been temporarily disconnected&rdquo;</p>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Helpline will only blocked for those customers who use foul/abusive language on Live call&nbsp;after a warning message, if after sending warning message customer again calls or repeat the same practice helpline blocking will be initiated as per existing SOP</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Repeat Caller Process-  Helpline
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>This process will cover guidelines to handle repeat callers over helpline.</p>

<ul>
	<li>Repeat Callers will be identified from a 2-hourly report shared by Reporting Team &ndash; Repeat Callers</li>
	<li>Call back will be arranged for customers who have called more than 05 times over the helpline.</li>
	<li>Call Back will be arranged within max 2 hours of receiving the report.</li>
	<li>Last repeat caller report will be shared till 5:10PM, seven days a week.</li>
	<li>Repeat callers from 5pm till 9am will be contacted from 10am onwards</li>
	<li>No call back will be made after 8:00 PM</li>
	<li>Call back will not be made to less than 5 repeated calls over the helpline</li>
	<li>Call back will be made where CLI will reflect in next report.</li>
</ul>

<p>Helpline access can be blocked against those customers who are asking irrelevant queries e.g.</p>

<p>(Date &amp; time, call drop when agent is male)</p>

<p><strong>Standard Statement for Calls:&nbsp;</strong></p>

<p><strong>&quot;</strong>AOA, mai Jazz se _______ baat kar raha/rahi hoon.&nbsp;Kia ye number aap ke istimaal mein hai. Yes/No.&nbsp;Jin ke istemal me ye number hai, kya un se baat ho sakti hai? Yes/No if yes then continue if No&nbsp;Baraye meherbani bata dijiye ke jinke istemal me ye number hai, un se kab baat ho sakti hai? (Agent to note down and contact later)&nbsp;Kia aap se is waqt mukhtasiran baat ho sakti hai? if yes continue if No&nbsp;Baraye meherbani bata dijiye ke aap se kab baat ho sakti hai? (Agent to note down and contact later)&nbsp;. Sir / Madam, aaj kay din may apki Jazz ki 111 helpline pe XX calls masool huwi hain. Baraye meharbani bata dijiye ke mutadid baar call karnay ki bunyadi waja kia hai ? &lt;&lt;Agent to cater customer as per process&gt;&gt; &quot;</p>

Submission Channel: 3069
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 18
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: I don't have updated information about this.
Checklist Items: <p>Customer has called 05 times over the helpline.</p>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>TL will share&nbsp;call back update with VMT.</li>
	<li>Daily Repeat Calls report will be shared by BP</li>
	<li>Segment wise call back will be arranged by relevant BPS.</li>
	<li>Attempts will be done as per existing call back guidelines</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: UBL FreeLancer Package Activation- Jazz Biz Data SIM
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Jazz business customers may visit to any touchpoint like franchise/ Experience center and retailer for activation of Jazz Business Prepaid Sim. We will guide/facilitate customers as per below handling:&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 36
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6115
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Users are already handed over Jazz Business Prepaid Sims and they will be visiting Jazz Retailers, Franchises and Experience Centers for Biometric Verification.</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>Activation of UBL SIM can only be done <span style="color:#e74c3c">via retailer device (IPOS)</span></li>
	<li>Retailer need to select &ldquo;Activate SIM without bundle&rdquo; as per attached flow</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note: </strong>Please note that there is no biometric charges and package recharge is also not required. Customer has already paid the amount</p>

<ul>
	<li>Retailer/Franchise&nbsp;agent will select &quot;Jazz BVS&quot; from the device menu (on IPOS device).</li>
	<li>Retailer/Franchise agent will input their User ID/MSISDN, password, and PIN</li>
	<li>From the Prepaid menu, the Retailer/Franchise agent will select &quot;New SIM.&quot;</li>
	<li>The New SIM (Prepaid) form will appear on the screen</li>
	<li>The agent will input the CNIC, MSISDN, IMSI, and other optional contact details, then select a type</li>
	<li>Under the bundle selection menu, the agent will choose &quot;<strong>Activate SIM without Bundle</strong>.&quot;</li>
	<li>The Retailer/Franchise agent will proceed to capture fingerprints as per the process and click on &quot;Save&quot;</li>
	<li>A&nbsp;pop-up confirmation of number activation will appear on the screen</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>This will be followed by UBL Package activation through USSD *624#.</p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><u><strong>Important Update for iOS Users:</strong></u><br />
We have observed that certain customers using iOS devices may experience issues due to:</span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><strong>No 2G Network Option:</strong></span>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:14px">Unlike other handsets, iOS devices do not offer a 2G network fallback.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><strong>VoLTE Services Disabled:</strong></span>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:14px">VoLTE (Voice over LTE) is not enabled on some customers&#39; devices.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><strong>Action Required:</strong><br />
Incase a customer conatct Jazz customer care chaneel we need to guide the customer as per below</span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px">To resolve these issues, customers must&nbsp;<strong>enable VoLTE on their iOS handsets</strong>&nbsp;by following these steps:</span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px">Go to&nbsp;<strong>Settings</strong>&nbsp;&rarr;&nbsp;<strong>Mobile Data</strong>&nbsp;&rarr;&nbsp;<strong>Mobile Data Options</strong>&nbsp;&rarr;&nbsp;<strong>Voice &amp; Data</strong>.</span>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-size:14px">Select&nbsp;<strong>LTE&nbsp;</strong>OR&nbsp;<strong>4G, VoLTE On</strong>.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:14px">All customer care channels to proactively guide customers facing these challenges to enable VoLTE for a seamless calling experience.</span><br />
<span style="font-size:14px">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p><u><strong><span style="font-size:14px">Cash Back Complaint:</span></strong></u></p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;,sans-serif">âœ…</span> 1. Mark Interaction Outcome:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Select &ldquo;Upsell Accepted&rdquo; in the CRM</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;,sans-serif">âœ…</span> 2. Send App Download Link:</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Immediately send the relevant SIMOSA (Jazz World) App deep link via iSMS to the customer.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Select the relevant upsell categories from the drop-down list.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;,sans-serif">âŒ</span> If Customer Refuses (Upsell Denied):</strong></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong>Agent Must:</strong></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Select <strong>&ldquo;Upsell Denied&rdquo;</strong> from the system.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Choose the appropriate reason from the drop-down menu.</span></span></li>
</ol>

Checklist Items: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;,sans-serif">âœ…</span> Eligibility Criteria for Upsell Offering</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Upsell only if the customer is present in EC.</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;,sans-serif">â—</span><strong>Blocked Numbers</strong>:</span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong>Upsell is restricted</strong> for blocked numbers (e.g., Stolen, Fraud, PTA Blocked,grey traffic, UAO_668).</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">If the number is restored during the visit,only then proceed with upsell.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong>Ineligible for Bundles, But Eligible for SIMOSA</strong>:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Some numbers might not show bundle offers due to profile restrictions &mdash; still, agents must promote SIMOSA in such cases.</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong>SIMOSA as Default Upsell Option</strong>:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">In Multiplay, only SIMOSA App is allowed for upsell until further instructions.</span></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-family:&quot;Segoe UI Emoji&quot;,sans-serif">ðŸ”Š</span> Tone &amp; Consent Guidelines</strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="color:#6666cc">Excitement is Key:</span> The agent&rsquo;s tone must reflect enthusiasm and energy while offering any upsell.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="color:#c0392b">Clear Communication</span>: Use simple and clear Urdu/English while explaining bundles, features, and app benefits.</span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="color:#2ecc71">No Activation Without Consent</span>:</span></span>
	<ul style="list-style-type:circle">
		<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Agent must always take explicit consent before:</span></span>
		<ul style="list-style-type:square">
			<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Activating any bundle</span></span></li>
			<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Sending the Simosa /Jazz World download link</span></span></li>
			<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif">Performing a SIM change</span></span></li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="color:#8e44ad">Respect Interruptions:</span> If the customer interrupts during upsell, immediately pause and do not insist.</span></span></li>
</ul>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Prepaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Jazz Tune Act./Deact Request Over Helpline - Upfront Facilitation

	<li>Urdu: Jazz Tunes service ko ba-asani laganay ya band karnay k liay 2301 pe call kijiye, *230# milaen ya SIMOSA&nbsp; (Jazz World) App istimaal kijiye, click: https://jazzapp.page.link/UsageDetails</li>
