ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Handset on installment for Postpaid (Act/Deact)
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>Jazz is intorducing handset on installment plan specifically for its postpaid customers. Please find below detailed guidelines</p>

Submission Channel: 1050,1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: shahid.mehmood
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6115
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <ul>
	<li>Can customer take exit plan as &amp; when he required?
	<ul>
		<li>Yes , Customer can take the Exit plan whenever he required</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If a customer only pays his bill &amp; not pay the handset installment amount every month what should we do, should we have the option to block the handset or we offer him/her exit plan in this case
	<ul>
		<li>Customer can opt for Exit plan . However , if the customer&rsquo;s MSISDN reaches its outgoing limit , the IMEI of the handset will also be blocked</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Can you share the intimation messages when and what is broadcasted to the customer to pay his installment&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Customer will keep on receiving the credit limit messages as defined in system</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>If a customer wanted to pay partial monthly installment what should be the process for. Ex customer have to pay 1000 Rs in the month of March &amp; he pays 500 in first 15 days and for the remaining 15 days he don&rsquo;t pay anything should his number gets block or we accept partial payment&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Yes , Customer can manage his payments as per the requirement. However , his number/IMEI will only block if its reached the credit limit</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How EC agent will track that the handset came for restoration after blocking due to non payment is the phone sold via Experience Center, do we have any IMEI list maintained with EC staff to check &amp; validate&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Yes, check handset IMEI under Subscription tab in CSRtb</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>What is the threshold that after how many days of non payment MSIDN will block and if even after that customer not pays then after how many days IMEI will be blocked
	<ul>
		<li>IMEI Blocking is linked with OG barred on real time basis. Customer IMEI will be blocked on Jazz as soon as the status changes&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Do we tag those handset &ldquo;blacklisted&rdquo; who not paid the complete amount after some installments (1, 2, 3 Installments)
	<ul>
		<li>No</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>What if customer opt this offer and after one installment not want to continue or he found the handset of no use and visit EC to return the handset
	<ul>
		<li>There is no return policy. (standard statement : Please note that all handset sales are final, and no returns will be accepted)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>What is the process in case set is dead on arrival EC opens the handset and it is not functional&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>&nbsp;If customer is within the Experience center premises and found the handset as DOA , Agent will replace the handset and provide the customer a new device . Agent will dispatch the defaulted device to the Digit Warehouse. However , if customer walk out of the experience center then the attached DOA &amp; warranty process will be applied (Attached)&nbsp;</li>
		<li>Digit Service Centers list attached</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How many installments customer have to pay in total to get the handset
	<ul>
		<li>Customer will get the handset on installment by paying the downpayment . additionally the installment plan is over a period of 12 months.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>What is the minimum credit limit threshold to get handset on installment
	<ul>
		<li>Min Credit limit 2000</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>In case customer is having low credit limit then monthly handset installment, &nbsp;should credit limit be raised &amp; what is the suggested minimum credit limit
	<ul>
		<li>Incase customer is not whitelisted and want to avail the handset on installment. Agent will guide the customer to pay the remaining credit limit to reach threshold of CL 2,000 . &nbsp;Agent &nbsp;will share email with standardization team to increase the credit limit and offer tagging . Please design a process for this</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>In such case if customer taken the exit plan and paid the instalments in one go and he faces blocking next month due to payment counter not updated in CSRTB what should EC agent do, please provide the complaint handling as well
	<ul>
		<li>(Complaint will be locked for back office as per Handset installment for Postpaid Compliant handling)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>The monthly installment is fix or customer can increase decrease at the time of entering into the contract of installment
	<ul>
		<li>Monthly installment plans amounts are fixed</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>What if customer wanted to port out and he paid all installments and payment counter is not updated in CSRTB, please provide the complaint handling&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>If customer has paid all the installments but unable to process the (COO , post to pre , Port out , Package change ) agent will make entry in Super office portal for the said (Complaint will be locked for back office as per Handset installment for Postpaid Compliant handling)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Please share the contractual obligation process in how many scenarios he have to abide by the obligation&nbsp;
	<ul>
		<li>Customer can not perform COO, post to pre , Port out , package change&nbsp;</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How do we identify that customer has taken handset on installments
	<ul>
		<li>Device IMEI will reflect under Subscription Tab and installment details will reflect under Financial and Consumption tabs in CSRtb</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How do we identify that customer has taken exist plan from installments
	<ul>
		<li>Device IMEI will reflect under Subscription Tab and installment details will reflect under Financial and Consumption tabs in CSRtb</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How do we know the customer has paid handset payment or outstanding bill payment
	<ul>
		<li>No separate payment tab. Payment will reflect against total bill only</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Customer(regular/platinum) has different credit limits of outgoing blocking who they are linked with system
	<ul>
		<li>Yes, blocking and monitoring criteria will remain the same)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>When customer get handset who will increase his credit limit and once customer paid all his installments/exist plan who will decrease the credit limit.
	<ul>
		<li>Front-end team will change credit limit as per existing change of credit limit process)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon device removal from DEVICE-INS tab complete remaining payment will reflect in customer bill?
	<ul>
		<li>Yes</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Activation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Postpaid numbers will be tagged in CRM for whitelisting offer via MKT/PD Team as per eligibility criteria</li>
	<li>Customer will walk-in to Experience Center to opt for Postpaid Handset on Installment</li>
	<li>EC agent will check eligibility tag available in CSRtb under <strong>Device INS</strong> tab</li>
	<li>In case of non-eligibility, EC agent will guide customer accordingly&nbsp;</li>
	<li>For eligible customer, EC agent will proceed for handset sale via <strong>DPOS </strong>(shop)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Deactivation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In case customer wants to pay back outstanding installment in full, EC agent need collect remaining payment and de-tag <strong>Device-INS</strong> offer from CSRtb (total outstanding will add up in Total Debt)</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Attacments:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Detailed screens and steps in system</li>
	<li>Dead on Arrival and Warranty Process</li>
	<li>List of Digit Service Centers</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p>Eligible Criteria for Purchasing Handset in Installment:</p>

<ul>
	<li>6 months network Life</li>
	<li>Min 2000 Credit limit</li>
	<li>Postpaid (B2C consumers only)</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>First handset installment will be charged upfront upon successful sale (amount will appear under <strong>Billing Tab &rarr; Total Debt </strong>as per current billing mechanics)</li>
	<li>Handset installment record will appear under <strong>Financials Tab </strong>(as per current billing/charged event records)</li>
	<li>Handset installment counter will appear under <strong>Consumption Tab</strong> in CSRtb to check for remaining installments</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: During ongoing handset instalment plan, customer is not allowed to change subscription type (post to pre conversion or change of package plan is not allowed)</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:16px"><strong>Handling for Difference Scenarios:</strong></span></p>

<p><strong>Voluntary Block</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to VOL Block a number (Postpaid) however handset installment are still remaining then Contact Center Agent/ECE and FCCR will follow below steps;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE/Contact Center agent will guide customer that remaining bundle installment needs to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Agent/ECE will guide customer to pay the remaining installment&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once all the installments are complete only then ECE will process voluntary blocking&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of remaining installment , we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s VOL block request&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Block on Stolen</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to Block a number having remaining installment on stolen reason then we will follow the below steps&nbsp;</li>
	<li>We will acknowledge customer&rsquo;s stolen block request even having remaining installment</li>
	<li>We will also guide customer that customer has to pay the installment otherwise handset (IMEI) will be blocked once the credit limit breach , Which can be restored by paying the outstanding amount</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>MNP process&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to port-out a number,&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE will guide customer that remaining installment of handset need to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once total installment are complete only then ECE will process MNP keeping other checks in view&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of handset installment, we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s MNP request.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Postpaid to Prepaid Conversion</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to convert number(from post to pre). However, handset installment subscriptions are still remaining then ECE will follow below steps;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE will guide customer that remaining handset installment need to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once total installment are complete only then ECE will process post to pre conversion keeping other checks in view&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of remaining handset installment, we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s post to pre request</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>IMEI Blocking</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer fails to pay the outstanding amount and the bills reaches its credit limit . the customer&rsquo;s outgoing and purchased IMEI will be blocked , which will be restored after clearing the outstanding amount</li>
</ul>

View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Expired


TYPE: SOP

ID: 17600

	</ul>
	</li>

	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How do we identify that customer has taken exist plan from installments
	<ul>
		<li>Device IMEI will reflect under Subscription Tab and installment details will reflect under Financial and Consumption tabs in CSRtb</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>How do we know the customer has paid handset payment or outstanding bill payment
	<ul>
		<li>No separate payment tab. Payment will reflect against total bill only</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Customer(regular/platinum) has different credit limits of outgoing blocking who they are linked with system
	<ul>
		<li>Yes, blocking and monitoring criteria will remain the same)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>When customer get handset who will increase his credit limit and once customer paid all his installments/exist plan who will decrease the credit limit.
	<ul>
		<li>Front-end team will change credit limit as per existing change of credit limit process)</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>Upon device removal from DEVICE-INS tab complete remaining payment will reflect in customer bill?
	<ul>
		<li>Yes</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <p><strong>Activation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Postpaid numbers will be tagged in CRM for whitelisting.</li>
	<li>Customer will walk-in to Experience Center to opt for Postpaid Handset on Installment</li>
	<li>EC agent will proceed for handset sale via <strong>DPOS </strong>(shop)</li>
</ul>

<ul>
</ul>

<p><strong>Deactivation:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>In case customer wants to pay back outstanding installment in full, EC agent need collect remaining payment and de-tag <strong>Device-INS</strong> offer from CSRtb (total outstanding will add up in Total Debt)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Handling In case of handset Block due to Non-Payment:</strong></p>

<p>Incase customer handset is blocked due to non payment and customer has paid the desired installement amount and even after that handset is not restored</p>

<p>We need to forward the below case in super office if customer calls/arrives at CC/EC&nbsp;</p>

<p>case category:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Type: <strong>Activation Complaint</strong></li>
	<li>Area:<strong>&nbsp;Handset IMEI Unblocking - Handset Installment&nbsp;</strong></li>
	<li>Subtype:&nbsp;<strong>Handset IMEI Unblocking - Handset Installment</strong>&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Important notes for Restoration case:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>We need to attach the payment proof in super office case if customer arrives as EC for backofifice/Tech Team&nbsp;further proceedings&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Incase of customer lands at Call center we need to attach the payment screen shot as per DBSS in the superoffice case&nbsp;for backofifice/Tech Team further proceedings&nbsp;</li>
	<li>TAT: 48 Hours</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Attachments:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>Detailed screens and steps Activation in system</li>
	<li>How to de-tagg offer in system</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li>All postpaid customers (B2C) with 3 month(s) network life are now eligible for handset on installment.</li>
	<li>This offer is not applicable on B2B and Employee package.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li>First handset installment will be charged upfront upon successful sale (amount will appear under <strong>Billing Tab &rarr; Total Debt </strong>as per current billing mechanics)</li>
	<li>Handset installment record will appear under <strong>Financials Tab </strong>(as per current billing/charged event records)</li>
	<li>Handset installment counter will appear under <strong>Consumption Tab</strong> in CSRtb to check for remaining installments</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Note</strong>: During ongoing handset instalment plan, customer is not allowed to change subscription type (post to pre conversion or change of package plan is not allowed)</p>

<ul>
	<li>After the handset sale, credit limit will be increased without security deposit to PKR 1,000 over and above subscriber&rsquo;s current limit.</li>
	<li>For above credit limit enhancement front end agent will make a case in Super Office.</li>
</ul>

<p>Account Administration &gt; Credit Profile &gt; <strong>Credit Limit Increase &ndash; Handset Issuance </strong></p>

<p>TAT: as per existing CL handling</p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="background-color:yellow">Note:</span></strong><span style="background-color:yellow"> Customer to be intimated at the time of handset sale regarding this limit enhancement.</span></span></span></p>

<p><u><strong>Handling for Difference Scenarios:</strong></u></p>

<p><strong>Voluntary Block</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to VOL Block a number (Postpaid) however handset installment are still remaining then Contact Center Agent/ECE and FCCR will follow below steps;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE/Contact Center agent will guide customer that remaining bundle installment needs to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Agent/ECE will guide customer to pay the remaining installment&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once all the installments are complete only then ECE will process voluntary blocking&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of remaining installment , we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s VOL block request&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Block on Stolen</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to Block a number having remaining installment on stolen reason then we will follow the below steps&nbsp;</li>
	<li>We will acknowledge customer&rsquo;s stolen block request even having remaining installment</li>
	<li>We will also guide customer that customer has to pay the installment otherwise handset (IMEI) will be blocked once the credit limit breach , Which can be restored by paying the outstanding amount</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>MNP process&nbsp;</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to port-out a number,&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE will guide customer that remaining installment of handset need to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once total installment are complete only then ECE will process MNP keeping other checks in view&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of handset installment, we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s MNP request.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Postpaid to Prepaid Conversion</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer want to convert number(from post to pre). However, handset installment subscriptions are still remaining then ECE will follow below steps;&nbsp;</li>
	<li>ECE will guide customer that remaining handset installment need to be cleared&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Once total installment are complete only then ECE will process post to pre conversion keeping other checks in view&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Note: Before the clearance of remaining handset installment, we will not acknowledge customer&rsquo;s post to pre request</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>IMEI Blocking</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li>If customer fails to pay the outstanding amount and the bills reaches its credit limit . the customer&rsquo;s outgoing and purchased IMEI will be blocked which will be restored after clearing the outstanding amount</li>
</ul>

<p><strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Note:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:11.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"> Where Handset is blocked and customer is calling from other CLI then it is mandatory for agent to add other Contact number in super office case.&nbsp;</span></span></p>

View Type: CallCenter
Category: Postpaid
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ID: 17649

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Write-Off/Dues Payment Against Terminated Number(s) Handling
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">This process covers handling of clearance of write off amount/dues against terminated postpaid B2C numbers only</span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: ruqqia.bibi1
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Agent must take the write-off/outstanding amount from customer where customer permanently disowns postpaid number which results in the termination of MSISDN.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">The agent will take the amount only in cash from customer.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Agent will add the collected amount into the collection account </span></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">through EFICS.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">The receipt of payment will be shared with the CX-CRM team via Super Office Case</span></span></span></span></li>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Bill Adjustment &gt; Financial Movement &gt; Terminated Number Write-off Amount</span></span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">TAT:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp; 1 working hour for agent to raise the above case.</span></span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Virtual Team:</span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"> C&amp;C-credit management team</span></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Agent will ensure to add relevant details in case by following above checklist.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Agent will be responsible for end-to-end responsibility of providing correct details.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="background-color:yellow"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Note:</span></span></span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="background-color:yellow"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"> In case of non-compliance of above process case will be cancelled by CX_CRM team</span></span></span></span></span></p>

Checklist Items: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Subscriber Number must be terminated in CSRTB.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Only cash payment will be accepted for terminated account. &nbsp;</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Amount should be paid in collection account.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Efics paid amount receipt with </span></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">date and amount clearly visible (no cutting and over writing of account no. or amount). </span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Terminated subscriber number must be written on Efics Receipt with paid stamp.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Case must be created on same day of payment received in Efics.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Previous day request/payment will not be acceptable.</span></span></span></span></li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Only one generic collection account is available with CX-CRM team for recovery purpose i.e.,&nbsp;03008465262.</span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"><span style="color:#333333">Please note that there is no option available to clear the dues of terminated MSISDN nether through EFICS nor CSRTB as of now.</span></span></span></li>

------------------------------------------------------------

Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">This process covers guidelines for Apple iPhone 16 on installments for postpaid customer via NWD Experience Center.</span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6146
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Pre requisites</span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Customers are required to pay the down payment in cash/Credit Card</span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">A security deposit of 15,000 PKR is to be taken from the customer (Cash)</span></span></li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Note:</span></strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"> Security deposit is re-fundable only after all installments are cleared. </span></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><strong><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Agent Handling:</span></span></span></strong></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-size:10.0pt">&nbsp;Agent will process sale as per below guidelines:</span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Postpaid numbers will be tagged in CRM for whitelisting.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">Agent will activate the DD of the customer as per the existing process</span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">First handset installment will be charged upfront upon successful sale (amount will appear under Billing Tab &rarr; Total Debt as per current billing mechanics)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Handset installment record will appear under Financials Tab (as per current billing/charged event records)</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Handset installment counter will appear under Consumption Tab in CSRTB to check for remaining installments</span></span></span></span>. see attachment&nbsp;</span></li>
	<li style="text-align:justify">
	<p style="margin-left:24px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><strong><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">Experience Center TL/Manager Handling:</span></span></strong></span></span></span></p>

	<p style="margin-left:24px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">ECM/TL will share the available MSISDN list on a weekly basis for auditing purposes to CC-CRMCMSATEAM@jazz.com.pk&nbsp;and sana.tahir@jazz.com.pk</span></span></span></span></span></p>

	<p style="margin-left:24px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Date of Sale</span></span></span></span></span></p>

	<p style="margin-left:24px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MSISDN</span></span></span></span></span></p>

	<p style="margin-left:24px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="background-color:white"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="color:#333333">&bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; HANDSET</span></span></span></span></span></p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p style="margin-left:24px; text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><strong>IMP NOTE For TL/ECM:&nbsp;</strong><em><span style="background-color:#ecf0f1">Please ensure that MSISDNs associated with sold handsets are checked daily in Weblink. This review will help us proactively identify and prevent any fraudulent activity. Consistent monitoring is crucial for maintaining compliance and ensuring legitimate sales.</span></em></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Checklist Items: <p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:11pt"><strong><u><span style="font-size:10.0pt">Eligibility Criteria: </span></u></strong></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li>All B2C customers (postpaid) are eligible to purchase the handset including EXPMCL/Employee FNF</li>
	<li>15,000 additional security deposit is required.&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Customer must convert his billing to DD.</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ul>

	<li><span style="color:#e74c3c">Every detail must be entered accurately and thoroughly into the system, as agents hold full responsibility for all submitted information, from initiation to completion of the transaction.</span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><em><u><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Sale Process:</span></u></em></strong></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent logs in to DIGIT website at </span><a href="http://www.digit4g.com/dfs" style="color:#467886; text-decoration:underline"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">http://www.digit4g.com/dfs</span></a><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif"> (Credentials for each experience center is shared)</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent fills out the application on to the DIGIT portal&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent adds the customers mobile number for an OTP confirmation.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Once OTP is confirmed from the customer &amp; verified, the agent processes the application with filling in Handset IMEI &ndash; CNIC and submits application on the DIGIT portal.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Simultaneously Agent takes the downpayment from the customer and marks sale in </span></span></span>Efics<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">After a successful upfront payment, application status <span style="color:black">changes to &quot;Application Created Successfully&quot; &ndash; </span>in DIGIT Portal.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent helps the customer unbox the phone &amp; guides about payment/installment process &amp; T&amp;C in the brochure/box.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">It is mandatory to setup the handset with the available Wi-Fi/Internet, else handset will not be activated </span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Once the customer is connected to the internet, he/she will be displayed the T&amp;C for installment payments- once the customer clicks *<strong>confirmed</strong>* the phone will be activated for use.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Handset will not be handed over to the customer without proper activation and payment.</span></span></span></li>
</ol>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Complaint handling:</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">In case intallements are paid but imei gets blocked, exisiting proceedure will be followed</span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">SO case --&gt; Account administration ---&gt; handset --&gt; jazz digit 4g de-tagging</span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">&nbsp;<a href="https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/15426">https://cemdev.jazz.com.pk:909/SOP/Index/15426</a>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Checklist Items: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><strong><em><u><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Eligibility Criteria: </span></u></em></strong></span></span></p>

<ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">All network customers (Prepaid/postpaid) are eligible for this offer</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">It is mandatory for the customer to pay the Upfront downpayment amount to avail the handset</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">Employee /B2B /EXPMCL/EMP FNF included&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <ol>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The agent will guide the customer about handset unboxing during the sale process</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-family:&quot;Calibri&quot;,sans-serif">The handsets are pre locked by &ldquo;DIGIT Device locking Mechanism &ldquo;. ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: PortAll Customer Support Channel
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><strong>PortAll</strong>: A Personal Cloud Storage Application.</p>

<p><strong>Features</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>Auto sync gallery &amp; folders</li>
	<li>Contacts sync&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Free up phone space&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Rewards&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Family Rooms&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Memories&nbsp;</li>
	<li>Camera</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>Availibility:</strong></p>

<p>Web <strong><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">Portallapp.com</span></strong></p>

<p>Android&nbsp;<strong><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">Google play</span></strong></p>

<p>iOS&nbsp; <strong><span style="background-color:#f1c40f">App Store</span></strong></p>

Submission Channel: 27,1050,2065
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6171
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><em><strong>Reporting Portal:</strong></em></p>

<ul>
	<li>User Logs: Provides a general overview of activity for a specific user. The following information is shown :</li>
</ul>

<p>â—‹ User Logs â—‹ Sub/Unsub Logs â—‹ Transaction Logs â—‹ SMS Logs</p>

<ul>
	<li>&nbsp;Rewards: A complete list of users who have claimed rewards from Portall</li>
</ul>

<p><em><strong>User Logs:&nbsp;</strong></em></p>

<p>Opening this page will show a field to enter the customer&rsquo;s MSISDN in the format (92XXXXXXXXX). Entering the MSISDN will show the following reports for the specified MSISDN.</p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>User Logs shows &lsquo;Created Date&rsquo;, &lsquo;Available Storage&rsquo; and &lsquo;Source&rsquo;. A general overview of when the user&rsquo;s account was created, and how much storage space is left in their account</strong>.

	<ul>
		<li><em>MSISDN: The user&rsquo;s number </em></li>
		<li><em>Created Date: The date when the user&rsquo;s Portall account was created.&nbsp;</em></li>
		<li><em>Available Storage (GB): The storage left in the user&rsquo;s Portall account. </em></li>
		<li><em>&nbsp;Source: Where the user was routed from, when they created their account (eg: user campaign, self sign-up, Jazzcash app, etc)</em></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>Sub/Unsub Logs :&nbsp;A complete record of the date a specific user had subscribed/unsubscribed from Portall.</strong>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-family:Trebuchet MS,Helvetica,sans-serif"><em>Transaction ID: The unique ID against which the subscription or unsubscription occurred. </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Trebuchet MS,Helvetica,sans-serif"><em>Sub/Unsub: The user&rsquo;s status of subscription </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Trebuchet MS,Helvetica,sans-serif"><em>Created Date:The date of the subscription/unsubscription </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Trebuchet MS,Helvetica,sans-serif"><em>Transaction ID Source: Where the user unsubscribed from (in-app, Jazzcash, etc)</em></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>Transactional Logs shows details of what packages the user has ever purchased. Shows the following details:</strong>
	<ul>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Requestor MSISDN: the number requesting the transaction </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Billing MSISDN: the number charged for the transaction </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Storage Plan: the plan purchased by the user </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Amount deducted: the amount that was deducted for the corresponding transaction </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Source: where the deduction happened from (from Portall directly, or from Jazzcash) </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Activity type: what activity the deduction occurred for </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Timestamp: the date and time of the transaction </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Expiry: the date and time till when the transaction is valid </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Transaction Status: whether the transaction succeeded or failed </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Failure Reason: why the transaction failed </em></span></li>
		<li><span style="font-family:Comic Sans MS,cursive"><em>Last Renewal Date: The date of the last renewal of the transaction.</em></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li><strong>SMS Logs shows details of system generated SMS&rsquo;s the user has received from Portall.</strong>
	<ul>
		<li>A record of the date and type of system generated SMS&rsquo;s sent by Portall to the user.</li>
		<li>ID: The unique ID against which the SMS was sent</li>
		<li>Type: The type of message sent to the user (OTP, charges, etc).</li>
		<li>Phone: The user&rsquo;s MSISDN</li>
		<li>Created At: The date and time that the SMS was sent</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.

Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: iPhone Trade-in Mercantile- Business Ambassadors Process 
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="color:#f1c40f"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">This process covers the guidelines for iPhone Trade-in Mercantile- Business Ambassadors.</span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>After-Visit Preparation:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Check the estimated handset value on the official website.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Check the estimated subsidy on the new iPhone.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong>Guide customers on data wiping:</strong> Advise them to back up their data at home before visiting.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Inform customers to bring the box or proof of ownership (receipt/invoice where possible).</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Advise customers to remove screen protectors and phone covers before handing over the device.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Ensure the phone is charged before trade-in.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>In-Store Trade-In Process:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The customer walks into the Jazz Store and proceeds to the mercantile counter.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The customer hands over the used handset along with the box, invoice, or ownership proof (if available).</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The mercantile representative assesses the phone and provides a valuation.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The customer accepts the valuation and confirms trade-in.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>New iPhone Purchase Process:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The customer selects the iPhone model they wish to purchase.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The representative calculates the balance amount:</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">New iPhone price minus subsidy minus trade-in value.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The customer is informed of the final amount to be paid.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Final Steps Before Handover:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Confirm with the customer that they have backed up or wiped personal data. If not, assist them.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The customer will:</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Turn off &ldquo;Find My Device&rdquo; &amp; &ldquo;Stolen Device Protection.&rdquo;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Log out from iCloud.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#1abc9c"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Factory reset the device before completing the trade-in.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Mercantile BA Handling Process &ndash; iPhone Trade-In</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Handset Evaluation:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Assess the handset condition; only P3+ grade and above will be accepted.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Perform PTA registration verification.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Conduct a theft check using the eGadget app by the Police.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Determine and share the used handset price with the customer.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Ownership &amp; Documentation:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Capture a picture of the backside of the box or proof of ownership receipt.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Complete the evaluation sheet, display it to the customer, and obtain their E-signature.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Include the subsidy amount in the final pricing for the selected iPhone.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Attach the customer&rsquo;s CNIC/ID card and enter its details into the system.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Payment &amp; Phone Handling:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Hold the customer&rsquo;s used phone securely.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Capture the credit card receipt (if applicable) in the system.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Ensure the used handset has sufficient charge before proceeding.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Data Transfer Assistance:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Assist the customer in transferring data to the new device.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Inform them that it cannot be stopped once the data transfer begins.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Place the used handset in a secure location during the process.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Final Steps Before Handover:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Ensure the used phone is logged out from iCloud, &quot;Find My Device&quot; is turned off, &quot;Stolen Device Protection&quot; is disabled, and a factory reset is performed.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Hand over the new iPhone to the customer after completing all checks.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Used Handset Packaging &amp; Handover:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Place the used phone in a zip-lock bag and bubble wrap it securely.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Attach the evaluation sheet and checklist.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Hand over the packaged handset to the Jazz Manager.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Maintain a record of acknowledgment in a secure file.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Experience Center Handling Process &ndash; iPhone Trade-In</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Evaluation &amp; Documentation</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The evaluation sheet will be emailed to the Jazz Manager, detailing:</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Subsidy amount</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Used phone valuation</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Total price (used phone value + subsidy + new phone price)</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Payment Processing:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Jazz Manager will process the payment by swiping the Mercantile credit card for the total amount as per the valuation sheet.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">When the business manager swipes the card; the authentication PIN is with the mercantile representative to complete the payment.&nbsp;</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-family:&quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;,sans-serif">Two separate transactions will be executed. One, for the trade-in value from Mercantile credit card &amp; 2nd transaction will be executed from customer&rsquo;s card/cash for the differential amount to be paid.</span></span></span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">A Jazz Representative will generate an invoice for the full value of the new phone.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Handover Process:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Jazz Representative will hand over the new iPhone to the Mercantile Representative.</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The Jazz Manager will accept the used handset from Mercantile and provide acknowledgment.</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Secure Handling of Used Device:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">The used handset will be placed under lock and key by the Jazz Manager for safekeeping.</span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif"><strong><u>Scheduled Collection:</u></strong></span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="color:#e67e22"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Pick up used handsets from the Jazz Store every 7<sup>th</sup> day and place them in warehouse as per the scheduled cycle.</span></span></span></p>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.
Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Currently, only 3 experience centers are included in the Trade-In process. </span></span></span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Karachi Mobilink House</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Lahore Mobilink House</span></span></span></li>
	<li><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Islamabad Centre</span></span></span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="color:#3498db"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Trade-In will not be available on an installment. Trade is only valid for full payment options </span></span></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="color:#f39c12"><u><strong><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">Mandatory Guidelines:</span></span></strong></u></span></p>

<p><span style="color:#f39c12"><strong>No Returns or Reversals:</strong> </span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#f39c12">Once a handset is sold, it cannot be returned or reversed, as there is no existing policy to accommodate such requests. All sales are final.</span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="color:#f39c12"><strong>Product Codes for iPhone Sales:</strong> </span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#f39c12">The product codes currently defined under the Business Center model will be utilized for selling iPhones at full price via the Mercantile platform. No additional product codes will be assigned.</span></li>
</ul>

<p><span style="color:#f39c12"><strong>No Separate Reporting Segregation:</strong> </span></p>

<ul>
	<li><span style="color:#f39c12">There will be no separate reporting segregation available in Mercantile to distinguish handset sales within eFICS. All handset sales will be recorded under the existing reporting structure.</span></li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span style="font-size:14px"><span style="color:#2ecc71"><strong>Note:&nbsp;</strong>Please be informed that <strong>LLA models are not meant for Pakistan</strong> and will <strong>not be accepted for Trade-in</strong>.&nbsp;</span></span></p>

View Type: ExperienceCenter
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: Citizen Status Error Handling Process
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0pt">If the following error appears during BVS activity:<br />
<strong>&quot;Citizen status does not allow transaction&quot;</strong>,</span></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Aptos,sans-serif"><img src="data:image/png;base64," style="height:135px; width:386px" /></span></span></p>

<p>How to process is available.</p>

Submission Channel: 1055,2065
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063
Point of Contact: BC Manager/TL
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <ul>
	<li>Ask the customer to visit NADRA and obtain a validation token after verification.</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#2ecc71"><em><strong><span style="background-color:#ffffff">NADRA Confirmation</span></strong></em></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li>If NADRA confirms no issues with the number, the customer will return with the NADRA token.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#f1c40f"><strong>Resolution &ndash; Ownership Transfer</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li>First preference is to transfer ownership of the number to Party B through Party A skip, as per the existing exception.</li>
		<li>Required documents:
		<ul>
			<li>NOC/Undertaking</li>
			<li>CNIC copies of both parties</li>
			<li>NADRA token</li>
			<li>Error screenshot&nbsp;</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
		<li>Party B&#39;s BVS must be ensured.</li>
		<li>Change of ownership is only allowed for family members.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>Alternative Resolution &ndash; Ownership Retention</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li>If the customer insists on retaining ownership:
		<ul>
			<li>A paper-based CSAF must be filled for <strong>Change of SIM/New sim</strong>&nbsp;(transaction type must be specified).</li>
			<li>Required documents:
			<ul>
				<li>Original CNIC</li>
				<li>NADRA token</li>
				<li>Error screenshot</li>
			</ul>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>The transaction will be processed manually using <strong>skip biometric</strong> (only in genuine cases) Consultation&nbsp;from&nbsp;<strong>CRA team</strong> is required.</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#8e44ad"><strong>Approval &amp; Documentation</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li>Signatures on all documents must match the respective CNICs.</li>
		<li>The approving authority remains with <strong>EC TL / Manager</strong>.</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Checklist Items: <p>&nbsp;</p>

<ul>
	<li>This process is strictly applicable to Pakistani Nationals holding valid CNICs.</li>
	<li>Customers who do not hold a valid CNIC (e.g., foreign nationals, holders of POC/NICOP, etc.) will not be facilitated in resolving this specific error</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: I don't have updated information about this.
View Type: BackEndTeam
Category: Both
SOP Status: Active


TYPE: SOP

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: DeafTawk Facility for Differently abled/Special Persons
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p><span style="color:#9b59b6">In case a differently-abled/specially-abled customer (deaf) visits the Experience Center and we face challenges in understanding their requirements due to communication barriers, then&nbsp;<span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">we can use &ldquo;DeafTawk&rdquo; tabs available at Experience Center to facilitate customer.</span></span></span></p>

Submission Channel: 1055
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6171
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p><span style="color:#27ae60">In case a deaf customer visits the Experience Center and communication challenges arise, the following steps should be followed to ensure effective assistance:</span></p>

<ol>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#3498db"><strong>Initiate Video Call with Deaf Tawk</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="color:#27ae60">The Experience Center (EC) Executive will connect with a <strong>Deaf Tawk</strong> agent via the provided tabs.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#3498db"><strong>Sign Language Interpretation</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="color:#27ae60">The Deaf Tawk agent will communicate with the customer via video call using sign language to understand their requirements or concerns.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#3498db"><strong>Relay Information to EC Executive</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="color:#27ae60">The Deaf Tawk agent will share the customer&#39;s requirements with the EC Executive to take appropriate action.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#3498db"><strong>Assistance for Verification &amp; Issue Resolution</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="color:#27ae60">If needed, the EC Executive can take further assistance from the Deaf Tawk agent for verification, probing, or clarifications to accurately identify and resolve the customer&rsquo;s issue.</span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#3498db"><strong>Facilitate the Customer</strong></span></p>

	<ul>
		<li><span style="color:#27ae60">The EC Executive will provide the required support to the customer as per the existing processes available in the <strong>Knowledge Management System (KMS).</strong></span></li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ol>

Checklist Items: I don't have updated information about this.

	<li><span style="color:#9b59b6"><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Calibri,sans-serif">If there is a connectivity issue on the provided tabs, follow the standard <strong>data-related complaint handling process</strong> to troubleshoot and resolve the issue.</span></span></span></li>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: iPhone Trade-in Mercantile
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <p>This process covers the guidelines for iPhone Trade-in Mercantile available at some experiance centers .</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

Submission Channel: 1058
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: sabeeha.riaz
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 6171
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Service Request Activity: <p>Agent will guide a customer to visit the mentioned Experience Centers for&nbsp;iPhone Trade-in.</p>

<p>Currently, only 3 experience centers are included in the Trade-In process.</p>

<ul>
	<li>Karachi Mobilink House</li>
	<li>Lahore Mobilink House</li>
	<li>Islamabad Centre</li>
</ul>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

ðŸ“‹ ENTRY: SIMOSA Upsell Project- Business Center
------------------------------------------------------------
Main Header: B2C
Network Provider: Jazz
Complaint Description: <h3 style="text-align:center"><u><em><strong>SIMOSA Upsell Integration</strong></em></u></h3>

<p>The SIMOSA Upsell process is designed to maximize customer awareness and adoption of the SIMOSA (Jazz World) App by integrating personalized promotion into key service touchpoints. Frontline agents are empowered to educate, upsell, and guide customers toward using the app for faster, self-service solutions &mdash; all while maintaining a seamless support experience.</p>

<p>This process ensures:</p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#9b59b6"><em><strong>Higher digital adoption</strong></em></span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#9b59b6"><em><strong>Reduced repeat queries</strong></em></span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#9b59b6"><em><strong>Increased customer convenience</strong></em></span></p>
	</li>
</ul>

Submission Channel: 27
Escalation Level: I don't have updated information about this.
Created By: mehroz.fatima
Type (SOP/Complaint): SOP
Verification Status: 1063
Point of Contact: I don't have updated information about this.
Frequently Asked Questions: <h3>ðŸ’¡ <strong>New Features in the Upsell Portal</strong></h3>

<p>Agents can view:</p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Updated Suggested Bundles</strong> based on customer profiling</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Bundle Incentives</strong> shown per upsell offer</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Revised Commission Slabs</strong> for transparency in earnings</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Commission History</strong> tab (Month-to-date view)</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Real-time Eligibility</strong> checks via customer number</p>
	</li>
</ul>

Service Request Activity: <p>ðŸ”„ <strong>Action on Upsell Acceptance</strong></p>

<p>If the customer agrees to download the SIMOSA (Jazz World) App, the agent will take the following steps:</p>

<h4><strong>âœ… 1. Mark Interaction Outcome:</strong></h4>

<ul>
	<li>
	<h4>Select <strong>&ldquo;Upsell Accepted&rdquo;</strong> in the CRM</h4>
	</li>
</ul>

<h4>âœ… <strong>2. Send App Download Link:</strong></h4>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p>Immediately send the SIMOSA (Jazz World) App deep link via iSMS to the customer.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Select the relevant upsell categories from the drop-down list.</p>
	</li>
</ul>

<h3>âŒ <strong>If Customer Refuses (Upsell Denied):</strong></h3>

<p><strong>Agent Must:</strong></p>

<ol>
	<li>
	<p>Select <strong>&ldquo;Upsell Denied&rdquo;</strong> from the system.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Choose the appropriate reason from the drop-down menu.</p>
	</li>
</ol>

Checklist Items: <h3>âœ… <strong>Eligibility Criteria for Upsell Offering</strong></h3>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p>Upsell only if the customer is present in EC.</p>
	</li>
</ul>

<p>â—<strong>Blocked Numbers</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p><span style="color:#e74c3c"><strong>Upsell is restricted</strong></span> for blocked numbers (e.g., Stolen, Fraud, PTA Blocked,grey traffic, UAO_668).</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>If the number is restored during the visit,only then proceed with upsell.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>Ineligible for Bundles, But Eligible for SIMOSA</strong>:</p>

	<ul>
		<li>
		<p>Some numbers might not show bundle offers due to profile restrictions &mdash; still, agents must promote SIMOSA in such cases.</p>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p><strong>SIMOSA as Default Upsell Option</strong>:</p>

	<ul>
		<li>
		<p>In Multiplay, only SIMOSA App is allowed for upsell until further instructions.</p>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>

Required Questions: I don't have updated information about this.
Important Points: <h3>ðŸ”Š <strong>Tone &amp; Consent Guidelines</strong></h3>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p>Excitement is Key: The agent&rsquo;s tone must reflect enthusiasm and energy while offering any upsell.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Clear Communication: Use simple and clear Urdu/English while explaining bundles, features, and app benefits.</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>No Activation Without Consent:</p>

	<ul>
		<li>
		<p>Agent must always take explicit consent before:</p>

		<ul>
			<li>
			<p>Activating any bundle</p>
			</li>
			<li>
			<p>Sending the <span style="color:#c0392b">Simosa /Jazz World</span> download link</p>
			</li>
			<li>
			<p>Performing a SIM change</p>
			</li>
		</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>Respect Interruptions: If the customer interrupts during upsell, immediately pause and do not insist.</p>
	</li>
</ul>
